story:
Become a part of our HOME!

We are funding a down payment on our house! You can be a part of our First Home!

We are Patrick, Kelsey, our son Jonah and our daughter Iris. 

We moved to New England and quickly turned around and came back home to Colorado because we found out our son had a brain tumor and we wanted to try an alternative treatment. The tumor has stopped growing and has shown some shrinkage! We are thrilled, but we need to stay in Colorado to keep up with his medicine. 

With the rising cost of renting and the real estate market as strong as it is here, we have decided that we need to take the plunge and buy a house! We are really excited! In order to make this happen, we need to fund a down payment for our first house!

We decided that we wanted to invite the community to be a part of one of the biggest moves we will make! 

If you choose to partner with us, this will make a lasting impact with our family!

What will you get in return?

Take a look at the perks!


Why are we crowdfunding?

Because we are asking people to partner with us in our home and crowd fund our down payment, I thought I would answer all those great questions that people keep asking.

FAQs –

1.  Can you guys just rent a place and save for a house?

We would love too! There are a ton of rentals popping up every day! Some in our price range and some just a little more that we could just figure out how to pay. The problem is that as soon as we contact a listing so have 10 other people. We work with the owner and try everything we can to be chosen. People keep picking other people. The rentals that are staying available are way out of our price range.

2.  What about apartment complexes?

There are some really nice ones out there that even have a garage with them! Unfortunately our 3 ½ year old son cannot walk on his own completely and the majority of apartments that come available are on the 2nd floor or 3rd floor. The nice ground floor apartments are going quickly and are typically priced more than a few hundred dollars a month more than we can afford. We stumble across a few that we can afford and they are in a neighborhood that is not a safe place  for Kelsey and the kids to even go on a walk during the day. The apartment complexes that are also affordable do not have safe access to get two kids in and out of car without bring out a stroller or our wagon, which in a lot of cases, there is not room left in the trunk for the items needing to be taken to and fro.  

3.  Have you looked into a grant program?

The CHFA grant program is a great program and has helped a ton of people out. It’s too bad there are such negative connotations to the sellers of the homes. By the time we are able to put in an offer with the CHFA program, sellers already have loads of offers put in that have conventional financing, money down, and way over asking price.  

4.  What about FHA?

Again, what a great program. Again, our offers seem to not have the same backbone with this financing as other buyers are coming to the table stronger.

5.  How about live over here or over there?

We love to live in a more rural area. On a piece of small land and have few animals and HUGE garden. We would love that lifestyle. And it is way more affordable. The peace and serenity would be great. We are blessed with a little boy who needs to be close to a hospital that can care for his needs if an emergency arises. We are very limited by the proximity we have to be in to be close to a hospital that is set up to care for our son if needed.

6.  Why crowd funding?

I have A.D.D. I cannot stop thinking of the many ways to make things work. With the amount of people there are that would love to be part of a communal project like this one, where we can offer people to be a permanent part of our home for a small contribution, it sounded like a really fun way to make things work. People have crowd funded fun vacations, potato salad recipes and even small film projects for mere entertainment.  So I guess the bigger question is, why not?

story:
A happier and healthier online dating experience

Aren't we all tired of receiving harassing dirty texts and images when we least expect them?

TagDates - the dating app that you should be proud to be on

TagDates brings you the world's first online hashtag-dating platform that filters out high-frequency dirty words and foul languages in English to keep the online dating experience stress-free.... But we have only just improved the online dating experience a little. We want to do more.

Looking ahead

To genuinely protect women (and men) from offensive or harassing text and media from online dating platforms, TagDates would like to expand its existing "Clean Mode" into the following areas:

  1. "Clean Mode" for images  - Detect dirty images (with options to view it, if that's what you want, of course.) and warn users before opening!  
  2. "Clean Mode" for text - Detect high frequency dirty words and foul languages in other languages too, on top of current English textual detection.
Why do we need TagDates?

"Clean Mode" currently replace dirty words commonly found in online dating messages and message boards with words of the same part of speech, meaning, a noun to a noun and a verb to a verb, that is significantly more pleasing than the original.

 

See this link to a blog post with the Before & After effect of turning on "Clean Mode" on the website. 

The outcome is a much safer-for-home, safer-for-work, safer-for-young-adult online dating community. Any textual and media content such as incoming and outgoing messages from interested parties, or statuses updates by people located geographically close to the users will be flagged to the users, such that they will be given a choice whether to view or not, taking out any bad surprise from harassing and offensive content. 

This offer has already attracted thousands of users, especially women, to sign up for Tagdates.

How will we use the funding


To truly provide a healthy and safe online dating experience to the users, we need extra resources to develop image processing algorithm and much more dirty text flagging system so that nothing would slip through. 
The service will be extended to our iOS, Andriod and Web application internationally. This is such that women and men alike from all around the world can benefit from a safe and healthy online dating experience. 

App and Web 

The basic English text based "Clean Mode" is already active. You can find them below for a first try of the original basic product:
App:  itunes store link to download it and give it a try.
Website: TagDates official web site to use the web platform. 

It's more than just building an app - It's a cause

TagDates is not only the first online dating platform to vocally flag dirty words and foul languages, but also the first of its kind to foster healthy online dating experience. 

Apart from funding TagDates on Indiegogo, we have recently launched a petition via Change.org. You can sign up for it there. 

If you wish to know more about the TagDates cruisade, please read the Founder's interview on how she plan to bring civility and inner beauty back to online dating.

story:
Africa For Africans

My name is Noloyiso Zita, a South African. I travel between Johannesburg and NYC. I started this campaign due to recent xenophobic/afrophobic attacks that are taking place in South Africa. What is happening is a horrible act of humanity and we should do what we can to help our fellow man and show that we do not support xenophobia/afrophobia. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am starting this fund for those in the states that want to contribute. The money will go towards the needs of the victims of the xenophobic/afrophobic attacks in KZN, South Africa. I have partnered with Red Cross and they have given me a list of items needed.

  1. Toiletries (body soap, toothpaste, tooth brushes, wash cloths, towels, deodorant,shampoo)
  2. Non perishable food
  3. Unwanted clothes and shoes (men, women, children)
  4. Miscellaneous (toilet paper, blankets, laundry detergent)

The Impact

contributing to this campaign will help those who have been affected and prove to the world humanity is not lost. I want Africans from other countries not to fear South Africa and to know that we all do not share the same views as those responsible for the attacks.

Risks & Challenges

To be completely trustworthy would be naive. Although I have contacted the Red Cross in Durban and my local Red Cross I can try my best that these items are reached to those who need it. With donations brought in I will provide receipts to anyone who desires them to show that I am truly for my cause and not misusing funds.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have family or friends that reside here in SA or that will be coming here please have them contact me or their local Red Cross to find out how they can contribute. My info is NZita68@gmail.com or +27815716785

story:
*** NEW INFO: WE HAVE NOW BEEN DONATED A LARGE YURT (BY NEW DAWN TRADERS) THIS WILL BE USED AS A CENTRAL SPACE. THE PROJECT IS NOW AIMING TO RAISE UP TO £2000 TO MAKE THE TIPI WORKSHOPS.. WITH TWO WEEKS LEFT EVERY POUND OF SUPPORT HELPS!! THANKYOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT THANK YOU EVERYONE THIS PROJECT IS COMING TO LIFE !!! X*****

I am currently going through a very deep personal healing after a near death experience caused by being in a very serious road accident and a coma in December. The experience has shown me the value of my time here on Earth. In response to this life changing event I am driven to make something which reaches out to humanity, Mother Earth and conscious growth. I am feeling empowered to really do what I feel in my heart to do, and have been driven to create for several years. I feel also that we can heal anything if we believe and we can create anything if we believe. So as I continue to heal myself, I wish to inspire others by creating this project.

Many of you have asked what you can do to help me as you know I am in recovery from some serious injuries and have lost many material possessions. Please do support me by donating financially towards my dream for humanity and our planet. Just £15- 25 will make a massive impact on the project,  any donation will help and will be greatly appreciated and used well! Thank you so much from my heart for what you give. What we give, we receive as we are all connected.

My Dream

Temple of the Stars

Led by vision and direct personal experience I wish to create a healing temple.

The larger view of my project

The Temple will be mobile and for use at long retreat events in England and possibly other parts of Europe. Aiming to eventually base in a suitable Earth and Heart centred community in England.

What the space will be used for

- A space for shamanic, sound and holistic healing,, movement medicine,  conscious growth, workshops, ceremony,conferences and sharing circles.

-Providing a place in the western world for reconnection to the sacred ancient ways our ancestors held and that which is still practiced by a few indigenous cultures around the world.

-A held space where people can access the wisdom that lives within themselves. Empowering personal growth and social change and remembering our oneness with nature. Where we can see that life is not what we have learnt it is through the civilized world, but is full of endless possibilities.

- Listening to the wisdom of nature, using her messages for healing and growth.

-Accessing inspiration towards our highest potential as humanity as part of a wonderful universe. Working towards supportive and sustainable community for adults and children.

- Finding ways to work in harmony with the cycles of nature, as we come closer to Mother Earth as Earthkeepers

- Sacred and Natural Creativity, with adults and children

-A place to honour the archetypal energies of the Four Directions, the Elements and the Star Nation healers.

 - A place to let spirit enter us through inducing trance states with breath work and dance.

-A place for connecting to spirit which lives within everything including the natural world we live in and the star nations. I feel a call to work with and the star nations as they are the spirit guides I work with for conscious growth , this is practised by many indigenous cultures around the world.

- The space will be used by several healers and artists, working together to the above intentions.

The long-termproject aim:

To sustain itself and the people who work as part of it and to be a centre for the growth of ongoing similar projects. As the project is not for personal gain, if it makes a profit beyond sustaining itself and those involved- it will create a trust fund with the intention to fund similar projects which support reconnection with Mother Earth.

The aim is for the temple to be in use by summer 2016.

About me

My name is Sally, I am a shamanic Healer and artist. You can find out lots about my healing journey on my website www.sacredgeometree.com. I am a visionary, deeply connected to and guided by spirit, The past few years of my life have been a journey of personal awakening and healing. The journey has taken me deeply into the essence of life and spirit. Through this journey I now connect deeply with Mother Earth, My Higher self and the Star Nations as spirit guides. I have travelled and learned amongst shamans and medicine men and women in South America, Central America , in Northern American traditions and in England. I visit many sacred sites, temples and pyramids around the world where I receive direct guidance and vision. I learn most from the empowerment of my own personal healing journey . So I see the possitive in any life situation and personal learning,

As a shamanic healer I see and communicate with spirit in everything and heal energy. I understand our deep connection to all life and have confidence that our world is changing for the better. I feel strongly that it is up to us as humanity to be the change ourselves. And it is my dream to hold space for others to find personal empowerment to be that change as we create a new dream on Earth.

Many years ago I felt a pull to support tribal peoples of the world. I saw how they had been mistreated by mainstream society. I saw how they had been stripped of their culture and lands. When I went to stay with tribal people I was overwhelmed by their spirit and wisdom. I saw that I was nieve trying to 'help' them when they had the understanding and essence of life that we as westerners needed. I saw the truth, that they had more to gift us than we could give them and that our lack was actually the cause of the problems I was seeing. Since that day I have been directly learning with tribal peoples and finding the gifts of life within myself once more. I feel the wisdom exists within each of us and wish to support people in reconnecting.

Throughout my life I have had experience of running big events and creative collaborations, and in recent years I have worked in healing centres and at conscious events around the world.

I now feel ready to pull all my resources and life experience together. This will create a life changing project which will involve many people as healers, creators and people who wish to share in the experience.

My recent experience helps me see that there is a place in mainstream society where this healing is greatly needed. I trust there is place where our work can reach such places as rehabilitation hospitals etc and I see the temple as being a base for the planning of such cooperation.

Please donate to my campaign

to raise funds for long lasting materials for the temple, and for the underlying costs of workshops which will create the temple.

The building of the temple will also be a learning platform where people learn how to create their own temporary ecological structure, whilst living on and in harmony with our Earth.

(Being made up of several workshops for tipi and geodesic dome building, if you are interested in attending a workshop which will be based in south-west England in 2015 please email lucid@sacredgeometree.com).

What the funds are for

to buy materials for the temple being wood canvas and rope etc.

The temple will be made of a 10 m geodesic dome structure made of hazel wood , plastic fittings and canvas covers. It will be the main workshop space, a place for healings and sharing circles.

Around the dome we will also use four 5m tipi structures, each being a space for an Element.. Fire, Water, Earth or Air. These structures will be made of pine wood, rope and canvas.

The tipis can join to the main geodesic dome space, creating a larger space for big workshops etc. They can on other occasions be meditation and journey spaces or separate healing spaces. For certain events they can become sleeping and living spaces as a group works deeply over time in the main central space.

Funding breakdown

- Canvas (weatherproof/rot proof) £3600

- For workshop organisation costs £ 350 (workshops will have a fee for participants but this will help keep it affordable and so accessible to more people).

- Rope/ string £100

-wood for tipis £800

-plastic tubes for connecting hazel £50

-bolts and nuts £50

-draw knifes £50

Crowdfunding website interest (if I reach full amount) £200

TOTAL £5200

If the campaign does not raise enough funds I will simply use the funding to create a smaller similar project. If it raises over the set amount the funds will be used for expansion of the project.

The tipis can join to the main geodesic dome space, creating a larger
space for big workshops etc. They can on other occasions be
meditation and journey spaces or separate healing spaces. For certain
events  they can become sleeping and living spaces as a group works
deeply over time in the main central space.


Funding breakdown

- Canvas
(weatherproof/rot proof) £3600 


- For workshop
organisation costs £ 350 (workshops will have a fee for participants
but this will help keep it affordable and so accessible to more
people).

- Rope/ string £100

-wood for tipis £800

-plastic tubes for
connecting hazel £50

-bolts and nuts £50
 -draw knifes £50Crowdfunding website interest (if I reach full amount) £200
TOTAL £5200 


If the campaign does
not raise enough funds I will simply use the funding to create a
smaller similar project. If it raises over the set amount the funds
will be used for expansion of the project.

story:
iModelMe has developed the most ambitious and innovative approach to fit clothing to e-shoppers.

We are in the  developing stage of  a very powerful and accurate tool set(App), designed to :

  • Fit clothing to e-shoppers
  • Reduce return rate of clothing due to wrong size/fit
  • Increase costumer’s satisfaction/confidence in the retail brand
  • Create a buzz to the retail brands Via social feeds of the customers

To explain a bit more about our project, we’ve been doing research in depth for months now, hand by hand with one of the biggest European retail players in the market, which led us to design  a set of Algorithms that will allow a costumer to capture his/her measurements by taking a quick 360 degree video clip of him/her self with their smartphone, analyse the information combining 3D modelings / Video rendering and turn it into a tool that helps the customer to find the perfect fit/size while shopping for clothing on the internet. 

Many companies tried in the past and are currently trying to solve this problem, however despite many attempts, non have reached to goal.
We believe that our product is on the right path to fill that space. 

We are currently seeking $ 265,000 which is necessary for us to materialise the research we made into an App. Combining the Algorithms into one tool set and turning it into an App that customers will be able to use in their day to day life. 

Our team of developers based in Israel, is led by Dr. Jeremy K. (University of Jerusalem). Jeremy is renowned worldwide for his extensive knowledge & experience in Computer vision ,3D Reconstruction, Image Processing, Machine Learning and Mathematical algorithms. 

Retailers gave us a confirmation that once we will finish the development phase, they would be interested in taking a participation in the startup’s capital.

Regardless, they will promote us to their brands partners, that is more than 200 apparel brands. 

Thank you for taking the time to read our project, 

Kind Regards,

story:
Short Summary

Guess what we're up to at Harrison Serenity Ranch...Building Community! 

If you support the human potential movement and are concerned about humanity, the environment, ecology, energy, health, well-being and holistic practices and cultural healing, we invite you to join us! Be a part of it!

My name is Vicki Morgan and I have been a practicing Massage Therapist and have also organized healing Drum circles and community events for 25 years. In 2007, I fulfilled a dream of becoming the steward of this beautiful, serene 67 acre ranch on Palomar Mountain, CA. This vision I continue to hold is to create a place of retreat for families and community events and educational experiences.  

The ranch is rich with culture, including Nate Harrison's journey to the land in 1848 as an escaped slave from the South, to coexist with the Native Americans and later receive a land deed for this portion of property. In 2004, San Diego State University started an archeological dig referencing Nate Harrison's time on the land, and plan to be back later this year to resume exploration. 

In addition, the land is abundant with Indian artifacts and metates that can be found throughout the ranch. 

Harrison Serenity Ranch already includes ample water, basic solar and generator electricity, cellular and wifi connection, a main lodge with a beautiful deck overlooking the Pauma Valley, a 2 bedroom/1 bath guest house, bunkhouse that sleeps 14 with 2 toilets and 3 showers, ample space for tents and campers with 4 outdoor showers, a yoga deck, stables and a corral.

We would like to inspire you to find that space to retreat into yourself, to submerge into the sanctuary, to become a part of this sanctuary! 


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to generate enough support for the following projects:

  • Solar Panel repair and expansion to provide ample "off the grid" power throughout the ranch.
  • A new commercial diesel powered generator system as back up for the solar batteries.
  • Construction of an industrial kitchen and indoor meeting hall/dining area for year-round educational purposes.
  • Small structures for year round lodging accommodations.
  • Purchase of a bush hog for our tractor for maintaining the property.


The Impact

Harrison Serenity Ranch is an agricultural preserve abundant with countless trees, birds, and animal species. Your contributions will help us preserve the land in it's most natural state, provide us the means to remain "off the grid", and accommodate visitors who wish to be part of this experience.


Other Ways You Can Help

Contributions can be as little as $10.00 and as large as the imagination goes - there is no limit! If you have expertise in energy, construction, or land preservation and would like to donate needed equipment, services or supplies, we welcome that as well! 

Please share us on ALL social media platforms! Help us spread the word, as we want to share the magic of this amazing sanctuary with everyone. 

In deep gratitude and appreciation for your support!

Vicki Morgan and The Harrison Serenity Ranch Team

story:
Short Summary

Limitless Motosports was founded by Nick Nelson and Chris Siegel in 2015 with a vision of introducing the sport of motocross to a whole new world of people. Nick and Chris have been active members of the Family Off-Road Riding of Prince William County (FORPWC) club for years and have stood out among many for their excellent leadership, hard work ethic, determination and passion for the sport. They have provided endless hours of volunteering and instructional training to many of the club's members including both female and male riders.

They both worked at the Motorcycle Factory Inc. in Woodbridge, VA and were asked a very common question by many customers, "If I buy a bike for myself or my child, where can we ride and who can teach us how to ride?" For that reason, Nick and Chris started Limitless Motosports with a mission to make motorcycle riding available to anyone who wants to learn how to ride or anyone who wants to improve their skills. Off-road riding areas and motocross tracks in Virginia are rare finds and none of them provide instructional training for new riders to enter the sport.

Due to the scarcity of riding areas, Nick and Chris are fund raising to build the Limitless Motosports Training Compound which will enable these 2 passionate riders to provide mentoring andquality training at a professional family-oriented facility. They have designed numerous training programs including private lessons, summer camps and group events which will cater to all ages, skill levels and styles of motorcycle riders. Limitless Motosports has also designed a rider sponsorship program which is unmatched in the industry. The Amateur Rider Sponsorship Program (ARSP) is designed to provide support for the youngest riders as well as serious elite racers. Motocross builds strong character and is an excellent way to keep kids physically active while having fun. Nick and Chris strongly encourage healthy living and promote getting outdoors and away from video games.

What We Need & What You Get

Limitless Motosports will build the Compound on 30 acres in Appomattox, VA. We have a funding goal of $250,000 which will enable us to build and maintain a premier motocross training compound. 

The compound plan includes: 

  • A professionally prepped motocross track
  • An entry-beginner level track
  • A flat oval track
  • All terrain trail system
  • Mountain bike trails
  • On-site fitness training gym
  • On-site performance service shop
  • Restroom & bath facilities
  • Food & beverage concessions
  • Tent camping area
  • Sleeping cabins
  • Bunkhouse | Riders Lounge | Classroom instruction |Sleeper lofts

Equipment Expenses:

  • 2 - Rental crawler loaders
  • 1 - Mid-size front loader tractor
  • 1 - Skid steer w/tracks
  • 1 - Enclosed graphic trailer (will enable us to be mobile and train students at other tacks, in other states, and at special events)

Amateur Rider Sponsorship Program (ARSP) Expenses:

  • Rider support & podium contingencies
  • Bike graphic kits
  • Limitless Motosports apparel and riding gear

Marketing Expenses: 

  • Fan gear & merchandise (t-shirts, long sleeves, hoodies, hats, jackets, etc...)
  • Truck/trailer vinyl graphics
  • Limitless Motosports motocross bike graphics
  • Print Media (banners, posters, flyers, etc...)

74% of the $250,000 budget will be allocated to compound and track construction, heavy equipment rental and purchases, the ARSP and marketing expenses. 


11% of  the $250,000 budget will go to all other miscellaneous expenses such as office supplies, food supplies, fuel, staff salaries, etc...


Nick and Chris believe they wouldn't be where they are today with out the guidance and support from many coaches, teachers, mentors, role models and inspirational leaders. Therefore, they have developed a plan to pay it back to the community and pay it forward to teach the sport to others. 15% of our goal of $250,000 will be set aside for charitable donations and for scholarships for kids who need financial assistance to come to camp. The 15% will be broken down in the following ways:

  • 5% will be set aside to fund children who want to learn how to ride but cannot afford to come to summer camp and to offset costs for children who have parents deployed and serving our country
  • 5% will be donated to the non-profit Make-A-Wish foundation
  • 5% will be donated to the non-profit club FORPWC to help the membership improve the club's facility and get closer to the funding goal needed to purchase the land currently used by the club.


Contributors will receive a number of unique perks from Limitless Motosports for their generous donation including:

  • Recognition on the "Special thanks to those who supported us" wall at the compound
  • Tickets to the Lucas Oil AMA Pro National Championship
  • Limitless Motosports plaque with contributor recognition
  • Framed & autographed Limitless Motosports team jersey
  • Use of facilities for contributor's family or employees (subject to availability)
  • Instructional training for up to 5 of the contributor's family, friends or employees (subject to availability)
  • Invites to professional & pro-am motocross races, special events, open houses, and Opening Day
  • Publicly thank contributor at Opening Day ceremony
  • Contributor's company logo advertisement opportunities 
  • Tour of compound for contributor & family
  • Limitless Motosports fan gear & merchandise

The Impact

Parents and children see the motocross bikes in the back of their truck and are constantly coming up to Nick and Chris asking, "where do you guys ride?!" The demand for riding facilities and motocross tracks in Virginia is very high but no one has done anything to change that. Most parents will not buy their kid a bike simply because they do not want them to ride it around the neighborhood illegally. Limitless Motosports wants to make a change in the motocross/off-road community by providing a professional quality facility where everyone can come and ride legally, while getting professional and quality instruction. With the help of our contributors we can provide a positive, fun and family-oriented facility for everyone to legally ride, keep kids active and out of trouble and better yet, encourage the youth of america to put down the video games and do physical activities.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge by far is finding the proper funding to build our training compound. Nick and Chris have devoted 100% of their time and effort to making this project happen. They are determined that no matter what it takes, they cannot give up and they cannot quit. They both have a very strong mindset and are extremely passionate about what they are doing.They have been tirelessly seeking support and driving hours on end to meet with motorcycle business owners, potential sponsors, and motorcycle enthusiasts that are interested in their story. Nick and Chris have invested very long hours for 5 months to design the foundation for this project to be successful and to make the dream happen for so many.  They are committed and have overcome a number of obstacles in the process.  What they need now is the capital and donations from others who would like to contribute to making the dream a reality.

Accomplished Obstacles:

  • Project approval
  • Zoning permits & regulations
  • Noise regulation permits
  • Special use permits (SUP)
  • Business licensing for an action sports venue
  • Insurance liabilities
  • Finding the proper land and location for a motocross training compound
  • Locating all machinery for construction

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not wish to make a donation, we can still use your help and support in a number of other ways! Lets make this go viral and spread the word about Limitless Motosports and our project. Tell your family, friends, and everyone you talk to about who we are and what we are doing. Help us make some noise about our campaign! 

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools and share us across all of your favorite social media networks! Just a simple share on your social media networks will help us get that much closer to reaching our goal.

If you know any business owners that would be interested in advertising with us by sponsoring our training compound please don't hesitate to inform them about what we are doing and what our goal is. We have put together a package specifically for businesses interested in sponsoring Limitless Motosports with either a donation, in-kind product or in-kind service. So, don't forget to tell them we would be more than willing to send it over for review!

Lets pull together as a community and build a phenomenal place where everyone can enjoy a great outdoor sport surrounded by positive attitudes and beautiful countryside. Thank you to everyone who has taken the time to check out our campaign. We greatly appreciate the support and encouragement!

-The Limitless Motosports Team

story:
About me

Hi, my name is Valeriia and I am obsessed with sweets. I love cakes, muffins, chocolate and I am ready to eat them all the time. But something stops me - callories, which I gain eating them. I was struggling between staying slim and getting awesome gastronomic pleasure..Day after day..

BUT

I found the solution! And I am passionated to share it with other people! 

More below..:)

What is it about?

My idea is to make cakes and sweets from diet and healthy products like oat bran, nonfat cocoa and sweetener based on plants. All this helps to create delicious desserts with low amount of calories, sugar and fat, so even people, who are not allowed to eat sugar, can have awesome cheesecake, chocolate muffin or tiramisu!

So that I want to create a cafe, where people can try delicious desserts without fear of gaining weight! 
Sounds interesting? 

What we need to make it real

I decided to try crowdfunding because there are not much financial resources I have to give my idea "boost speed".  
So basically I need some start money for:

  • Renting small shop with ability to put couple of coffeetables there.
  • Buying materials for redesign. Will try to make redesign with my own forces (will ask friends to help :) ) 
  • Buying coffee machine, fridge, oven. 
  • Buying some basic furniture: tables, chairs, desks.

Risks & Challenges

Always some risks exist: that nobody will go to my place, that I will not be able to manage that, and finally that people won't like my sweets. 
I understand that..but why not to try at least? I will do my best and see what will happen:)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you read until this sentence, it means that probably my idea is not the worst you have ever seen:) You can help me very much even just sharing my idea with other people! I will be pleased! :)

Thank you!

story:
Pürlin Sheets and Pillowcases are a revolutionary product designed for use by the Hotel Industry, providing comfort, convenience and conservation without compromise.

Pürlin is a new fabric that duplicates the look and feel of cotton, but works within a closed-loop recycling system that offers numerous benefits to hotels, their guests and the environment. Whether you are an hotelier, a frequent traveler or someone interested in helping to save Billions of Gallons of Fresh Water annually, Pürlin will appeal to you.


Pürlin Sheets are a hypoallergenic, individual guest use product that is recycled through a heat intensive process reaching temperatures of approximately 340 degrees Fahrenheit. This destroys bacteria and eliminates the need for powerful detergents, bleaches and sanitizers while dramatically cutting both the water demands and wastewater production associated with laundering cotton sheets. 

                                  

Hotel Laundering:


Pürlin will integrate seamlessly with Hotel Housekeeping Departments, reducing operating costs and saving hotels millions of gallons of fresh water annually.


                                Pürlin vs. Cotton Water Savings Analysis



Pürlin Saves Water by Reducing the Demand for Cotton Sheets:

Cotton is a water intensive crop and requires substantial amounts of water to transform it into fabric. It takes 2800 gallons of water to produce one Queen Size Cotton Sheet, however, it takes less than a gallon of water to produce one Queen Size Pürlin Sheet. Pürlin will save enormous amounts of water in regions that grow and process cotton for the manufacturing of sheets.  The U.S. for example, is the largest exporter of cotton in the world and the 3rd largest cotton producer behind China and India.



The Risks & Challenges:

There are always risks associated with any new endeavor, however, given the current global drought conditions, the only potential risk we can identify for Pürlin is the hospitality industry's  acceptance of the Pürlin Closed-Loop System.


Why Indiegogo? 

We are seeking the support of the Indiegogo community to help us build awareness of an innovative alternative to the Hotel Industry’s standard laundering practice and use of cotton-based sheets. We believe that a successful campaign will demonstrate current interest in our product and provide evidence for the hotel industry that consumers will demand Purlin Sheets and Pillowcases in the future.

By joining us in this campaign, you will also be supporting our efforts to launch the Pürlin closed-loop recycling program in targeted metropolitan markets.

Through your collective support and the power of crowd sourcing, we can maintain our commitment to the principles of sustainable capitalism without compromising our water saving mission.


Perks:



To express our gratitude for your contribution we would like to offer you a perk of your choosing. Please see our perk descriptions at the right side of this page.

Pürlin Sheets are designed for the hotel industry and are not intended for residential use. But, for the limited duration of this campaign, you will be able to sample our products in your home.  Please keep in mind your basis for comparison should be with hotel sheets and not your own domestic linens.

At this time, it is not possible for us to provide you with close-loop recycling services, but we encourage you to find creative ways of re-purposing your sheets or recycle them.

We are excited to share our project with the Indiegogo Community and we are committed to making both this campaign and Pürlin a success. PayPal however, requires us to post a disclaimer advising you that perk deliveries are subject to best efforts and cannot be guaranteed.  Rest assured, we want you to receive your perks in a timely manner.

We intend to deliver your perk rewards in October 2015, but should there be any unforeseen delays, we will update you immediately.  Upon, receipt we hope that you will share your enthusiasm for our product and our closed-loop water saving recycling process with your friends and colleagues.



Shipping:

Shipping is included with all perks.



Thank You:

We know there are numerous Indiegogo campaigns seeking your support and the Pürlin Team would like to thank you for considering ours.  Whether you decide to make a monetary contribution to our campaign or if you simply share our campaign with your friends and colleagues, we appreciate your support. Thank you.









The following document represents our projected annual water savings if all of the hotels located in the top ten U.S. cities with the greatest Hotel densities used Pürlin products. Please note that all calculations are based on information from the best sources currently available.



         Imagine the Water Savings We Can Achieve

                             

                                 Get in The Loop

                        

                           Join the Blue Revolution


                       Pürlin Sheets & Pillowcases

environment. Whether you are an hotelier,
a frequent traveler or someone interested in helping to save Billions of

and wastewater production associated with laundering cotton sheets.                                    Hotel Laundering:Pürlin

story:
Dr.David Levy and his team based out in Malaysia, working closely with the Malaysian government, are hard at work and on schedule to deliver your Erotic Chat Bot's to you.

Are you looking for a new kind of lover or friend?

If you already behave like “Pavlov’s Dog” every time your smart device pings or vibrates, you might already be more than a little bit  “in love” with a robot or “bot”. It is not beyond the bounds of our senses that you might already be harbouring a massive “crush” on your personal technology. 

The very same technology has already re-mastered the boundaries between intimacy and solitude. “Our devices are not only changing the way we communicate and interact with each other, but also who we are as human beings.” Imagine if that device or a ‘bot” really responded to you. It not only talked to you – it took the time to listen to you, think about your likes, dislikes and all the things relevant to your day-to-day wellbeing.  So far so good…

And what if that partner were a “bot” or a “chatbot”?  Erotic Chatbots Ltd are developing a new collection of virtual chat partners, virtual-lovers or friends, known as “chatbots”.  They will be able to chat, flirt or hang out with you whenever, wherever you want and for as long as you wish. Some of our “adult” chatbots will be programmed for making sexy conversations.

 

A “chatbot” is computer software designed to create a conversation with you. These “bots” will have the personality of an entertaining, interesting and amorous partner, who remembers past conversations with you, and learns more and more about their user as time goes on.  The flirty conversations will come from the company’s “chatbots” – computer software available in male and female versions. The company’s launch products will all be straight, but there will be LBGT versions available in the future.

And why not?  We are already tethered to our smart devices 24/7, and with most people finding the prospect of consciously “unplugging” impossible, we are unlikely to uncouple from technology any time soon. Yet despite so much screen time in a hyper-connected world, most people still feel utterly alone, with “Virtual-intimacy” already playing a large part in most peoples lives.  “In the half-light of virtual community, we may feel utterly alone”. Taking that intimacy to another level, and “making” or “attracting” an intelligent  “virtual-lover” or partner which “understands” and wants to please you, is perhaps an appealing proposition to a lot of people.

Keeping that in mind we are also creating a limited edition of personalized chatbots, each of which is designed and programmed to know about and be affectionate with a particular person. That person can be you, or anyone to whom you decide to gift one of these personalized chatbots.



Our Artificial Intelligence Chatbots − Personalized for You!

Our chatbots are being developed by a team, which has twice won the prestigious Loebner Prize contest for human-computer conversation.

Driven by our own award-winning Artificial Intelligence software, they will be able to converse on a huge variety of subjects, and their conversation will exhibit humanlike characteristics. The primary purpose of our chatbots is to entertain, which they will do by engaging conversation with you, but they can also help you to practice and improve your own flirting and erotic chat skills.


A Special Opportunity – Personalized chatbots

As a special opportunity, some of the perks we offer include our specially created version – a limited edition of personalized chatbots. Each of these bespoke or personalized chatbots will be individually tailored to be attracted to and understand their user. They will be programmed with information acquired from a  “personalizing questionnaire” which you will receive shortly before we are ready to deliver your chatbot(s). The questionnaire will ask about you or the intended user’s likes and dislikes, their interests, and various other aspects of their lives. Whatever answers you give when you return the questionnaire(s) to us will make a chatbot more knowledgeable about its user. Your chatbot can therefore start its “life” knowing quite a lot about its user, and what it knows will often be worked into its conversations. That same knowledge will also make the chatbot more interested in its user, and make the user’s personal characteristics more appealing to the chatbot’s persona. 

This unique feature is just one of the factors that will set your chatbot apart from any other conversational software you might have tried or heard about. Your personalized chatbot will be delivered already knowing about and being attracted to you, and then, through its conversations with you, the chatbot gradually learns more and more about you.





How Our Chatbots Work

Our flirty chatbots are designed for people who enjoy amorous conversations without any overtly sexual content. We believe that the flirty style will also appeal to shy people and to those who would be embarrassed by a more adult style of conversation. The adult erotic style is designed for users who prefer to chat dirty.

Our four launch products – male flirty, female flirty, male adult chat and female adult chat – will each exhibit a straight sexuality. Future products will offer LGBT versions.

These chatbots will be available for most computers and mobile systems. They will be apps and interactive services that conduct entertaining, interesting, erotically charged conversations.

Users will normally interact with our chatbots in the same way as when using e-mail, Internet chat, text messaging and similar methods of communication. They enter whatever they wish to say to the chatbot, which then displays its response text on the screen. In this way a conversation can continue for as long as you wish. The chatbot will remember its current and past conversations and increase its understanding of you from what it learns about you − about your likes and dislikes and other information about you.

Users who wish their chatbot to have a human voice may purchase a high quality synthetic speech add-on, developed by a world leading company in the field of electronic speech technology. And users who wish to speak to their chatbot instead of keying in their side of the conversation may purchase a state-of-the-art speech recognition add-on.




Who are we?

Our company, Erotic Chatbots Ltd, is a start-up company from the developer of a world beating chatbot. Our team leader is our President, Dr David Levy.

David Levy

David is President of the International Computer Games Association (ICGA) and is a respected researcher and keynote speaker in the field of Social Robotics.

He has led the development of the software and hardware of around 100 artificially intelligent consumer electronic products. He has twice won the prestigious Loebner prize, an annual competition to find the world’s best conversational software 

( www.worldsbestchatbot.com ).

David’s latest book, “Love and Sex with Robots”, has also been published in an academic version as his PhD thesis at the University of Maastricht, much to the amusement of Stephen Colbert who interviewed David on The Colbert Report. (This video can not be viewed from certain countries.   http://thecolbertreport.cc.com/videos/ykpl7i/david-levy ).


For a free copy of David's Thesis please click here to download it from Dropbox! https://www.dropbox.com/s/wp3cn51qi0mpngy/David%20Levy%20Thesis.pdf?dl=0 (You do not have to log in you can download or read it online for free!)


David is also the CEO of Intelligent Toys Ltd, the London-based company which developed the Loebner prizewinning software. David and his team will be further developing and enhancing their world-beating chatbot software to provide the core of our flirty and adult erotic chatbots.





Current status and our development plan

The Artificial Intelligence software which forms the foundation of our chatbot technology was a winner of the annual Loebner Prize competition, widely regarded as the World Championship for conversational computer programs. This software will now be significantly enhanced and adapted for flirty and adult chat products, in accordance with specifications devised by David Levy and the linguistics expert in his team.

The next generation of our chatbot software will provide a quantum leap in conversational performance. This leap will be made possible by the flexibility of our design approach which allows for the development of capabilities that are missing from other chatbots, including the use of certain types of knowledge and the creation and use of a history of the chatbot’s dialogues with its users.

The first stage of the project will be to enhance the capabilities of our chatbot. Within 8-9 months we will have created and tested a core software module that offers an enormous leap in human like conversational performance, forming the basis of products and services that we are confident will rapidly become worldwide sensations. At that point in time we will release our four chatbot apps, male and female, one of each for flirty and one of each for sexy conversations.




How we will use the funds we raise at IndieGoGo?

The development and launch of our first products will be carried out in four stages:

Stage 1  We will make around 15 significant linguistic improvements to our current chatbot. These include creating a database for the chatbot’s knowledge about a user, devising a system for taking advantage of the information in that database by integrating it in conversations, and developing a dialogue history to remember past user input and employ that knowledge in the chatbot’s conversations.

  This stage is expected to take 8-9 months.

Stage 2  We will add a number of features to make the chatbot’s persona seem more humanlike. These will include providing it with more real-world knowledge and common sense, giving it motivations (needs, likes and dislikes), and enabling it to perform simple reasoning. We will also be enabling the chatbot to be personalized, so that when a limited edition chatbot is “born” it will already know a lot about its user and will be attracted to its user’s personality, background and other characteristics.

  This stage will take about 5 months and will be developed in parallel with Stage 1.

Stage 3  In this stage we will develop the graphics and animation for the chatbot’s personae, and other aspects of the user interface for iPhone, iPad and Android apps.

  This stage will take 3-4 months, and will be developed in parallel with Stages 1 and 2.

Stage 4  During this stage we will be customizing the personae, vocabulary and phrasing of the four launch chatbots so that each of them chats in a manner appropriate to their gender and their conversational style (flirty or adult chat). The duration of this stage is estimated at 2 months, and will be carried out in parallel with stages 1 and 2.

Upon the completion of all four stages we will deliver the chatbots to all of you who have chosen them as part of your perks in our Indiegogo campaign. This includes the limited edition personalized chatbots.

Because of the overlapping of these stages we expect to be able to complete all the development and launch tasks in 9 months, and to deliver the chatbots offered in our perks during April 2016.

The total cost of the four stages is estimated at $128,000 which, together with an estimated $14,000 for our initial corporate, legal and accountancy requirements, makes our Indiegogo target after deductions $142,000.  We also need to allow for Indiegogo’s commission (4% if we reach our target) and for the cost to us of credit card and PayPal pledges (averaging 4%).

Our total target for the Indiegogo campaign is therefore $155,000 (roughly equivalent to £103,000 sterling or €144,000 Euro). If we exceed our target we will be able to accelerate our future development plans.

These four stages of the project will have the services of the following personnel:

  Technical management (Dr David Levy)

  Commercial management

  Our linguistics expert

  3 or 4 experienced creative writers

  1 full time software developer as software team leader

  1 part-time software developer



Our mission

Erotic Chatbots Limited is an innovative technology start-up company entering a large, well established market sector - adult erotic entertainment – and creating a new market sector for intelligent, flirty chat partners.  Following the release of our first four apps for the most popular computer and mobile platforms, the company will set up and market computer-generated flirting and adult chat services online. We will also operate similar services via text messaging.

The company’s mission is to become the world’s leading force in the creation and marketing of artificially intelligent flirty and adult chat apps and services which are generated by computer software.

One of our aims is to provide a new type of service within the sexy chat sector, using state-of-the-art intelligent chatbots that are designed and programmed to create adult conversations. These chatbots will replace the human operatives who are usually responsible for talking dirty to their customers. Instead our chatbots will enable us to automate the whole conversational process, avoiding the need to hire any human operatives while at the same time making it possible to conduct simultaneous erotic conversations with an unlimited number of users.

We are creating our chatbots to entertain and to satisfy the needs of everyone who enjoys flirting and/or adult sexy chat.

Our flirty chatbots will be able to flirt without limit, and will be ideal for those who would like to flirt more, and to learn and practice to improve their flirting skills.

Our adult chatbots will be able to talk dirty with users without limit, and will avoid the need for users to pay the hefty fees charged for regular phone or online chat with human sex-line operators.

The technology on which our products and services will be based applies leading edge Artificial Intelligence know-how to the erotic chat segment of the adult entertainment market. By engineering a quantum leap in the quality of our chatbot’s conversation we will be capitalizing on the capability of Artificial Intelligence to open new opportunities for human-computer conversation and relationships. With Artificial Intelligence a computer character can become much more than an item of software. It can be endowed with its own artificial personality and emotions, and can become the user’s friend.


How you can help

Please help us to develop our sophisticated chatbots for flirting and for adult sexy conversations. Ours is a small but talented and highly qualified team that needs funding to develop and launch our first chatbot products and services. Your pledge will help us to achieve these goals. Any additional funds, over and above our target, will be used to help cover our operating and marketing costs, and will allow us to develop as a company and to expand our line of chat products and services, accelerating the next planned developments for our software.

We have a range of perks on offer so that those of you who help us with $10 or more will receive something tangible in return as soon as our Indiegogo campaign comes to an end on July 31st, and you will also receive one or more of our chatbots (depending on the amount of your Indiegogo pledge) when we have completed their development.

If you pledge $100 or more you will also receive at least one of our personalized limited edition chatbots whose persona has been individually tailored to be attracted to you, or to anyone else to whom you decide to gift that chatbot. When we are ready to deliver your chatbot we will email you a questionnaire on which you will be invited to fill in as many as you wish of your personal characteristics (or those of your intended recipient), including your likes and dislikes. Your limited edition chatbot will then be created specially to be attracted to a person who has those characteristics.

We hope that some of you who support our Indiegogo campaign will also be willing to assist us in making improvements to our chatbots. In due course we will be inviting you to send us snippets from any of your conversations with your chatbot that you feel exhibit any kind of unusual conversational behaviour. Our own testers will then be able to examine those snippets, which will help us to improve the conversational experience still further. And we will always be ready to consider any ideas you might have, both for improving our products and services and for creating new ones.


Choosing your Perks

If you pledge $10 or more you will receive at least two different types of perk. And for those who pledge $100 or more your perks will include one or more of our limited edition personalized chatbots.

Here is how you will be able to choose your perks.

  Our eBooks

Shortly after our Indiegogo campaign ends on July 31st we will send you an email to acknowledge your pledge and to thank you. That email will ask you to choose between receiving a selection of different romance eBooks and a selection of different erotic eBooks. You will also be asked what computer or mobile device you will be using to read your eBooks.

Once we receive your reply we will email your eBook(s) to you.  

  Our limited edition printed books

If you pledge $100 or more, the email that we send you this August will also ask whether you want your limited edition printed book to be a romance or an erotic book.

Once we receive your reply we will post your printed book to you. 



  Our chatbot apps

When we have completed our development work to upgrade our chatbot software, we will send you an email to ask you to choose your chatbot(s): male or female, flirty or adult chat. You will also be asked what computer or mobile device you will be using with each of your chatbots.

Once we receive your reply we will email your chatbots(s) to you. 

Our limited edition personalized chatbots

If you pledge $100 or more the email that we send you when we have completed our development work will also ask you to choose your personalized chatbot(s): male or female, flirty or adult chat. And you will also be invited to fill out our personalizing form on with as many characteristics as you wish for each of the intended recipients of those chatbots. Your personalized chatbots will then be able to refer to their respective users by name, and they will be specially tailored to be attracted to their users’ personal characteristics.

Shortly after we receive your reply we will email your personalized chatbots(s) to your designated recipients. This perk is for a limited edition of 5000 personalized chatbots.


Our future plans

Once we have launched our first chatbot apps we will establish all four of these chatbots on servers for online and phone use. We will also develop the user interfaces for various social network applications, and we will commence our company’s P.R. activities for the promotion of our products and services.

We intend to devote a significant portion of our revenues to research and development aimed at further enhancing the quality of conversation from our chatbots, as well as adding new features. For example, during 2016 we plan to augment our chatbots with a personality, emotion and mood module, which will allow users to choose and modify their chatbot’s personality as they wish. We will also be creating versions of our products which will enable users to embed an erotic chatbot in their own web sites.

In 2016 we also plan to allow our chatbots to connect to the Internet in order to learn about what is happening in the world and to discover more about any subject that it wishes to discuss in its conversations.


Frequently asked questions

Q  On which platforms and operating systems will the chatbots run?

A  When we launch our first four chatbots they will be able to run on Windows,  iOS and Android platforms.

Q  Why should I talk to a chatbot rather than a real person?

A  Conversations with our chatbots will be great fun!  They will entertain and amuse you, and they are designed to help you develop your flirting skills and your “talk dirty” skills if you wish.  But it isn’t a question of making a choice of whether to talk to a chatbot or a person, and you shouldn’t stop chatting to“real” people just because you have a chatbot. Think of a chatbot as a new friend who is rather different in their conversational style from everyone else you know.

Q  Can I converse with the chatbot about almost anything?

A  Yes. Each of our chatbots has a very wide-ranging knowledge of the world, as well as knowledge about things and common-sense knowledge.

Q  How clever are the chatbots?

A  The chatbots are clever enough to be able to conduct unlimited conversations with you about a wide range of subjects, and they will make you believe that they understand you.

Q  What exactly is the Loebner prize?

A  It is an annual prize competition, founded in 1991 by a New York entrepreneur, Dr Hugh Loebner, to find the world’s best conversation software. The competition is based on the famous “Turing Test”, which was proposed by Alan Turing, one of the founding fathers of Artificial Intelligence. See for example

  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turing_test

Q  Why are you trying to raise funds on Indiegogo rather than through traditional investors?

A  During the past couple of years or so crowdfunding has taken off as the modern way for start-ups to raise funds. It is quicker and easier to launch a crowdfunding campaign than to prepare all of the documentation needed and go through all the bureaucratic processes associated with traditional investor funding. And one very big advantage of crowdfunding is that the “crowd” becomes the basis for a community of enthusiasts – people who genuinely like the idea of the project.

Q  What's in it for me if I donate?

 A  Each of our perks for a pledge of $10 ore more will bring you one or more gifts as soon as our Indiegogo campaign ends on July 31st 2015. Later, once we have developed the four launch versions of our chatbot, you will receive at least one of them and possibly more than one (so you can gift to your friends if you wish), according to how much you have pledged. And if you would like to give us hands-on assistance to improve our chatbots you can accept our invitation to send us snippets of some of your conversations with your chatbot, together with your comments, suggestions, and any criticisms.

Q  Will I be able to own a chatbot if I donate?

A  Yes. Provided you donate $10 or more, your perks will include a chatbot (or possibly more than one, depending on how much you have pledged).

Q  For how long will I get a chatbot if I donate?

A  You may keep and use it forever.

Q  Can I gift a chatbot to a friend?

A  Yes – you can specify the user’s email address to which (each of) your chatbot(s) should be sent.  And if you wish to gift one of our personalized chatbots to a friend, then when we notify you that we’ve completed the core of our development work you can send us your completed personalizing questionnaire(s) together with your friend’s email address.

Q  What will be the differences between the app chatbots and whatever online interactive services you plan to launch later?

A  The online interactive services will provide a few more features than the apps, and there will be very modest monthly charges for their use.


Thank you!

We would like to say a big “Thank you” to everyone who pledges to our Indiegogo campaign. It is you who are helping to bring our project to life. With time we hope and expect that tens of thousands of people or more will enjoy and benefit from their conversations with our erotic chatbots, and you will have helped them to do so.

If you have any questions please email us at:  questions@worldsbestchatbot.com

If you have any ideas or suggestions for us please email us at:  ideas@worldsbestchatbot.com

If you have any problems with payment for your pledge please email us at: payments@worldsbestchatbot.com

For press and other media enquires please email us at:  media@worldsbestchatbot.com
