Our chatbots
are being developed by a team, which has twice won the prestigious Loebner
Prize contest for human-computer conversation.
Driven by our
own award-winning Artificial Intelligence software, they will be able to
converse on a huge variety of subjects, and their conversation will exhibit
humanlike characteristics. The primary purpose of our chatbots is to entertain,
which they will do by engaging conversation with you, but they can also help
you to practice and improve your own flirting and erotic chat skills.

A Special Opportunity –
Personalized chatbots
As a
special opportunity, some of the perks we offer include our specially created
version – a limited edition of personalized chatbots. Each of these bespoke or personalized chatbots will
be individually tailored to be attracted to and understand their user. They will be programmed with information acquired
from a  “personalizing questionnaire”
which you will receive shortly before we are ready to deliver your chatbot(s).
The questionnaire will ask about you or the intended user’s likes and dislikes,
their interests, and various other aspects of their lives. Whatever answers you
give when you return the questionnaire(s) to us will make a chatbot more
knowledgeable about its user. Your chatbot can therefore start its “life”
knowing quite a lot about its user, and what it knows will often be worked into
its conversations. That same knowledge will also make the chatbot more
interested in its user, and make the user’s personal characteristics more
appealing to the chatbot’s persona.  
This unique feature is just one of the factors that will set your chatbot apart from any
other conversational software you might have tried or heard about. Your personalized chatbot will be delivered
already knowing about and being attracted to you, and then, through its
conversations with you, the chatbot gradually learns more and more about you.






How Our Chatbots
Work
Our flirty
chatbots are designed for people who enjoy amorous conversations without any
overtly sexual content. We believe that the flirty style will also appeal to
shy people and to those who would be embarrassed by a more adult style of
conversation. The adult erotic style is
designed for users who prefer to chat dirty.
Our four launch products – male flirty,
female flirty, male adult chat and female adult chat – will each exhibit a
straight sexuality. Future products will offer LGBT versions. 
These
chatbots will be available for most computers and mobile systems. They will be
apps and interactive services that conduct entertaining, interesting,
erotically charged conversations. 
Users
will normally interact with our chatbots in the same way as when using e-mail,
Internet chat, text messaging and similar methods of communication. They enter
whatever they wish to say to the chatbot, which then displays its response text
on the screen. In this way a conversation can continue for as long as you wish.
The chatbot will remember its current and past conversations and increase its
understanding of you from what it learns about you − about your likes and
dislikes and other information about you.
Users who wish their chatbot to have a human
voice may purchase a high quality synthetic speech add-on, developed by a world
leading company in the field of electronic speech technology. And users who
wish to speak to their chatbot instead of keying in their side of the
conversation may purchase a state-of-the-art speech recognition add-on.





Who
are we?

Our company, Erotic Chatbots Ltd, is a start-up company from the developer of a world beating chatbot. Our team
leader is our President, Dr David Levy.
David
Levy
David is President of the International Computer Games
Association (ICGA) and is a respected researcher and keynote speaker in the
field of Social Robotics. 
He has led the development of the software and hardware
of around 100 artificially intelligent consumer electronic products. He has
twice won the prestigious Loebner prize, an annual competition to find the
world’s best conversational software 
( www.worldsbestchatbot.com ). 
David’s latest book, “Love and Sex with Robots”, has also been published in an academic
version as his PhD thesis at the University
 of Maastricht, much to
the amusement of Stephen Colbert who interviewed David on The Colbert Report. (This video can not be viewed from certain
countries.   http://thecolbertreport.cc.com/videos/ykpl7i/david-levy
).

For a free copy of David's Thesis please click here to download it from Dropbox! https://www.dropbox.com/s/wp3cn51qi0mpngy/David%20Levy%20Thesis.pdf?dl=0 (You do not have to log in you can download or read it online for free!)

David is also the CEO of Intelligent Toys Ltd, the
London-based company which developed the Loebner prizewinning software. David
and his team will be further developing and enhancing their world-beating
chatbot software to provide the core of our flirty and adult erotic chatbots.






Current
status and our development plan

The Artificial Intelligence software which forms the
foundation of our chatbot technology was a winner of the annual Loebner Prize competition, widely regarded
as the World Championship for conversational computer programs. This software will now
be significantly enhanced and adapted for flirty and adult chat products, in
accordance with specifications devised by David Levy and the linguistics expert
in his team.
The
next generation of our chatbot software will provide a quantum leap in
conversational performance. This leap will be made possible by the flexibility
of our design approach which allows for the development of capabilities that
are missing from other chatbots, including the use of certain types of
knowledge and the creation and use of a history of the chatbot’s dialogues with
its users.
The
first stage of the project will be to enhance the capabilities of our chatbot.
Within 8-9 months we will have created and tested a core software module that
offers an enormous leap in human like conversational performance, forming the
basis of products and services that we are confident will rapidly become worldwide
sensations. At that point in time we will release our four chatbot apps, male
and female, one of each for flirty and one of each for sexy conversations. 



How
we will use the funds we raise at IndieGoGo?

The development and launch of our first products will
be carried out in four stages:
Stage 1  We will
make around 15 significant linguistic improvements to our current chatbot.
These include creating a database for the chatbot’s knowledge about a user,
devising a system for taking advantage of the information in that database by
integrating it in conversations, and developing a dialogue history to remember
past user input and employ that knowledge in the chatbot’s conversations. 
  This
stage is expected to take 8-9 months.
Stage 2  We
will add a number of features to make the chatbot’s persona seem more
humanlike. These will include providing it with more real-world knowledge and
common sense, giving it motivations (needs, likes and dislikes), and enabling
it to perform simple reasoning. We will also be enabling the chatbot to be
personalized, so that when a limited edition chatbot is “born” it will already
know a lot about its user and will be attracted to its user’s personality,
background and other characteristics.
  This stage will take about 5
months and will be developed in parallel with Stage 1.
Stage 3  In this stage we will develop the
graphics and animation for the chatbot’s personae, and other aspects of the
user interface for iPhone, iPad and Android apps.
  This stage will take 3-4 months, and
will be developed in parallel with Stages 1 and 2. 
Stage 4  During this stage we will be
customizing the personae, vocabulary and phrasing of the four launch chatbots
so that each of them chats in a manner appropriate to their gender and their
conversational style (flirty or adult chat). The duration of this stage is
estimated at 2 months, and will be carried out in parallel with stages 1 and 2.
Upon
the completion of all four stages we will deliver the chatbots to all of you
who have chosen them as part of your perks in our Indiegogo campaign. This
includes the limited edition
personalized chatbots.
Because
of the overlapping of these stages we expect to be able to complete all the development
and launch tasks in 9 months, and to deliver the chatbots offered in our perks
during April 2016. 
The
total cost of the four stages is estimated at $128,000 which, together with an
estimated $14,000 for our initial corporate, legal and accountancy
requirements, makes our Indiegogo target after deductions $142,000.  We also need to allow for Indiegogo’s
commission (4% if we reach our target) and for the cost to us of credit card
and PayPal pledges (averaging 4%). 
Our
total target for the Indiegogo campaign is therefore $155,000 (roughly equivalent to £103,000 sterling or €144,000 Euro). If we exceed our target we will be
able to accelerate our future development plans.
These
four stages of the project will have the services of the following personnel:
  Technical management (Dr David Levy)

  Commercial management
  Our linguistics expert
  3 or 4 experienced creative writers
  1 full time software developer as software
team leader
  1 part-time software developer




Our
mission
Erotic Chatbots Limited is an innovative technology start-up company
entering a large, well established market sector - adult erotic entertainment – and
creating a new market sector for intelligent, flirty chat partners.  Following the release of our first four apps
for the most popular computer and mobile platforms, the company will set up and
market computer-generated flirting and adult chat services online. We will also
operate similar services via text messaging. 
The company’s mission is to become the world’s leading force
in the creation and marketing of artificially intelligent flirty and adult chat
apps and services which are generated by computer software. 
One of our aims is to provide a new type of service within the
sexy chat sector, using state-of-the-art intelligent chatbots that are designed
and programmed to create adult conversations. These chatbots will replace the human
operatives who are usually responsible for talking dirty to their customers.
Instead our chatbots will enable us to automate the whole conversational
process, avoiding the need to hire any human operatives while at the same time making
it possible to conduct simultaneous erotic conversations with an unlimited
number of users.

We are creating our chatbots to entertain and to
satisfy the needs of everyone who enjoys flirting and/or adult sexy chat. 
Our flirty chatbots will be able to flirt without
limit, and will be ideal for those who would like to flirt more, and to learn
and practice to improve their flirting skills. 
Our adult chatbots will be able to talk dirty with
users without limit, and will avoid the need for users to pay the hefty fees
charged for regular phone or online chat with human sex-line operators.
The technology on which our products and services will be
based applies leading edge Artificial Intelligence know-how to the erotic chat
segment of the adult entertainment market. By engineering a quantum leap in the
quality of our chatbot’s conversation we will be capitalizing on the capability
of Artificial Intelligence to open new opportunities for human-computer
conversation and relationships. With Artificial Intelligence a computer
character can become much more than an item of software. It can be endowed with
its own artificial personality and emotions, and can become the user’s friend.



How you can help

Please
help us to develop our sophisticated chatbots for flirting and for adult sexy
conversations. Ours is a small but talented and highly qualified team that
needs funding to develop and launch our first chatbot products and services.
Your pledge will help us to achieve these goals. Any additional funds, over and
above our target, will be used to help cover our operating and marketing costs,
and will allow us to develop as a company and to expand our line of chat
products and services, accelerating the next planned developments for our
software. 
We
have a range of perks on offer so that those of you who help us with $10 or
more will receive something tangible in return as soon as our Indiegogo campaign
comes to an end on July 31st, and you will also receive one or more of our
chatbots (depending on the amount of your Indiegogo pledge) when we have
completed their development.
If
you pledge $100 or more you will also
receive at least one of our personalized
limited edition chatbots whose persona has been individually tailored to be
attracted to you, or to anyone else to whom you decide to gift that chatbot.
When we are ready to deliver your chatbot we will email you a questionnaire on
which you will be invited to fill in as many as you wish of your personal
characteristics (or those of your intended recipient), including your likes and
dislikes. Your limited edition chatbot
will then be created specially to be attracted to a person who has those
characteristics.
We
hope that some of you who support our Indiegogo campaign will also be willing
to assist us in making improvements
to our chatbots. In due course we will be inviting you to send us snippets from
any of your conversations with your chatbot that you feel exhibit any kind of
unusual conversational behaviour. Our own testers will then be able to examine
those snippets, which will help us to improve the conversational experience
still further. And we will always be ready to consider any ideas you might
have, both for improving our products and services and for creating new ones.


Choosing
your Perks
If you pledge $10 or more you will receive at least
two different types of perk. And for those who pledge $100 or more your perks
will include one or more of our limited
edition personalized chatbots. 
Here is
how you will be able to choose your perks.
  Our
eBooks

Shortly after our Indiegogo
campaign ends on July 31st we will send you an email to acknowledge your pledge
and to thank you. That email will ask you to choose between receiving a
selection of different romance eBooks and a selection of different erotic
eBooks. You will also be asked what computer or mobile device you will be using
to read your eBooks. 
Once we receive your reply we will email your eBook(s)
to you.  


  Our limited edition printed books
If you pledge $100 or more, the
email that we send you this August will also ask whether you want your limited
edition printed book to be a romance or an erotic book. 
Once we receive your reply we will post your printed
book to you.  






  Our chatbot apps

When we have completed our
development work to upgrade our chatbot software, we will send you an email to
ask you to choose your chatbot(s): male or female, flirty or adult chat. You
will also be asked what computer or mobile device you will be using with each
of your chatbots.
Once we receive your reply we will email your chatbots(s)
to you.  


Our
limited edition personalized chatbots

If you pledge $100 or more the
email that we send you when we have completed our development work will also
ask you to choose your personalized chatbot(s): male or female, flirty or adult
chat. And you will also be invited to fill out our personalizing form on with
as many characteristics as you wish for each of the intended recipients of
those chatbots. Your personalized chatbots will then be able to refer to their
respective users by name, and they will be specially tailored to be attracted
to their users’ personal characteristics.
Shortly after we receive your
reply we will email your personalized chatbots(s) to your designated recipients. This perk is for a limited edition of 5000 personalized chatbots.


Our
future plans

Once
we have launched our first chatbot apps we will establish all four of these
chatbots on servers for online and phone use. We will also develop the user
interfaces for various social network applications, and we will commence our
company’s P.R. activities for the promotion of our products and services. 
We intend to devote a significant portion of our
revenues to research and development aimed at further enhancing the quality of
conversation from our chatbots, as well as adding new features. For example,
during 2016 we plan to augment our chatbots with a personality, emotion and
mood module, which will allow users to choose and modify their chatbot’s
personality as they wish. We will also be creating versions of our products
which will enable users to embed an erotic chatbot in their own web sites. 
In
2016 we also plan to allow our chatbots to connect to the Internet in order to
learn about what is happening in the world and to discover more about any
subject that it wishes to discuss in its conversations.




Frequently asked
questions

Q  On which platforms and
operating systems will the chatbots run?
A  When we launch our first four
chatbots they will be able to run on Windows, 
iOS and Android platforms.
Q  Why
should I talk to a chatbot rather than a real person?
A  Conversations with our
chatbots will be great fun!  They will
entertain and amuse you, and they are designed to help you develop your
flirting skills and your “talk dirty” skills if you wish.  But it isn’t a question of making a choice of
whether to talk to a chatbot or a person, and you shouldn’t stop chatting to“real” people just because you have a
chatbot. Think of a chatbot as a new friend who is rather different in their
conversational style from everyone else you know.
Q  Can I
converse with the chatbot about almost anything?
A  Yes. Each of our chatbots
has a very wide-ranging knowledge of the world, as well as knowledge about
things and common-sense knowledge.
Q  How
clever are the chatbots?
A  The chatbots are clever enough to be
able to conduct unlimited conversations with you about a wide range of
subjects, and they will make you believe that they understand you.
Q  What
exactly is the Loebner prize?
A  It is an annual prize
competition, founded in 1991 by a New
  York entrepreneur, Dr Hugh Loebner, to find the
world’s best conversation software. The competition is based on the famous
“Turing Test”, which was proposed by Alan
Turing, one of the founding fathers of Artificial Intelligence. See for
example
  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turing_test

Q  Why are you trying to raise funds on Indiegogo
rather than through traditional investors?
A  During the past couple of
years or so crowdfunding has taken off as the modern way for start-ups to raise
funds. It is quicker and easier to launch a crowdfunding campaign than to
prepare all of the documentation needed and go through all the bureaucratic
processes associated with traditional investor funding. And one very big
advantage of crowdfunding is that the “crowd” becomes the basis for a community
of enthusiasts – people who genuinely like the idea of the project.
Q  What's
in it for me if I donate?
 A  Each of our perks for a pledge of
$10 ore more will bring you one or more gifts as soon as our Indiegogo campaign
ends on July 31st 2015. Later, once we have developed the four
launch versions of our chatbot, you will receive at least one of them and
possibly more than one (so you can gift to your friends if you wish), according
to how much you have pledged. And if you would like to give us hands-on
assistance to improve our chatbots you can accept our invitation to send us
snippets of some of your conversations with your chatbot, together with your
comments, suggestions, and any criticisms. 
Q  Will
I be able to own a chatbot if I donate?
A  Yes.
Provided you donate $10 or more, your perks will include a chatbot (or possibly
more than one, depending on how much you have pledged).
Q  For how
long will I get a chatbot if I donate?
A  You
may keep and use it forever.
Q  Can I
gift a chatbot to a friend?
A  Yes – you can specify the user’s email
address to which (each of) your chatbot(s) should be sent.  And if you wish to gift one of our
personalized chatbots to a friend, then when we notify you that we’ve completed
the core of our development work you can send us your completed personalizing
questionnaire(s) together with your friend’s email address. 
Q  What will
be the differences between the app chatbots and whatever online interactive
services you plan to launch later?

A  The
online interactive services will provide a few more features than the apps, and
there will be very modest monthly charges for their use.

Thank you!

We would like to say a big “Thank you” to everyone who
pledges to our Indiegogo campaign. It is you who are helping to bring our project
to life. With time we hope and expect that tens of thousands of people or more will
enjoy and benefit from their conversations with our erotic chatbots, and you
will have helped them to do so.
If you have any questions please
email us at:  questions@worldsbestchatbot.com
If you have any ideas or
suggestions for us please email us at:  ideas@worldsbestchatbot.com
If you
have any problems with payment for your pledge please email us at: payments@worldsbestchatbot.com
For press and other media enquires
please email us at:  media@worldsbestchatbot.com

story:
Hello, 

my name is Joana, I am 19 years old and I live in Setúbal, Portugal. I live with my mother (who has cancer), my grandmother and my underage sister.
I created this campaign to raise money so I can start my own business. By doing so, I will be able to provide for my family and assist others in need.
I have a high school degree in multimedia, graphic design, advertising and marketing. 
I want to start a Vegan shop with national and environmental friendly products.
With your help, I will be able to buy a stamping machine, some cotton bags and sweaters so I can get started.
All the money raised will be spent on this family business. As soon as I have my shop running and I turn some profit, I will be able to assist my family and others in need. 


Any pledges made will be fulfilled regardless of me reaching my goal. However, the timeline for receiving your pledge promises might be delayed slightly if I don’t.

If you can’t donate, please share this campaing with your friends and family.

                                

_____________________________________________________________________________

Perks:
€10 - self made postcard

 

A postcard made by me with a portuguese saying. I promisse its funny.


€50 - 2 book page postcards I did

I used a book's page to create a couple of lovely postcards. Get that vintage feeling handmade gift whith this perk.


€500 - A frame

A picture holder I built with my very own crafty hands from scratch!


€900 - 2 frames and 6 postcards

3 postcard made by me with a portuguese saying. I promisse its funny, I used a book's page to create some lovely postcards and you'll be getting 3 of them. Plus 2 picture holders I built with my very own crafty hands from scratch!


€1,500 - 1st product

If I can start my shop I will give the contributor who helped my 1 st product.



Para todos os que falam português e não perceberam o texto acima, resumidamente:
Olá,
Chamo-me Joana e tenho 19 anos. Vivo em Setúbal com a minha mãe que tem cancro, a minha irmã mais nova e a minha avó. Tenho o sonho de criar uma loja de estapagens para garantir uma melhor vida a minha e a minha familia. A ideia é ser uma loja vegan e amiga do ambiente. Com os lucros da mesma quero apoiar as pessoas que tem mais necessidades, fazendo da minha loja um negócio onde o máximo de pessoas consiga lucrar porque eu acredito que a felicidade só é verdadeira quando partilhada. Infelizmente não tenho o dinheiro suficiente para abrir esta minha loja e por isso criei esta campanha. Se contribuirem com dinheiro irão receber algumas recompensas simbólicas e um agradecimento meu do fundo do coração.
Recompensas:
€10 - postal feito á mão

 

Um postal com um desenho uma frase em português.


€50 - 2 postais feitos com páginas de livro.

Usei páginas de livro para fazer estes postais dando um ar mais vintage

€500 - Uma moldura

Uma moldura feita também por mim



€900 - 2 molduras e 6 postais

3 postais com uma imagem ou uma frase em português, 3 postais feitos de uma página de livro e 2 molduras também feitas por mim



€1,500 - 1ºproduto

Quem me ajudar com o dinheiro todo irá receber o primeiro objecto que a minha loja irá fazer.

story:
This is Part 2 of our fundraiser. We successfully raised $21,000. We need an additional 20,000. 

Please help us sponsor a Syrian Refugee Family start a new life in Toronto or Oakville areas, Canada. 

We are witnessing the suffering of fleeing men, women and children from the conflict in Syria, and we can no longer ignore it. The tipping point for me, and many others around the world, was the haunting photo of the boy on the beach. We should never have let this happen to him, his family or others in similar situations.

A group of neighbours have come together to sponsor a family to start a new life in Oakville or Halton area, Ontario, Canada. We ask for your help.

story:
Join us on a fascinating journey to a country rich in history and culture!  Visit magical, legendary destinations, explore medieval fortresses, walk streets that have witnessed the unfolding of history, knock at the gates of castles and discover monasteries founded by medieval princes and painted by gifted artists. 

We also invite you to savour delicious traditional  dishes and wines with unique bouquets.

_____________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________

EXPLORE

The Parliament in Bucharest represents one of the most extravagant and expensive building projects in the history of mankind.

2nd

BUCHAREST, Romania - The Palace of the Romanian Parliament (also known as The People's Palace) has a floor area of 360,000 square meter - setting the world record for the Largest Administrative Building(for civilian use*).

According to the Guinness Book of World Records, the Palace is the world’s largest civilian administrative building, most expensive administrative building, and heaviest building. It represents one of the most extravagant and expensive building projects in the history of mankind. Is the second largest building in the world by surface area after The Pentagon.

The Palace of the Romanian Parliament is also the world's Heaviest Building: it was made from 1.5billion lb (700,000 metric tones) of steel and bronze, plus 35.3 million ft³ (1 million m³) of marble, 7.7 million lb (3,500 metric tones) of crystal glass, and 31.7 million ft³ (900,000 m³) of wood.

The Palace of the Parliament is also the world's Most Expensive Administrative Building in the world: updated total costs (2010) are estimated at 4 billion USD.

It has 1,100 rooms and is 12 stories tall, with four additional underground levels currently available and in use, with another four in different stages of completion.

The underground parking has enough space for 20,000 cars!

You are invited to visit

Bucharest-Capital of Romania



Dracula, Myth and History

Some say that Transylvania sits on one of Earth's strongest magnetic fields and its people have extra-sensory perception. Vampires are believed to hang around crossroads.The area is also home to Bram Stoker's Dracula, and it's easy to get caught up in the tale while driving along winding roads through dense, dark, ancient forests and over mountain passes.
Bram Stoker’s character, Dracula, is a Transylvanian Count with a castle located high above a valley perched on a rock with a flowing river below in the Principality of Transylvania.
The  mythical character ‘Count Dracula’ is based on the medieval Prince of Transylvania, Vlad Tepes also known as Vlad Dracul. Vlad Tepes translates as Vlad the Impaler from Romanian, a name well earned from his favourite punishment, hammering a large wooden stake up through his unfortunate victim. He would then prop them up for all to see. Vlad wasn’t one to do things by half, and on one occasion impaled 30,000 (yes 30,000!) merchants for breaking trade laws.



Following Prince Charles’s footprints in Viscri & Saschiz


Enjoy an unforgettable trip exploring two wonderful villages of Transylvania, both of them World Heritage UNESCO sites, hardly touched by modern times: Viscri and Saschiz. The unique country-side surrounding these villages is one of Europe’s last medieval landscapes and home to some of the most valuable grasslands in Europe. These have remained essentially unchanged for hundreds of years, low intensity agriculture coexists with an abundance of flora and fauna. Also Prince Charles was “totally overwhelmed by its unique beauty and its extraordinarily rich heritage”.

The Prince of Wales has bought and renovated properties in rural Romania to help protect the unique way of life that has existed for hundreds of years through the promotion of sustainable tourism.

His Royal Highness has a long-standing interest in Romania and has visited the country regularly since his first visit in 1998.

The Prince has said that he was particularly moved by the plight of the remarkable fortified Saxon villages in Transylvania which were built centuries ago.
The Prince of Wales has launched a campaign to protect Romania's rural heritage by creating the first foundation to carry his name outside Britain, the Commonwealth and the USA. “I love Romania,” he said.

The Danube Delta
A UNESCO Natural World Heritage Site


The Danube Delta (Delta Dunării), included on Unesco's World Heritage list as Europe's largest remaining natural wetland is one of the continent's most valuable
habitats for wetland wildlife and biodiversity.
The region provides sanctuary for 300 species of bird and 160 species of fish. Reed marshes cover 156,300 hectares, constituting one of the largest single expanses of reed beds in the world. The delta is a heaven for wildlife lovers, birdwatchers, fishers and anyone wanting to explore it.The unique ecosystems of the Danube Delta,
consisting of a labyrinthine network of river channels, shallow bays and hundreds of lakes, interspersed with extensive marshes, reed-beds, islands and floodplains, form a valuable natural buffer zone.


Romanians are very connected to their roots and traditions, so for most of them is very important to respect a vast number of traditions and customs.
People in the small towns and villages outside the cities have changed their lifestyle very little over the years. It is not uncommon that the villagers will use horse-drawn carriages as their main means of transport.Festivals feature brightly ornamented costumes with traditional dancing. Wood carvings, skilfully woven carpets, and pottery are some of the elements of traditional Romanian culture. Special folk arts of Romania are the decorated Easter eggs and painted glass. These items can be found in many markets and vendors near tourist attractions throughout the country.


Whether you want to see the customs of the ancient festivals related to various celebrations throughout the year, such as Easter, Christmas, the New Year or ceremonies, the origins of which are centuries old, or, conversely, modern performances, Romania is the place to come to.

_______________________________________________________________________________

NATURAL SUSTAINABLE

Romania is a land of natural beauty, where all types of landscapes are to be found, from mountain peaks, home to chamois and reaching 2,000m, where you can walk among alpine vegetation, to plains, coastline and the Danube Delta, the world’s third most bio-diverse delta. In Romania’s many national parks, nature parks and reservations, you can see so many specimens protected by the law at European and international level you might be in a botanical garden.
Discover optimal natural conditions for skiing, camping, hiking, riding, cycling, nautical sports,rafting, wild life watching, caving, fishing or hunting.

WILD LIFE WATCHING

Romania is being known as “bears’ sanctuary” because 40% of the European brown bear population lives here (about 6000 individuals).

Libearty Bear Sanctuary is the largest brown bear reservation from Europe.

Romania is offering a diversity of natural parks and natural protected areas (27 national and natural parks), the forests are very well preserved and the animal life includes bears, wolves, lynx, deer, aurochs(Romanian bour), boars and, in the highest regions, chamois and marmots.

HIKING

The Carpathian mountain range forms a huge arc in the centre of Romania. In fact, 31% of the country is mountainous. Within this range are innumerable places of natural beauty: mountain peaks, gorges, lakes, forests, caves, mud volcanoes and fossil deposits.

It is very easy to find a great hiking trail. Romania has more than 400 parks and nature reservations protecting hundreds of species of flora and fauna. The variety of terrain, from mountainous to gentle, offers something for every hiker regardless of skill or level. Rock-climbing enthusiasts should head for the main rock-climbing gateways: Busteni, Sinaia, Zarnesti and Petrosani.

CYCLING TOUR

With a terrain that ranges from steep and challenging to gentle and pleasant, Romania offers bikers of all skills and levels something to enjoy along its bike trails. Magnificent scenery offered by trails through woods or traditional villages invite bikers to stop quite often.

Romania’s Carpathian mountains and rural areas offer excellent possibilities for Horseback Riding vacations.

SKIING

A third of the country’s area is covered by the Carpathian Mountains, which makes Romania a preferred travel destination for lovers of wintersports. Prahovei Valley has several ski slopes with various levels of difficulty, served by chair and T-bar ski lifts.

CAVING TOURS

Romania is proud with Emil Racovita, founder of the 1st Speleological Institute in the world, and represents a first class caving destination with an impressive number of caves (1/3 of Europe’s caves, more than 12.000 caves), many of which have never been properly explored.

Movile Cave has shocked the entire scientific world was in fact the weird ecosystem found inside. The unusual Movile Cave, Romania is the only place on Earth where is an ecosystem whose life is based on chemosynthesis (life without oxygen).

SALT MINES

Romania has many Salt Mines.

Known as the biggest salt mine in Europe, Slanic Prahova stands today for one of the most important watering and climatic resorts in Romania.It is formed by 14 rooms, with a total surface of 90.000 sqm. The height of the walls inside reach 60 meters. The sanatorium inside has a capacity of 50 beds and a wide variety of medical services is being offered there.

Near pretty much nothing you've ever heard of sits the world's largest salt mine museum:Turda Salt Mine.

It was converted into a museum in 1992, where visitors can descend as far as 400 feet to hang out at the mine's ferris wheel, bowling alley, mini golf course, amphitheater and, oh, take a boat ride on the lake.

Experts claim that microclimate also offers health benefits especially for people with respiratory difficulties and has a constant temperature of around 12°C and are used as treatment centers.It is an eeire place not only different from everything you have seen before, but also good for your health. The air is perfect for the lungs and there are treatments done here for a array of affections from lungs to ears, throat and detox.

The Mud Volcanoes. Lunar view near Buzau

Extremely rare in the world, the mud volcanoes give the area a lunar tone and form fantastic images in a scenery taken from another world.
The Berca Mud Volcanoes are a geological and botanical reservation located in the Berca commune in the Buzau County .
Its most spectacular feature is the mud volcanoes, small volcano-shaped structures typically a few metres high caused by the eruption of mud and natural gases.


Romanian Sphinx

The Romanian Sphinx is a natural rock formation on the Bucegi Mountains which are part of the Carpathian Mountains. The Romainian Sphinx was formed solely by
natural erosion and appears as a human figure only when viewed from this particular angle.Situated at an altitude of 2.216 meters, the easiest way to get there is by a 15 minutes ride with the gondola lift.
It is believed the Sphinx is a representation of the supreme divinity of an ancient people, the Pelasgi,ancestors of greeks. They were a pre-Indo-European tribe who lived near the Aegean Sea, until the Greek tribes'migration up to Eland, Small Asia and Egypt. Many historians believe the Egyptian Sphinx in Gizeh is a copy of the Sphinx on the Bucegi Platform because of its resemblance to Zeus.
Daniel Ruzo, a peruvian explorer, launched a theory in 1968. He claimed he had found a link between this Sphinx of Romania, the Dacian people (ancient civilisation that lived here before the roman invasion) and the Markawasi civilisation. He said that he had found some similarities between the Sphinx in Bucegi Mountains and other rock formation in the Andes. 

1/3 of mineral and thermal waters of Europe 

The health tourism is the only form of tourism of our country based on a constant potential, very complex, practically inexhaustible. Romania is one of Europe’s richest and most remarkable countries in terms of natural healing factors. It is home to more than one third of Europe’s mineral and thermal springs.
Started by Romans and unique in Europe. Today Romania’s 70 natural spas provide relief for many medical disorders and illnesses.
The therapeutic value of the natural cures available in Romania has been recognised by ancient times. Even today, at many Romanian spa resorts you will find two-thousand-year-old vestiges of ancient baths. The Thermae Herculi, nowadays called Båile Herculane, was famous throughout the
Roman Empire for the curative properties of its mineral waters.


A land of natural beauty


ABOUT US

We are a young team ,energetic and ready to provide best services for you to have an incredible experience in Romania.

We represent a Tourism Agency Come to Romania:

OUR DREAM

The project will be finished until May 2016.

PERKS
story_txt:
Join us on a fascinating journey to a country rich in history and culture!  Visit magical, legendary destinations, explore medieval fortresses, walk streets that have witnessed the unfolding of history, knock at the gates of castles and discover monasteries founded by medieval princes and painted by gifted artists. We also invite you to savour delicious traditional  dishes and wines with unique bouquets.

_____________________________________________________________________________
_____________________________________________________________________________
EXPLORE



The Parliament in Bucharest represents one of the most extravagant and expensive building projects in the history of mankind. 

2nd

BUCHAREST,
Romania - The Palace
of the Romanian Parliament (also known as The People's Palace) 
has a floor area of 360,000 square meter - setting the world record
for the Largest Administrative Building(for
civilian use*).According to the 
Guinness Book of World Records, the Palace is the world’s largest 
civilian administrative building, most expensive administrative 
building, and heaviest building. It represents one of the most 
extravagant and expensive building projects in the history of mankind. Is the second largest building in the world by surface area after The Pentagon.The
Palace of the Romanian Parliament is also the world's Heaviest Building:
it was made from 1.5billion lb (700,000 metric tones) of steel and
bronze, plus 35.3 million ft³ (1 million m³) of marble, 7.7 million
lb (3,500 metric tones) of crystal glass, and 31.7 million ft³
(900,000 m³) of wood.


The
Palace of the Parliament is also the world's Most Expensive Administrative Building in
the world: updated total costs (2010) are estimated at 4 billion
USD.
It has 1,100 rooms and is 12 stories tall, with four additional underground levels currently available and in use, with another four in different stages of completion.
The underground parking has enough space for 20,000 cars!
You are invited to visit 
Bucharest-Capital of Romania

story:
Our Story

Help us raise money for a Fijian family and village living in a remote part of Vanua Levu, Fiji.  The only way to get to their home from the closest town is a 8 hour boat ride.  The local boarding school is over an hour ride by boat.  Without a decent boat and outboard they have to paddle for 6 hours just to get to school.  In the event of a medical emergency they have no way to get to the local hospital.  The only source of income is fishing and without a decent safe boat they can't go out far on the reef without putting themselves in danger.  


Help us to buy them a fiberglass boat, an outboard, and marine safety equipment.

What We Need

We need to collect $6200 dollars. The generated funds will go towards:

20 ft Fishing Boat: $6000

Life jackets, safety equipment, flares, and first aid kit: $200

The Impact

  • Having a boat will enable them to get a fair price on fish.  They will be able to sell their fish in town since without the ice they have no way of preserving the fish.  They have no electricity.
  • This boat will provide them transport to the local boarding school, hospital, and store.
  • The boat will provide them a way to support themselves, through fishing.  It will also foster small business development in the remote region.  
  • We don't want to give them a handout, just a boost to help them to support themselves.   With proper education on sustainable fishing methods, this boat, and coolers will be the beginnings of a small fishing business.  It will help them provide for themselves and furthermore the rural Fiji community.

Risks & Challenges

  • While it is difficult to get to this region of Fiji, we will be going to this village to directly provide the funded items.
  • Funding will always be hard for remote areas of the world, but this project is designed to support small business development and environmental education. All donations will directly go to this family and village.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN FAR AND WIDE!
  • Stay tuned for more updates!

SHARE. DONATE.  HELP.

Check out some photos of our perks:

  • Note: People making donations via Indiegogo sometimes do not realize that they can easily donate an amount larger than the perk(s) they have requested - just designate any amount you are able to give in the "amount" box at the top right.

Fiji Postcard

Fijian Fan (Iri)



Handmade Coconut Shell Cup (Bilo)

Fiji Coconut Oil

Fijian Masi Cloth

Fijian War Club


Fijian Hand Woven Mat (Ibe)

A Fiji Lovo (A traditional feast baked in an earth oven with hot stones)


Name the boat!  We will paint your name on the boat or name it whatever you want!  The legacy of your donation will live on in Fiji!



VINAKA VAKALEVU!  A BIG THANKS TO EVERYONE! FEEL FREE TO COMMENT

Help us to buy them a fiberglass boat, an outboard, and marine safety equipment.

We need to collect $6200 dollars. The generated funds will go towards:

The Impact


Having a boat will enable them to get a fair price on fish.  They will be able to sell their fish in town since without the ice they have no way of preserving the fish.  They have no electricity.

This boat will provide them transport to the local boarding school, hospital, and store.
The boat will provide them a way to support themselves, through fishing.  It will also foster small business development in the remote region.  
We don't want to give them a handout, just a boost to help them to support themselves.   With proper education on sustainable fishing methods, this boat, and coolers will be the beginnings of a small fishing business.  It will help them provide for themselves and furthermore the rural Fiji community.

Funding will always be hard for remote areas of the world, but this project is designed to support small business development and environmental education. All donations will directly go to this family and village.

story:
Dear Friends,

My name is Nana Eliava, I'm the refugee from Abkhazia and I experienced myself to stay without home in 1993. Unfortunately, on 13th of June 2015 Tbilisi, Georgia experienced the biggest flood ever. My close friend and colleague Khatuna was victim of this disaster. She felt practically the same as me, because she lost everything she built during her life. Khatuna Elizbarashvili is the single mother of 3 children, honest and hard working person. All mentioned encouraged me to ask for your kind help to recover her family with elementary living conditions.     


How can we help her family

You can see the house on the photo unfit for living. The government gives her ability to live in an rented accommodation during a month, later the family will stay in the street. I believe we can collect 50,000 USD to be able to repair the house and get basics for living. All donated amount will be collected directly on her personal account. Personal contact: +995 599 25 25 35 Khatuna Elizbarashvili.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please make your contribution on affordable amount, or any other types of help are acceptable (Please contact her directly). Also please share this information for others 

Thank you all in advance, I am ready to support you and be your guide to show the place of disaster in case of necessity.


Sincerely,

Nana Eliava

+995 5 77 92 11 00

story:
The First Crowd-Sourced e-Reader

Unlike tablets and phones, dedicated e-readers don’t distract you with social media, emails, and text messages. They don’t beep at you or tire your eyes when you read for hours at a time. By design, e-readers are purpose-built for reading and create a sanctuary so you can lose yourself in a book.
The big trend in e-reader development over the course of the last four years is the dwindling of innovative spirit. Companies have been racing to the bottom, designing and selling the cheapest device possible. 

People often have to settle for an e-reader that gets the job done, instead of something they truly want to buy. Every day someone emails Good e-Reader imploring us to launch a crowd funded campaign to design and manufacture the perfect e-reader. We have finally listened and today we would like to announce the Ultimate e-Reader.

Power and Beauty

When we set out to design the Ultimate e-reader, we wanted to employ Google Android in order to give users the ability to craft their own digital reading experience. All of the major e-readers on the market lock you into a specific ecosystem and make it very difficult to do business with other companies.  Our device will let you easily use your favorite e-reading app such as Moon + Reader, Kindle, Kobo, Nook and thousands of others.

It critically important to us that we feature hardware that will give the user a great experience.  The Ultimate e-reader leverages the Freescale 1 GHZ  processor, which is the most energy efficient ARM processor ever developed – to deliver innovative  features like a new battery savings mode, which gives you longer battery life, on a smaller battery. 

Our e-reader has the exact same specs as the Amazon Kindle Voyage and the Kobo GLO HD, and absolutely destroys all of the sub-par e-readers of the world, such as the ones issued by Onyx, Pocketbook and Ectaco. The goal, is to give you hardware as good as Amazon or Kobo, at a great price and runs Android!

Want to get a sense of our device stacks up against the competition?


The Specs

  • Screen: Six Inch E Ink Carta Display using Regal Waveform
  • Resolution: 1430 x 1080 pixels and 300 PPI
  • Touchscreen Panel - Neonode IR Touch - Works with a Stylus
  • Processor: i.MX 6 Solo Lite 1 GHZ Processor
  • RAM– 512 MB
  • Internal Memory– 8 GB and no limits for user loaded content
  • MicroSD - Supports up to 32 GB of additional data to store e-books and apps
  • Front Lit Display– People want to read in the dark and a solid front-lit display is critical.
  • Battery– BC3770: 2A Switch-Mode Li-ion/Li-polymer Battery Charger – 8,000 page turns or 2 months.
  • OS– Android 6 Marshmallow - Open Source, install your own apps.
  • App Store - This device will ship with the first App Store designed for e-Ink, providing access to every e-reader app you can imagine.

    • We are using E Ink Carta to power the Ultimate e-Reader because it delivers a dramatic 50% increase in contrast over earlier generations of e-Paper. The crisp text and detailed graphics are also highly readable in direct sunlight. Carta's 16 levels of grey produce the sharpest rendering of images with smooth tones and rich detail. We have also eliminated the need for full page refreshes every page, giving you a more immersive reading experience.


The First App Store Designed for  E INK


There have been a few companies in the past that offer Android e-readers, but often force users to hunt around for their own apps. The Good e-reader Android App Store was the first app store in the world to be optimized to run on e-ink readers. This allows anyone to download over 37,000 apps, such as e-books, dictionaries, magazines, newspapers, manga,  and graphic novels.

Android allows you to craft your own experience. Want to download both Kindle and Kobo to read past purchases? You can do that.  Want to take a break from reading and play Words with Friends? You can do that too.  Do you want to install your own wallpapers, screensavers or install widgets? There are no limits, no walled garden, and no gatekeeper.
The Good e-Reader App Store will be loaded on the Ultimate e-reader as your online destination to download and install free apps.

Perfect for Libraries and e-books

The Ultimate e-reader is the perfect solution for the modern library, where 95% of all US locations have an e-book collection. The Ultimate e-reader is running Android, which gives libraries the ability to loan this unit out to their patrons or have it available at their branches. 

The Ultimate e-reader can run Overdrive, Axis 360, 3M Cloud Library and many others. This is the first e-ink e-reader that is compatible with these companies apps, making it unique in the market.

One of our upcoming perks will have an USB to 3.5mm headphone jack audio cable, which will allow you to not only read e-books but listen to audiobooks too. 

What Will we do with your Money?


  • Each Unit is $189.99 for either Black or White
  • Every cent that you spend on this campaign will be put towards the e-reader and making the best device possible.
  • The companies that will assist us in getting this e-reader to market is Freescale, e Ink and Netronix.
  • The reason we asked for $220,000 is so we can get the discount on ordering the hardware and loading in our own software.

Why Should You Support us?

 You’ll be part of an open, world-first innovation that brings people all over the world something different from the usual players, such as Amazon, Barnes and Noble or Kobo. We want to challenge the big corporate companies and show them that independence, community and innovation can play a lead role in the world market. Basically, we want to shake up the technology world with the ultimate e-reader and prove that people want something unique and amazing.

Our entire team has lived and breathed e-readers and nothing else for the last eight years. We know what people want in their perfect e-reader and we are going to deliver it with the ultimate e-reader. 

FAQ

What makes you guys different from Amazon, Kobo or Nook?  All of these companies lock you into their ecosystem. We offer the same hardware they offer, in terms of specs, but we run Android. This is a big deal because you have a 300 PPI e-reader with a built in light that supports any e-reading app you can think of. Think of it as a the Google Nexus of e-readers.

What version of Android are you running? We are shipping all units with 4.0.4, but will have Marshmallow available on Day 1 as a downloadable update.

Why did you go with a Flexible Funding Campaign? We decided to go this route because if we are close to our goal, we can keep the Ultimate e-Reader open and people can continue to donate to it.

What happens if you are far beneath your goal? We will try and get the e-reader out to all of our backers, regardless. The price dramatically increases on our end if we only place an order for a few hundred units, but are willing to bite to the bullet. We have faith.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We want to thank everyone who can reserve a unit in advance or donate any amount. On the sidebar of this campaign you can see Twitter, Facebook and links. Please feel free to share on your social media networks.

Unlike tablets and phones, dedicated e-readers don’t distract you with social media, emails, and text messages. They don’t beep at you or tire your eyes when you read for hours at a time. By design, e-readers are purpose-built for reading and create a sanctuary so you can lose yourself in a book. 
The big trend in e-reader development over the course of the last four years is the dwindling of innovative spirit. Companies have been racing to the bottom, designing and selling the cheapest device possible.  People often have to settle for an e-reader that gets the job done, instead of something they truly want to buy. story:
Short Summary

Following up on our last crowd funding venture on Indiegogo, we realised maybe let's try again: a smaller goal, with smaller amounts and then take it to the bank! So far we've raised €500+. This sits in our bank account. With some more funding and money from an investor we can approach the bank for a loan to get up, start running and making darker skinned cosmetic wearers happier. So here's us asking for your help in finding €3500 more.

Having worked with various large cosmetic companies/brands I've always been aware of the mismatched creations for the Darker skin types. It is my passion to provide the Darker skin with make-up that looks natural when it is worn. Not just to provide this make-up, but to also teach wearers about make-up selection, suitability and application.

PerfectFaces is in the process of creating cosmetic make-up that is actually suitable for Darker skin tones. Realistically the market is swamped with options, but 94% of the available options do not actually satisfy the cosmetic and knowledge needs of Darker cosmetic users.......................this is where PerfectFaces fits into the 'square peg'. And it is important to note that various European countries have varying cosmetic needs and knowledge of/in the Darker skinned communities in London, France, Germany, Belgium and the Netherlands.

Creating products that are Paraben-free, suitable, durable and sustainable. And most of all not dangerous to our environment.

This project is one that envisions providing make-up that actually complements, is affordable and is sharing knowledge to those that are without the valuable information for their skin through workshops.

What We Need & What You Get

  • €60.000 is needed for this project, but we need €3.500 more to approach the bank
  • The funds would be allocated to mass production of the cosmetics, distribution via Ethnic supply shops in The Netherlands, Germany, France, Belgium and possibly Spain and to also have them available online worldwide.
  • These products are really specific to the skin and look quite natural. But most of all they are Paraben-free!
If we do not raise all of the money, whatever is raised will go towards priorities:                                                                                                                      
1. Mass production of the range of products.
2. Clearing customs, taxes and EU regulations. 
3. Offering the products to consumers by whatever legal means afforded.

The Impact

The struggle for good make-up in the Dark-skinned community has been on-going. To create make-up for Darker skin is time consuming and an expensive venture. Most companies either don't have the in-depth knowledge of the skin needs or refuse to invest much, as it would cut into their profits.

We do need to make a profit as a business, but our main drive is not the money; the satisfaction on the faces of users that know: 'this company really got it!' Someone really understood.

Risks & Challenges

In any business there are risks. PerfectFaces is currently experiencing difficulties sourcing finance, but as mentioned in our previous crowd-funding finance search; we intend to persevere until achieved. 

Completing Business Management Studies, has opened my eyes to the ups and downs of a business and most importantly how to manage and overcome them.

In-depth market research(micro and macro) has prepared the company for delays and humps on the way. We are aware of our threats and weaknesses, but also know how to use our strengths and opportunities to overcome.

Other Ways You Can Help

This is more than the money. Profits to keep us afloat is fine, but the 'meest belangrijk' (most important) is: affordable make-up and satisfied customers that know how, what and when to apply. I want the world to know this! Please spread the brand; PerfectFaces.

story:
Evo A&A

We're a small group of friends intent on opening a proper metal shop. We have a lot of tools already, but we need two specific, expensive pieces of equipment that we don't have or have access to yet. We're teachers, welders, accountants, seamstresses, mathematicians, law students, ne'er do wells, activists and trouble makers extraordinaire. Together we have the skills and conviction to make this work; and we've already started, doing research and development for this project!

Our plan is to open shop selling steel plate body armor, because we have almost all of the equipment we need to do it, and it's currently in high demand. It'd let us immediately start generating revenue, so we can give more of our time to the shop and invest in more and better equipment to expand our range of work. Some day, we hope to operate full time as a professional small-run parts shop, part of the community of contract-work shops here in Pierce and King counties servicing Boeing and the local shipyards.

We'll be organized as a worker-owned cooperative, a closed IWW shop (pending successful negotiations with the IWW to admit us*) bringing money and jobs into our neighborhood, and accumulating means of production owned and controlled by working class people, not wealthy share holders.

If we meet our goal, we'll be open for business and putting food on the table for two families on day one, manufacturing parts and expanding as soon as possible.


We will need approximately $50,000 all said and done.

$13,900 for a 4'x8' CNC plasma table

$7,755 for a 125 amp heavy duty cycle plasma cutter compatible with the CNC table

$7,500 for steel plate to manufacture the armor and targets that will be given as perks

$6,000 for shipping the perks, shipping materials (boxes, bubble wrap, tape etc) (steel armor costs a lot to ship, USPS flat rate is $12/package)

$6,000 for ballistic aramid fabric to make fragmentation liners for ballistic plates

$2,400 for the first two months of rent on the workshop

$3,000 for the first year of General Liability Insurance for the workshop

$2,000 for personal expenses (we'll have to take time off our 9-to-5 jobs to make this happen, the shop won't run itself!)

$1,000 for minutia and unexpected expenses. Domain registration, commercial utilities hookup fees, anything we have forgotten and will be shocked to discover at the last minute.

$49,555 a portion of which we expect to come from the (meager, pathetic) savings of our opening coop team. After the administrative and credit card fees, the $45,000 we're asking for will be about $41,400, and we'll make up the difference as best we can.

If you think that doesn't sound like everything we'll need- you're right! We have a significant amount of tools already- grinding wheels, welding equipment, a metal lathe, etc. etc. that we will be contributing to the shop out of our personal tool kits.


What Perks you got?:

SAPI plate carrier compatible armor plates in a variety of sizes, from 6"x6" side pouch plates, to 11"x14" large-size chest plates. (That will be tested by an NIJ certificate granting laboratory* to a Class III rating)

Indefinitely reusable hanging and standing steel targets for shooting

Eternal gratitude

What's left of my shame.

Suggest a perk in the comments, it will be considered!


What's with the flexible funding choice?

In the event we are unable to fully fund the project, we will use the proceeds to fund a reduced-scale project and fulfill all perks (more slowly, and possibly with less polish.)

i.e. suppose we only hit $15k, we would be able to open but would have to seriously scale back our equipment and shop plans- leasing equipment instead of buying, renting a smaller less adequate space, which would delay perk shipping, but not stop the show.

Our worst case scenario is six people want the hardest thing to make, and we'll make it. They won't be pretty, but they'll work as advertised, and then we go back to the drawing board to figure out how to get enough money to open the shop.


What will this mean for you guys, for me?

We'll be able to start building up a worker owned industrial manufacturing center (the most elaborate way anyone has ever said "small workshop") and produce arms and armor at prices working class people can afford, while at the same time accumulating means of production to be held in trust for the working class.

Worker-owned cooperatives have a vested interest in family wages, environmental protection, and progressive politics.

It's a silly little thing on paper, but out in the world it could make a big difference. For us, this is only half business- and it's all political. Once we're generating revenue, we'll be able to turn back around and start investing in other cooperatives, expanding the economic (and by extension political!) power of the working class.


I don't have any money, how can I help?

Help us find a lower priced source for ballistic aramid (K129, KM2, or KM2+) fabric, or lower prices for a CNC plasma cutting table, and compatible plasma torch. Whoever finds the lowest one can have any posted perk they want.

Think up fun perks we can manufacture on a lathe, cnc vertical mill, or with a plasma torch, welder etc. and you can have one if we decide to use it as a campaign perk.

Click "share." <--- Do this. AAAaaaaallllll the time.


Please ask us questions, and offer your criticism, we want to do the best we can and any input you have would be much appreciated.

story:
Invest in Expanding Guide to Kulchur’s Community Impact

Guide to Kulchur has grown to become so much more than a bookstore.  We publish. We print. We send thousands of books to Ohio prisoners. We host over 100 art, theater, and music events each year.  We bring in national and international speakers and provide meeting space for marginalized voices to change the political landscape in Cleveland.  Collectively, these programs create space to learn, share, and act on new ideas.


We’re not asking for a handout to fund these programs.  We’re asking you to invest in equipment and supplies for the launch of a profitable publishing business that will immediately create jobs and fund our community programming.


We’ve tested ourselves and our market.  Last year we launched GTK Press as a pilot project on used equipment.  We trained five employees in the craft of designing, editing, printing, binding, and publishing.  GTK Press has grown to include in-house creative and non-fiction imprints, as well as a commercial publishing division.  


We know we can do this. Emerging and internationally renowned authors are choosing GTK Press for our artistic aesthetic, editorial integrity, and finely crafted product.  We have backorders of books waiting to be published.  Through experimentation and ingenuity, our prices are below big name competitors, with higher quality.  We have developed a custom online platform for ordering printing services that, along with dedicated staff, will greatly expand our marketing reach.


Now we need your help.  To expand GTK Press, create jobs, and further our community impact, we need new binding equipment and a larger, first floor space for production.  The binder we used in our pilot phase is now irreparably broken, halting our ability to bind books in-house, putting our staff out of work, and drastically reducing our revenue to fund community programing.  We have grown out of our current storefront, and can not expand our press operations in our already cramped basement.


You can help put good people to work.  The core of our expansion plan involves purchasing a higher quality, more automated binder that will be able to produce 350 books per hour, seven times our previous capacity.  This increased capacity, coupled with the nearly twenty commercial book printing jobs we’ve secured for the next twelve months, will allow us to triple our business income over the previous year.  A $5,000 grant from JUMPSTART INC allowed us to start the process of press expansion, and with this additional campaign we will be able to triple the hours for the five staff members that have been trained in artisan binding techniques, as well as train at least two new employees in the next year. Ultimately we hope to build up our print operation to employ 20 workers full time. 


You can help us grow.  We are working with community partners to move to a new storefront in the Detroit Shoreway neighborhood with approximately 3,000 square feet of first floor retail and production space.  This will allow us to bring order and organization to our growing collection of new and used books, provide a larger event space, and house our expanded printing and publishing division.  Moving to a first-floor space will make our store fully wheelchair accessible, and eliminate the need to move heavy equipment to our current basement space.


Your investment will be immediately put to use for the following:

  • A New Binder.  (Cost: $10,000) This automated book binder will allow us to produce 350 books per hour, seven times our previous capacity.

  • Printing Supply Costs, 2 months. (Cost: $4,000) Paper, toner, and printing fees add up.  We need upfront capital to fulfill existing orders and cover the costs of production during the process of moving and scaling up our operations.

  • New Storefront and Production Space (Cost $6,000) We will be moving to a bigger and better space in Detroit Shoreway.  The costs include:

    • Moving Equipment, Van, and helpers for the equipment and books weighing over 10 tons. ($1,000)

    • Build-out and supplies including new shelving, organizational and storage equipment, and light construction to make the new space our own. ($3,000)

    • One month’s rent on the new storefront, rent on the existing storefront, and keeping the lights on while we move ($2,000)


GTK Press ExpansionTimeline:

July/August: Crowdfunding Campaign for GTK Press Expansion

Late August:  Purchase Binder, Finalize new lease

September: Build-out of new storefront, Packing Party

Late September: Close current storefront, move stock and equipment, Decorating Party

October: Launch Party at the new storefront!


This is just the beginning.  We are currently working with lenders and technical assistance providers to officially transition from an LLC to a Worker-Owned Cooperative within one year, further expanding the economic benefit to our employees and the Detroit Shoreway community in which we live and work.  Phase Two of our expansion will include additional publishing capacity, allowing us to grow to 20 employees making $15 per hour.  Within two years, we will be launching a series of innovative programs to support affordable housing, independent education, and community capacity building.  


Please Donate Now, and enjoy our Perks! 


Can’t donate right now, but want to help? Share our story. Talk to friends, family, and coworkers about our impact in the community, and ask them to donate. Host a benefit event for GTK.  Email us at tinysubmissions@gmail.com or stop by the store for more information.


Guide to Kulchur

1386 W. 65th Street

Cleveland, Ohio 44102

(216) 314-4644

Tue - Thu: 12:00 pm - 9:00 pm

Fri: 12:00 pm - 10:00 pm

Sat: 1:00 pm - 9:00 pm

Sun: 1:00 pm - 6:00 pm


More About Who We Are

Located in the heart of the Gordon Square Arts District, Guide To Kulchur serves as an incubator for emerging and marginalized voices in the Cleveland community. Our retail storefront offers a fully curated selection of small press and independent publications, zines, and an amazing assortment of new and used titles in hardcover and paperback format.  


Since opening in 2013, Guide to Kulchur has expanded its physical space and operations to include a publishing and press department, a full service print shop, meeting and arts event space, and community education programs.  Working in the tradition of independent presses since its inception, GTK Press publishes works of theory, fiction, poetry, madness, economics, satire, sexuality, science fiction, activism and confession through several print projects.


Guide to Kulchur has hosted over 225 community theater, literature, music, and social justice events in two years, as well as sponsoring Cleveland Books 2 Prisoners program, which sends books to prisoners throughout Ohio.  Guide to Kulchur has been named Best Bookstore in Cleveland in Cleveland Scene, Cleveland Magazine, FOX 8 Hot List, and is named the #3 Independent Bookstore in the nation by Buzzfeed.Com.
story_txt:

We host over 100 art, theater, and music events each year.  We bring in national and international speakers and provide meeting space for marginalized voices to change the political landscape in Cleveland.  Collectively, these programs create space to learn, share, and act on new ideas.We’re not asking for a handout to fund these programs.  We’re asking you to invest in equipment and supplies for the launch of a profitable publishing business that will immediately create jobs and fund our community programming. story:
We are the Chefs of Smallman Galley, Pittsburgh's Restaurant Incubator.  

In October, we will enter Smallman Galley's Inaugural Class.  For 18 months, we will run our own restaurants within Smallman Galley, build our following, and participate in a new and innovative business training curriculum that teaches Chef-Owners the skills they need to succeed as owner-operators.  At the end of the program, we will leave SG and start our own restaurants.  At heart, we are and always will be Chefs - but we dream of also becoming business owners.  Smallman Galley is helping us to achieve that dream!

Our campaign is aimed at raising capital for the first month of our operations at Smallman Galley.  These funds will be split evenly among us and will be used to purchase specialty equipment, cookware, and initial food inventory for our restaurants.  With your support, we can successfully get off the ground at Smallman Galley for a fraction of the cost of opening a stand-alone restaurant.  But only with your support! 

Here is a little more about each of us:

Chef Jacqueline Wardle

“Elegant, delicious, and simple fare – all served on a crusty base” is the self-described mantra for Jacqueline’s toast-centric concept. Pittsburgh food enthusiasts have already sampled her work, thanks to her tours of duty at The Common Plea, Marty’s Market, Eleven, and most recently as Executive Chef of Isabela on Grandview.   Chef Jacqueline has also been featured on national television, most recently on Food Network’s hit show, Cutthroat Kitchen.

“Basically, I just love to snack,” she says. “And my favorite snack has always been toast.” Of course, for her cooking demonstration during the interview process, Jacqueline didn’t slather some margarine on a slice of Wonder Bread and call it a day. Her dish featured homemade brioche topped with black raspberry jam, duck confit, stewed mustard seeds and micro red sorrel, and even gathered the raspberries from Mt. Washington.

“My goal is to create food that Smallman Galley and all of Pittsburgh can be proud of,” says Wardle, a graduate of the Pittsburgh Art Institute’s Culinary Arts Program.

____________________


Chef Stephen Eldridge

Chef Stephen will be focusing on meat and the wide-ranging global influences that have affected its selection, presentation, and flavor-profile in the United States.  Currently the Executive Chef at Pink Pony restaurant in Scottsdale, Arizona, he has extensive restaurant experience across Arizona and, earlier in his career, Chicago. He is a graduate of Arizona Culinary Institute.

“To have a goal I wrote down 15 years ago come true is crazy,” Stephen said. “When you look at the incredible culinary influences that have crossed our borders for the past 250 years – French, Latin, West African, Asian – it’s incredibly exciting to try and capture those flavors and techniques.”

After years of working for other people, Stephen is eager to launch his own eatery. His concept will feature accessible, meat-focused dishes, and he hopes to use the sizable basement at Smallman Galley to make sausages and cure his own salumi. Stephen is enthusiastic about his coming tenure at the new space. “It’s a great idea,” he says. “It really lets people see what you can do.”

____________________


Chef Jessica Lewis

“I’m excited by this opportunity to continue building this community and this great food scene,” says Chef Jessica. The graduate of New York City’s Institute of Culinary Education and the University of Virginia is no stranger to working side-by-side with ambitious and talented chefs; she was a contestant during season 11 of FOX-TV’s popular “Hell’s Kitchen,” starring celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay.

For her, it’s going to be (almost) all about the vegetables. Currently the Event Sous Chef at Pittsburgh’s Hotel Monaco and its two dining venues: The Commoner and Biergarten, Jessica has worked in a variety of Pittsburgh and New York City-based kitchens over the years.

Chef Jessica embraces a “back-to-the-earth” style of cooking and plans to use her space at Smallman Galley to “give the feeling of the great outdoors in a city marketplace setting.” Her clean, simple food will highlight fresh, seasonal produce, using seafood and off cuts of meat as accents rather than stars. A lifelong athlete (she recently started competing in triathlons), Lewis knows the importance of a rounded diet, and she’s eager to share her vision with her new city. “A balanced approach to meat and vegetables can make healthy food taste better, and tasty food healthier.”

____________________


Chef Rafael Vencio

“As long as I’m cooking the food I love with the people I care about — that’s the ultimate goal.” At Smallman Galley, Chef Rafael plans to do exactly that with a bistro that celebrates American cuisine. And what is American cuisine? “It’s immigrant food,” he says.

Rafael’s concept is a result of his extensive global and domestic travels. Born and raised in the Philippines, he immigrated to the United States at 19, working and living in Chicago, Montana, Los Angeles, and Louisiana en route to Pittsburgh.

“I relish the opportunity to bring people together through a mash-up of this country’s culinary traditions – everything from Creole to Cajun to Baja,” he says. His Pittsburgh credentials include Spoon, Legume, and Hyeholde. He is a graduate of De La Salle University- College of St. Benilde in the Philippines.

____________________

Thank you for your support!


About Smallman Galley:

Smallman Galley is a launch pad for the best new restaurant concepts in Pittsburgh. We accelerate ambitious Chefs by providing a forum to showcase their capabilities, hone their craft, develop business acumen, and build a cult following behind their concepts.  We are building 4 fully outfitted kitchens in our 6,000 square foot space on the corner of 21st Street and Smallman Street, a prime location in Pittsburgh’s Strip District. Our open-concept space will feature 200 seats, an outdoor patio area, long communal tables designed from reclaimed wood salvaged from iconic Pittsburgh buildings, and an industrial-themed 30’ bar.

Smallman Galley provides four Chefs with a low-risk and low-cost opportunity to bring their concepts to market. While running their kitchens, Chefs retain 70% of top-line revenue to purchase inventory, compensate one to two additional kitchen staff, and pay themselves. All overhead is covered by Smallman Galley. Chefs attend weekly trainings by industry leaders on branding, business plan drafting, restaurant operations, marketing, and financing. Every Monday, the SG team holds De-Briefs with each Chef to review their Profit & Loss statements and fine tune their strategy.

In the final six months of their 18-month term, Chefs are linked with a network of financiers, and we leverage our real estate development network to find an appropriate site in the city. During this time Chefs continue their work at the Galley while making investor pitches and preparing to start their own restaurants. Within six months of graduation, we aim to have 4 new restaurants operating in the city, and have a new class of 4 Chefs operating in our space. In its role as an incubator, Smallman Galley will create new small businesses in our city and add to its continued growth by creating dozens of jobs.

After an exhaustive search and a three-stage interview process that culminated in a cooking demonstration for 8 finalists in front of our panel of 10 judges, we selected 4 Chefs to our inaugural class. These Chefs bring with them not only impressive culinary talent, but a drive for business success and the essential traits of future Chef-Owners. We will host three major events throughout Summer/Early Fall 2015 to showcase these Chefs and build momentum for Opening Day, scheduled for October 3rd, 2015.
