story:
My 4th baby, little Luna Joy was born May 15th and decided to enter this world in a wild and unexpected way.  Because of this adventure she and I spent over 2 weeks in the NICU, and once discharged my job has become taking lovely Luna to her different doctors appointments and making sure she gets to all of her different therapies each week.

I am also striving to create a normal feeling summer for my other 3 little ones.

I am so over joyed that Luna is doing incredibly well after all that she has gone through, but I never expected to be out of work for the summer.  As I was self employed and the sole bread winner for my little family, I have had nothing much to fall back upon financially.  

I have sold my organic, vegan, allergy free lacto fermented veggie combinations for years, and now I am going to use those sales to fund my family's ability to make it through July, August and September.  If I sell my goal I will be able to pay for all of our bills for those three months.

I am enrolled  in school full time as of September 21st, and will be a full time student and mom for the next  5 years while I achieve my Masters and become an Occupational Therapist. 

I know I would not have the same drive, the same force behind me to get myself moving and creating a new career and life for myself and my children if my Luna Joy had not entered our lives in such a wild way.

Please help me succeed with my goal by purchasing yummy fermented food if you are local, or by sharing our story!  Be good to your tummy and order tasty cultured treats today! 

We love you Luna Joy!  Life with you is going to be amazing.  :)

story:
Hello,

Please allow us to introduce ourselves. We are a group of friends from various places around the world. We have a dream: To create a true social community that really takes care of its members. A social community that relies on its members in its decision making. One that grows alongside each and every member. We know that many have had a similar dream. They have tried but in the end they have only created clones of other social networks and eventually faded away.

We hope you will take some time to read about our project and learn how our vision is unique. This is a rare opportunity to experience the warmth and kinship of being a part of a true community that sincerely cares for you: safety, childer protection, easy sharing, medical health, augmented reality.  Come join us on this incredible journey as we push the limits of social networking. Together, we can build something the world has never seen before. We couldn't do what we do without your support!  We are looking towards the future, with you on board.  Simply put: We want you on our team!


  • The Plan
  • Keyfeatures
  • Timeline
  • How we spend the money
  • Questions and Answers


THE PLAN


One Virtual Community for all facets of your life.

A professional account that keeps your employers, employees, colleagues, and customers informed without allowing them access to what you are sharing with friends and family.

Are you a gamer? Do you have an alternate life in a virtual world? Are you an artist or do you have interests that you want to share only with like minded individuals?

All of this and more can be maintained by one central account with only the system’s administration knowing the connection between the primary and secondary accounts. This system will also assure those that intend to abuse or mistreat others, while hiding under a sub account, can be accurately and swiftly identified and dealt with accordingly.

You can partner with your Virtual Community to keep your children safe and protected.

You need to be confident that you will be alerted to any suspicious or possibly dangerous events taking place on your child's account.

A system you can trust to be age appropriate, and yet still allow your children a certain level of autonomy.

Your child's account can be linked to your own, until they are old enough to be responsible on their own.

Your child's privacy is still protected, but it is monitored in a way to alert you to any situations that require your attention.

A network armed with all the official policies and international security agencies that can be alerted in such a case as when a child goes missing.

Imagine a virtual community where you can access police, emergency response personal, medical professionals, etc., with just the click of a button. You need the tools, the personnel, and a fool proof system that can quickly assess your needs and deliver immediate, accurate attention at a moment’s notice.

Councils created for specific countries, cultures, groups, and interests.

You need a multi-lingual system that is all inclusive. Tutorials that serves everyone.

You need a safe haven of common people. A community that serves to support, protect, engage, and befriend every user.

A system that recognizes your good citizenship.

One that grants merits/badges for continued “good neighbor” online behavior. Or one that recognizes and monitors known trouble makers, removing them when required. You deserve to know first hand what sort of person you are interacting with.

Imagine being able to communicate with your health professionals,record personal medical data (useful in a medical emergency when away from home) schedule appointments, receive important alerts and information about your own personal health, all from your network.

One platform that can maintain everything from social media, email accounts, your schedule, documents you need to share and more.

How many email accounts do you have?

You need one, easy-to-use system which is seamlessly integrated into your Virtual Community. No more switching between accounts, browsers, tabs etc. Easily transfer email attachments into an integrated file system within your Virtual Community, which can then effortlessly be shared with friends and co-workers. Allow them access to help you edit and publish materials. Everything, all in one place.

Being able to easily access a company's customer support without having to navigate through pages of their website.

You need the ability to streamline customer service in the most efficient manner possible. Imagine being able to integrate many marketplaces into one network. Smooth and easy transactions, whether they are across town or across the globe.

Just as your personal accounts can have various purposes and levels of security, so too can your professional accounts.

You need complete control that you can fully customize to your requirements. Not blanket one-size-fits-most programming.

Imagine having the ability to control the level of advertising you encounter, with clear options.

Imagine being able to view all of your favorite magazines, television programs, news, and other broadcasting on your personal account.

Imagine being able to quickly edit and share videos and music with safeguards in place that would prevent plagiarism, infringements, bullying and harassment.


Imagine your life: secure, accessible, and utterly convenient.

A community which works along side augmented reality technology.  Expanding the possibilities of interactions which will integrate the virtual experience with the real ones, with a special care for people with disabilities and or handicaps to become the first interactive virtual community worldwide.

You can have it all in this new virtual community.


KEYFEATURE

  • Anti Bullying and psichological support

  • Children Protection

  • Online Security

  • Support medical help and security

  • Integration with collaboration tools and platforms

  • Community Managers

  • Distributes Content

  • Compliance and governance features

  • Corporate directory synchronization

  • Augmented Reality


TIMELINE

  • September 2015: Begin to work at the software and the design

  • End of October 2015: We send the welcome kit to Special Founders and Community Elders

  • January 2015: We start the beta testing
    *in case the goal it's not reach,  times will be longer

HOW WE SPEND THE MONEY

  • Database server

  • Augmented Reality Servers

  • Shared storage nodes

  • Front end nodes

  • Load balancers

  • Cache

  • CDN nodes

  • To connect all this, the Virtual Community will need equipments that can handle up to 5 TBps (Terabytes per second) on the backplane with multiple gigabit and 10-gigabit Ethernet connections.

  • Server farm will be co-located on  some data centers, when possible, with major Internet's Network Access Points (NAPs: the major Internet service providers connect to each other and where they provide the most direct access to the Internet's fastest connections.)

  • Designers

  • Programmers

  • Translators

  • Trademarking

  • Drafting a Terms of Use

  • Drafting  copyright, liability, infringement, IP, right to oblivion and insurance issues papers

  • Organizational resolutions and bylaws

  • Stock purchase agreements


QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS

What is the social community’s name?
For trademarks and copyright reasons we can not share the name at this time.  We will post an update when the trademark is completed.

How will it control all of us?
Nobody will have control over you, but if for example someone from Isis was trying to recruit people through the social, we will find this person and warn the police. This will ultimately happen because users warned us about strange accounts activity.  When we have reached milions of users, it will be pretty impossible to monitor everything.But for sure, we will not allow in the social any form of racist, abuses, bulling and or terrorism.

Can I contact you in private for more informations?
Yes, we would love to hear your thoughts and questions.  Please leave  comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page or send us an email at vcommunity2016@gmail.com and we will respond as soon as possible!

Why should I choose you to give my money to?
Because we have a bright smile and we are sexy! No, really, it is better to choose us because we will focus on the user, in a different way from what common social currently does.  In fact, you have to be the one to adapt to the current Virtual Community, with graphic, with compatibility with your business, help desk support, with your needs for privacy. Not with us!

We will be located in Europe, where privacy laws are far more strict than the rest of the world!

We will take great care to provide you the opportunity to have different “accounts” linked to the main.  Do not forget, that for security reasons we cannot admit anonymous main accounts.  We all know very well, how risky it is to chat with anonymous people, but we will also be sure to provide you the right to be what you want.

Do you want to support us in other way? You can advertise our project with friends, or your blog, spread the voice about this project and help us to reach the goal!

How works the multiple accounts in one?
If you are transgendered and you want to show yourself as the gender you identify with, or you want to simply chat as gamer, virtual world user, a brand or as an artist (actor, singer etc.) You can, without revealing your real information publicily.

If you have disabilities, well we are here for you! With our social design, and with the augmented reality, we will be for you and with you!

And not with a confusing customer support, but an easy one.  Ready to listen to you and your needs.

Yes, a true full virtual community which works around each of you, because you are not an item, but an important part of this big world.

We are in an age where current Virtual Community, as we know them, are not enough. They have adapted from each other from different sources, and as it happens in such situations (history teaches us well about this) they are close to collapsing around themself.  We have a solution for this.  We are not presumptuous as to assert that we have THE solution, but we know that there is a need.  We are going to build it from zero, which mean no errors or corrections.
story_txt:
Hello, 
Please allow us to introduce ourselves. We are a group of friends from various places around the world. We have a dream: To create a true social community that really takes care of its members. A social community that relies on its members in its decision making. One that grows alongside each and every member. We know that many have had a similar dream. They have tried but in the end they have only created clones of other social networks and eventually faded away.
We hope you will take some time to read about our project and learn how our vision is unique. This is a rare opportunity to experience the warmth and kinship of being a part of a true community that sincerely cares for you: safety, childer protection, easy sharing, medical health, augmented reality.  Come join us on this incredible journey as we push the limits of social networking. Together, we can build something the world has never seen before. We couldn't do what we do without your support!  We are looking towards the future, with you on board.  Simply put: We want you on our team!


The Plan
Keyfeatures
Timeline

How we spend the money
Questions and Answers




THE PLAN



One Virtual Community for all facets of your life.
A professional account that keeps your employers, employees, colleagues, and customers informed without allowing them access to what you are sharing with friends and family. 
Are you a gamer? Do you have an alternate life in a virtual world? Are you an artist or do you have interests that you want to share only with like minded individuals? 
All of this and more can be maintained by one central account with only the system’s administration knowing the connection between the primary and secondary accounts. This system will also assure those that intend to abuse or mistreat others, while hiding under a sub account, can be accurately and swiftly identified and dealt with accordingly.
You can partner with your Virtual Community to keep your children safe and protected. 

You need to be confident that you will be alerted to any suspicious 
or possibly dangerous events taking place on your child's account. 
A system you can trust to be age appropriate, and yet still allow your children a certain level of autonomy. 
Your child's account can be linked to your own, until they are old enough to be responsible on their own. 
Your child's privacy is still protected, but it is monitored in a way
 to alert you to any situations that require your attention.

A network armed with all the official policies and 
international security agencies that can be alerted in such a case as 
when a child goes missing.

Imagine a virtual community where you can access police, emergency 
response personal, medical professionals, etc., with just the click of a
 button. You need the tools, the personnel, and a fool proof system that
 can quickly assess your needs and deliver immediate, accurate attention
 at a moment’s notice.
Councils created for specific countries, cultures, groups, and interests.

You need a multi-lingual system that is all inclusive. Tutorials that serves everyone. 

You need a safe haven of common people. A community that serves to support, protect, engage, and befriend every user.

A system that recognizes your good citizenship. 
One 
that grants merits/badges for continued “good neighbor” online behavior.
 Or one that recognizes and monitors known trouble makers, removing them
 when required. You deserve to know first hand what sort of person you 
are interacting with.


Imagine being able to communicate with your health professionals,record
 personal medical data (useful in a medical emergency when away from 
home) schedule appointments, receive important alerts and information 
about your own personal health, all from your network.
One platform that can maintain everything from social media, email accounts, your schedule, documents you need to share and more.

No more switching between accounts, browsers, tabs etc. Easily transfer email attachments into an integrated file system within your Virtual Community, which can then effortlessly be shared with friends and co-workers. Allow them access to help you edit and publish materials. Everything, all in one place.


Being able to easily access a company's customer support without having to navigate through pages of their website. 

You need the ability to streamline customer service in the most efficient manner possible. Imagine being able to integrate many marketplaces into one network. Smooth and easy transactions, whether they are across town or across the globe.
Just as your personal accounts can have various purposes and levels of security, so too can your professional accounts.
You need complete control that you can fully customize to your requirements. Not blanket one-size-fits-most programming.
Imagine having the ability to control the level of advertising you encounter, with clear options.
Imagine being able to view all of your favorite magazines, 
television programs, news, and other broadcasting on your personal 
account. 

Imagine being able to quickly edit and share videos and music with 
safeguards in place that would prevent plagiarism, infringements, 
bullying and harassment.

story:
(Inspecting the habanero peppers; they look nice!)

Hi there, and welcome to the Sullivan Hot Sauce Trading Company, Indiegogo Campaign. My name is Isaiah Sullivan and I am the owner and creator of this delicious, unique, and innovative hot sauce brand. I started the company over a year ago in Stockholm, Sweden, as a side job, while studying for my master’s in political science and taking parental leave. I am passionate about politics and even more about hot sauce. I grew up on St. Thomas, in the US Virgin Islands and learned the art of making hot sauce from my great-aunt, Hyacinth (Hyo); she always warned the children “don’t touch the peppers…they hot, hot, hot”; I tell my daughter the same thing. The recipe is my creation, the design and logo by the genius of my brother-in-law, Gustav Schultz, and the awesome and constant encouragement from my wife Ellen and daughter Maya.

(My daughter and I selling the hot sauce at market)



The Story of the Sauce...
Over the years I’ve perfected the art of making a well-balanced habanero-based hot sauce. I use habaneros because they have a nice fruity character and pleasant heat. The other ingredients are there to accent, not over-power, Sullivan Hot Sauce. There are hints of citrus, a delicate sweetness and thickness from carrots and aromatic ingredients such as garlic, red onions, and ginger. Finally, the sauce is slow-cooked, with olive oil and a special ingredient to add to the uniqueness of the flavor; cooled down, stabilized with white wine vinegar (but not too much, as it is hot sauce, not vinegar sauce) and bottled. Everything is done by hand to achieve a detail oriented and quality product that you may just fall in love with; or at least your mouth will. It goes great with everything: eggs, vegetarian dishes (its 100% vegan), meat, fish, and poultry; and even cocktails (adds great flavor to Bloody Mary's). Spice up your life with Sullivan Hot Sauce!

Now to the campaign…Indiegogo! I believe this opportunity will allow me to expand the reach of my product throughout Sweden, to the US (which has a large hot sauce market), and globally. There are necessary steps for this to happen:
  •  I need a bigger kitchen and equipment—which will allow me to produce on a larger scale; this can be achieved at this stage by renting a kitchen or utilizing an already existing, sauce making factory.
  • To this end, I have a contact at Param Para AB in Sweden who assures me that they can produce 450 litres/ so roughly 4,500 bottles at a time (minimum order). This would be the optimum place to get a larger scale production going and enter the Swedish supermarkets by increasing supply.
  • An injection of capital—will help me reach this end and help to increase my methods of promoting Sullivan Hot Sauce Trading Company as a global brand and importantly onto the shelves of premium supermarkets in the US.
  • This campaign would allow me to continue making a great product and to launch it on a global scale via online sales.

    (Sending some Sullivan Hot Sauce to Italy for event)

  • Finally, based on projected sales and progress; future expansion of Sullivan Hot Sauce would be possible. Check out our history and progress thus far on Facebook and Instagram. Also I have an on-line, tictail store.
  • https://www.facebook.com/sullivanhotsaucetradingcompany?ref=hl#
  • https://instagram.com/sullivanhotsauce/
  • http://sullivanhotsaucetradingco.tictail.com/

The Funding Part:

  • It’s a great time to invest, as the dollar ($) is strong against the Swedish Kronor (SEK), ($1 = 8.5SEK) so it will enable me to accomplish more.
  • I am asking for Flexible Funding of $50,000 which will allow me to accomplish the following for one year (and more) and build capital to sustain the business:
  • Renting a kitchen for the cooking, production time, and part-time labor/ salary/ insurance (majority will be done by myself and assistants)-$20,000
  • Equipment: pots, food processor, professional hand blender, bottle-cap sealer and plastic-shrink wrap sealer; labels and glue, stationary, utensils, protective wear: bio-gloves, masks, aprons, etc., (necessary for handling the peppers)-$5,000.
  • Ingredients: Habaneros, lemons, limes, blood orange, ginger, garlic, carrots, red onions, olive oil, white whine vinegar, special ingredient (estimates based on cost of production of 500 bottles + ingredients/ month [$450 + $1,250]: for roughly one year, not including labor and salary) $20,400.
  • Design (labels and promotion), marketing, advertising, trademarks and miscellaneous cost for operations (storage, incidentals, etc.)-$4,600
  • above calculations based on current cost of production, inflation and price fluctuation taking into account.

The Impact of Sullivan Hot Sauce Trading Company

  •  I will do my best to aim towards getting fair-trade produce and ingredients.
  • I believe that an integral part of the ingredients should be that they are sourced through fair and environmentally minded practices, to both include the healthy and sustainable lives of the farmers (no slave or child labor) and their environment around them.
  • The funding will be used to increase this part of my mission and aim towards fair-trade labeling.
  • At the moment most of the ingredients are from Europe, but I would like to support more community based farming in the future, especially for the habanero peppers, which tend to be grown in various parts of the Caribbean (which I'm from) and regions of Western Africa.

Hurdles, Risk and Challenges

  • There are always going to be risk and obstacles to any growing business.
  • I experienced this in my first year (summer 2015) where the weather is not always on your side; so instead of simply selling direct to people (at local market in Stockholm, Sweden).
  • The aim was to get it into stores, or even deliver them if need be by bicycle (in Stockholm only), this has been done by foot though (during snowy-winter months).
  • My phone number has been on the label from the beginning, so that customers can call and talk about how much they love the sauce, or that they’re out and need more, or that the heat needs to increase.
  • However, bigger problems such as lower quality habaneros have occurred and I immediately send the whole shipment back and request, hand-examined and perfect ingredients.
  • Another pitfall was caps that had a malfunction, which was quickly remedied by my bottle and cap supplier, by overnight delivery.
  • One foreseeable challenge will be ensuring quick, reliable, and efficient international shipment from Sweden.
  • I will make this one of my main goals, to ensure that a perfect bottle, or three, or six, or how ever many you would like, to spice up your life, gets to you in a reasonable amount of time.
  • Another difficult hurdle is pricing properly, so that I may get the product to bigger stores, and thus increase the supply and demand.
  • The cost of production is the most difficult part of this equation; the more I can make, the better the cost gets, thus, more potential for increased supply and profit. This is where an investment would help the most.
  • The biggest challenge will be to keep up with the demand; that is why this campaign will help me to increase my production potential and staff to ensure that Sullivan Hot Sauce Trading Company grows to its full potential.

Great, Now Here’s Other Ways You Can Help

  •  I understand in this economic climate, one can’t always give.
  • However, we all have smart phones, and those little gadgets have cameras, and a whole-lot-of other gadgets and apps that can spread campaigns faster than a noonday protest rally.
  • So, just click on the Indiegogo share tools (and tweet, face-book-or-time, or why not Instagram-it)
  • I hope you enjoyed the presentation, the video, and I really hope you can try Sullivan Hot Sauce, very, very soon.

I appreciate any support you can give to my Sullivan Hot Sauce Trading Company Indiegogo Summer 2015 Campaign.

Thanks a million and enjoy the rest of summer!

Isaiah Sullivan

story:
We've moved to Patreon!  https://www.patreon.com/user?u=4033683

August 2016: The wall is up!  See our new campaign address for pictures, video and more information.

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/cernunnos-shrine-ii/x/11422658#/

May 2016:  Our new campaign will go live with video of the groundbreaking - funded by this campaign.  Coming Soon!

December 2015: THANKS to everyone who contributed so far!!  We will break ground in the spring to start building the Shrine.  The plan right now, is to go live with another campaign at that time and perhaps a third one at the completion.  You will have a bit more time to contribute your own engraved brick or tile.  Check back with us in a couple months after the snow melts in Trout Lake, Washington.  

The original story from October 2015:

We are Cascadia Grove of Ár nDraíocht Féin: A Druid Fellowship (ADF).  We are building a Shrine to Cernunnos, God of Liminality, Commerce, and the Forest, at White Mountain Druid Sanctuary in Trout Lake, Washington state. 

Artist rendering of proposed Cernunnos shrine.  All artwork will be done in full color.

White Mountain Druid Sanctuary is created and owned by Kirk Thomas, the Arch Druid of ADF.  On the Sanctuary’s property, he has already completed three shrines, a massive Stone Circle, and a Labyrinth.  To create these physical structures to withstand time, they have to be built with durable products.  The stone and metal roofing, as well as the tile artwork, cost money.  This is where you come in.

Close up of tympanum at top of the Cernunnos shrine.  All artwork will done in full color.

We will be building an outdoor shrine made to withstand harsh winters and heavy snows.  The shrine will be constructed with wood pillars, concrete walls and a reinforced sheet metal roof - all forming a sheltered area that includes a granite shelf for lighting and placing incense and other offerings.  There will also be a fire altar and an oak tree wooden bench for meditation.  

Shrine to The Dagda, Irish god of Appetite

Cernunnos’ shrine will be added to a collection of shrines of the Irish and Celtic pantheons.  Already completed are shrines to The Dagda (above), The Morrigan and Lugh.  (Pictures below).  

Shrine to The Morrigan, Irish goddess of Battle, Death, and Rebirth

Shrine to Lugh, Irish god of Many Talents

They are placed around a Stone Circle (below) that has twelve 10- 20 foot pillars, a Well, a Fire Pit, and an Axis Mundi.  

Stone Circle at White Mountain Druid Sanctuary with fire pit in the center and the well at the west end.  The Tree at the east end has since been replaced by an axis mundi.

There is also a Bed and Breakfast (Trout Lake Abbey) on the property.  People can reserve an individual room, a bed in the hostel, or places to camp and pitch a tent.  (Picture below)

Trout Lake Abbey B&B

White Mountain Druid Sanctuary is one of the few places in the country that has imagined and created an environment similar to what we believe our ancient ancestors worshiped in, and then placed it in a modern setting.  Grounded in what we know from artifacts and written history, ADF has created rituals that honor the Indo-European pantheons of old.  At White Mountain Druid Sanctuary, we are creating a place in which we can honor the Gods and Goddesses of old, the Nature Spirits, and our Ancestors.

One definite peace of mind you have as a contributor is that a significant amount of work has already been completed on other shrines.  We already know exactly how to get the work done and we’ve already been successful at doing this before.

Kirk Thomas during the Lughnasadh ritual at the Well at the west end of the Stone Circle

East end of Stone Circle, including Axis Mundi

If you can’t contribute now, here’s how you can still help.  Tell your friends!  Come and visit!  Trout Lake Abbey exists for people to visit, wander the Labyrinth and the Stone Circle, and make offerings at the shrines.  And did we mention the unobstructed breathtaking view of Mt Adams?  (below)

View from the Trout Lake Abbey B&B

Construction of the Cernunnos shrine is scheduled to start spring 2016 as soon as the ground thaws from the winter.  Stretch goals will include a shrine to Manannan Mac Lir, Rhiannon, Brigid, an Ancestor Mound, a temple to the All Gods, and yes, we have plans for even more.  

Aerial view of White Mountain Druid Sanctuary


Entrance to Trout Lake Abbey B&B

Cernunnos Shrine logo (similar to design on t-shirt and mug).
story_txt:
We've moved to Patreon!  https://www.patreon.com/user?u=4033683August 2016: The wall is up!  See our new campaign address for pictures, video and more information.https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/cernunnos-shrine-ii/x/11422658#/May 2016:  Our new campaign will go live with video of the groundbreaking - funded by this campaign.  Coming Soon!
December 2015: THANKS to everyone who contributed so far!!  We will break ground in the spring to start building the Shrine.  The plan right now, is to go live with another campaign at that time and perhaps a third one at the completion.  You will have a bit more time to contribute your own engraved brick or tile.  Check back with us in a couple months after the snow melts in Trout Lake, Washington.

story:
U.R. Bath and Body

 U.R. Bath and Body is the creation of Tracy Gunn. Why are we called U.R.? It's a great story!!! The name came to Tracy while she was visiting a womens homeless shelter in The Bronx. While visiting, Tracy noticed that the director would stop and talk to every woman she passed in the hallways and would hug them and tell them YOU ARE AMAZING or YOU ARE BEAUTIFUL, etc So Tracy shortened it to U.R. and will be naming every product things like AMAZING or BEAUTIFUL or... You get the theme right? After 4 years in the bath and body industry we feel we are ready to conquer the world of Bath and Body Products as well as helping the homeless and those in need along the way. The original company was formed in Tracy's kitchen 4 years ago after a devastating layoff and being a single mother of 2 wonderful boys there was no room for failure and the company was launched with only soaps to support the family. With a $32.00 investment Tracy was able to put her soaps in over 1000 stores in less than a year. Saving as much money as possible while raising a high level hockey player that traveled the country and an up and coming young golfer, Tracy was able to move into a manufacturing facility in October of 2014. Investing everything she made into equipment and supplies for an expanded product line to include Soaps, Sugar Scrubs, Lotions, Body Butters, Bubble Bath, Perfumes, Lip Balms, etc as well as opening the first retail store. As fate would have it, on May 5th, everything Tracy had worked toward was destroyed during an evening of Oklahoma tornadoes and flooding. Inventory worth over $200,000.00 was destroyed. Not willing to give up, Tracy is moving her business and products in a new direction. Tracy started her company from a mere $32.00 with less than $100.00 in the bank at the time. It was a moment of do or die. Homeless and unable to support her children was the only other option but Tracy is a fierce survivor and was determined to succeed. Knowing that there are other people in the world that might not have been so fortunate she is going to begin the new business with the mission of employing and helping the homeless. There are millions of homeless mothers in shelters all over the United States that simply need an opportunity to succeed and in return allows them to raise more productive and happy children that deserve the life and opportunities that Tracy has been able to afford her children with both on track for Division 1 academic and sports scholarships.

 With a tremendous amount of support from Homeless Missions in New York City, New Orleans and Las Vegas we are ready to start our adventure.  U.R. Bath and Body will employee homeless employees for retail, manufacturing and shipping in hopes of helping them become productive and begin to live life on their own and successfully again.

 In 2016 we would like to begin expansion of U.R. Bath and Body. Not in a normal way though. In an attempt to make someone else's entrepreneurial dreams come true, we are partnering with several non profit organizations as well as a reality show producer to go on a search for people that are capable and deserving of owning their own U.R. Bath and Body franchise. With support we can provide the start up capital for this candidate to open and operate their very own franchise store. We will offer 2 stores per state and will go on a fierce search for the most deserving, willing and capable candidates. We will search homeless shelters, battered womens shelters, it might be a disabled veteran or it might be you!!!! Our first 6 stores will be in Las Vegas NV, New Orleans LA, Memphis TN, Boston MA, Atlanta GA and Dallas TX.  There are many options for financing and investors but we would rather offer our friends and valued customers the opportunity to help us grow. Most investors want a percentage of the company and investors are all about the money that they will make rather than the mission of the company. We love what we do and don't want to turn into a corporate ran company. We want to remain a handmade company that serves the community. With your help we can accomplish just that.  We don't want something for nothing but a head start on our growth. We will spend the money we raise to replace and increase inventory, hire employees and fund our expansion stores. Everyone  will receive their products just in time for Christmas!!!  Here is a little video about our owner Tracy.  Since the video we have changed the name of the company to a name that is more meaningful to our mission.  Thank you so very much for your time and thank you in advance for you support.  

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E5XEWU5Dn6Y&feature=youtu.be

Here is a link to our Facebook page

https://www.facebook.com/URbathandbody

story:
Short Summary

Brewyard Beer Company will be Glendale, California’s 1st Craft Brewery & Taproom! We are located at 906 Western Avenue right off San Fernando Road.  The addition of our brewery along San Fernando Rd. will help create the “San Fernando Road Craft Beer Corridor” where great Los Angeles breweries like Golden Road Brewery and Eagle Rock brewery are located.  Along the Glendale-Eagle Rock stretch of San Fernando Road is also home to great Craft Beer Bars such as Glendale Tap, Verdugo Bar, and Story Tavern. 

We will be dedicated to brewing unique and fresh high-quality awesome beers, following suit of great American craft beer cities such as San Diego, Denver, and Chicago, serving fresh from our brewery tanks in our on-site taproom.  We will also self-distribute to premium bars, gastro pubs, taverns, clubs, and restaurants all throughout California. 

The first 4 beers we will be brewing are: California Common Lager (Steam Beer), Passion fruit Saison, Black Schwarzbier Lager & an IPL (India Pale Lager). Although we will be brewing popular styles like IPAs, Stouts, porters..etc, we will mostly be brewing Hybrid Ale/Lagers that have the flavor profiles of Ales but with the cleaner finishes that lagers have.

Our taproom will also be a space for local artists and performers to showcase their work giving them another avenue for local exposure. The City of Glendale has been generous enough to grant us a Conditional Use Permit that will allow for Food trucks, music, and even live entertainment (on occasion with an approved permit).

What We Need & What You Get

We set some very ambitious goals for our Brewery & Taproom to make sure craft beer fans can experience the finest beers and the best atmosphere to drink them in.  With the help from our families, friends, and our contractor, we have managed to get our brewery 90% there, provided the budget we had to work with.  The last 10% will help us open our doors!  With your help and a very humble goal of $25,000 we will be able to finish up our taproom, purchase our much needed ingredients(grains/hops/yeast) for our opening batches, purchase brewing and taproom equipment (Kegs, NSF shelving, glassware, growlers, cleaning supplies/chemicals, storage racks, transfer pump, hoses, fittings, gloves, boots, and oh… more kegs). With your help we will also be able to focus our efforts towards marketing, website design, and provide better options for Brewyard Apparel/Accessories. 

If we can surpass our goal, the extra money will go towards items that we had to remove from our initial build-out budget.  An extra $25,000-$50,000 past our goal will allow us to startup our barrel-age program, special-release bottling, install a proper A/C system(or at least repair & upgrade our ancient Swamp Cooling system) in the brewery and even purchase more fermentation tanks to bring you more beer! 

$25 donation - You will receive a shiny new Pint Glass with our logo.

$50 donation - You will receive a snazzy Brewyard Growler & shiny Pint Glass with our logo.

$100 donation - You will receive a snazzy Brewyard Growler including Fill (In taproom only, specialty beers excluded), shiny Pint Glass, and a nifty T-shirt with our logo.

$250 donation - You will receive all items listed under the $100 donation and you will be a member of our Brewyard Mug Club* for a year!

Sponsor a Brick $500 donation - You will receive all items listed under the $100 donation, a special Engraved Plaque on a Brick near the front entrance and you will be a member of our Brewyard Mug Club* for 5 years!

Sponsor a Brick $1,000 donation - You will receive all items listed under the $100 donation, a special Engraved Plaque on a Brick near the front entrance and you will be a member of our Brewyard Mug Club* For Life!

Sponsor Our Truck $2,500 donation - You will receive a special Engraved Plaque on the wooden boards of the truck bed of our Brewyard mascot, a 1936 Ford Flatbed Truck.  This truck will be the prominent drinking table inside the taproom.  You will also be a member of our Brewyard Mug Club* For Life!

*Brewyard Mug Club Members to receive special taproom-only beer offerings, discounts on merchandise, larger 20oz mugs for standard 16oz pint pricing and Free entry to awesome private Brewyard events & parties that may include exclusive Mug Club tastings, food pairings, entertainment, brewing day walk-throughs, workshops and beer tours

The Impact

We, along with our friends and family, have already invested a tremendous amount of our lives into building out this dream.  We started out 8 years ago as home brewers brewing up small batches of beer from our garage. With our lifesavings, help and support from our families and an SBA loan we managed to get this project started.  The City of Glendale has been fully supportive of our endeavor and we have the opportunity to be the city’s first Craft Brewery.  Just last week we received our CA ABC license to brew and sell beer.  It would be an understatement to say that we feel a certain amount of pressure and obligation to make sure we don’t disappoint ourselves, our city, and the craft beer community all around.  We want our brewery to be successful not just for our own personal satisfaction but so we can be in a position to return the thanks to everyone that helped us along the way and to the city and community that welcomed us with open arms.  Oh and we also want to brew the best beer in the world.

Risks & Challenges

The Good news: Our overall construction is almost done.  We still have some ways to complete the finish work in the taproom but it shouldn’t affect our time frame to open nor final city inspection.  This past month we received our Alcohol license and last March, the City of Glendale granted us a Conditional Use Permit to serve beer on-premise in our taproom.  In terms of permitting and buildout, a majority of the most risky items have been taken care of…*Phew*

Now, the majority of our challenges/risks shift to opening and operating the brewery.  This is where you come in.  The funds that we raise will directly determine how much risk we have to deal with.  Our $25,000 goal should reduce that risk tremendously by allowing us to immediately purchase items we need to brew beer, finish our taproom, and open doors.  You may or may not have heard but the prices for raw materials such as hops are skyrocketing due to shortages.  This campaign will also help pay for rent and utilities so we don’t get evicted from our space while preparing to open. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if money is tight.  Of course we do! Why do you think we are doing this fundraiser :P There are still a million ways to show your support.  Tell your friends, family, and co-workers about us.  Be a fan of our Facebook and Instagram pages or sign up for our newsletter on our website www.brewyardbeercompany.com and share us.  Hashtag us on everything you post #brewyardbeercompany  #brewyardbeerco #brewyard #BYBC #drivenbythecraft #1stbreweryinglendale

If you have old board games or old vintage 1930’s-40’s ish stuff you want to donate or get rid of, we can surely find a use for it.  If you have connections to an experienced website designer that is willing to build a webpage for beer, we would appreciate that. You can even stop by and help us clean up (construction really makes things dusty).  Most importantly share this campaign with everyone you know, maybe they will pitch in a few bucks to support.  We appreciate any help you can give.  Thank you so very much for reading through our campaign and considering to donate.

an experienced website designer that is willing to build a webpage for beer, we
would appreciate that. You can even stop by and help us clean up (construction
really makes things dusty).  Most
importantly share this campaign with everyone you know, maybe they will pitch
in a few bucks to support.  We appreciate
any help you can give.  Thank you so very
much for reading through our campaign and considering to donate.

story:
Take control of your accounts and logins online

It’s frustrating enough trying to remember the names of people you meet. It’s even worse trying to remember countless login details, let alone creating strong passwords.

SID is here to help.

SID - the application transforming the login experience

Wouldn't you love to hold your phone up to a screen and be magically logged into websites? No stress, no fuss, no scrabbling around for bits of paper which might have your passwords written down.

SID is this magic. It does it all for you. SID makes logging in quick and effortless. 

SID - yours for life. Get SID now for only $39


What is SID?

SID is an application on your mobile phone which completely automates website logins.  

You never have to remember any login details. You don't have to worry about people peering over your shoulder, or worry about keystroke loggers.

SID makes website logins quick and easy. SID can even login to certain banks (more banks are being added to SID’s list each day). SID takes care of everything for you, and because it’s mobile you can use it anywhere in the world.

Why does SID exist?

In 2012 one of SID’s founders, Craig Vallis, attended the Cloud Identity Summit in Vail, Colorado. During the summit he realised that our identities, real life and online, are the prize in the fight for control of the Internet. This fight for power and control over our identities happens between governments, corporations and criminals. There are constant attempts by criminals, companies and government legislation to gain access to our personal and financial details. Our busy lives and the increasingly complicated digital world mean that we have to take care of our right to security and safety online, but nobody wants the headache of constantly having to remember complicated login details.

Craig decided to do something about it. He brought a team together to create the tools that let YOU take control of your online identity and personal data.

Anti-virus programmes and spam blockers protect you from malicious interference while you’re online. Now SID is here to protect you from forgotten passwords, wasted time and security worries.

User login on websites is an imperfect and clumsy necessity. It’s tedious and laborious, but websites force you to do it. They’re trying to make your online sessions as secure as possible. You have to live with this pain until someone discovers a better method. SID was developed to minimise your pain and maximise your convenience and security. 

SID gives you one account which logs you in to all the websites you visit online.

SID’s an account that you choose, not an account you’re forced to use because you searched for something online, or want to use social networking, banking or e-commerce sites. SID also increases your online security through biometrics (physical and behavioural information about you). These are the ultimate security confirmation of your identity, totally unique to you.  SID doesn’t track you online, and doesn’t sell your habits and history to advertisers. The account works almost everywhere online. It stores your personal information and allows you to grant and revoke access to that information at any time you like.

SID does this all securely, safely and simply.

In 2013 we started creating SID, and after a number of development and test cycles we've almost ready to launch it. We've also created the most incredible login experience. This is SID.

Isn't this just a Password Manager?

No – SID is much more than that. Besides managing your passwords, SID gives you a hassle-free login experience and maximum security and privacy.

When we created SID, we looked at all current website authentication processes and technologies. We examined complexity, security and convenience issues. While websites requiring logins are only trying to make your online activity as secure as possible, many of them fail (the TalkTalk UK data breach is a prime example). Almost all of them fail with the most important thing: your experience as a user. SID is a superior, convenient user experience. It takes away the dread of logging in and the worry about protecting your details online. 

Why are we asking for help?

We need your help to fund SID’s final development and test SID launch functionality. We’ve already developed SID for iPhone, and we’ve been testing SID since the end 2014.  SID works fantastically well and needs only minor tweaks. We need to make the current process of registering for SID and installing the browser extensions easier. We also want to improve the help and support SID gives.  

You can help us make the magic of SID come alive by taking out a subscription today.  

We promise never to profile you or sell your details to any advertisers. You’ll never see any third party adverts in your SID application or your browser extension.  

We’re using a freemium subscription model, where full functionality will be about $50/year. For this crowdfunding round we’re offering you full lifetime access to all personal functionality, for a one-off donation of only $50 (the first 250 early birds will get it for only $39). 

Help us make SID make your dreams of secure, safe and simple logins come true.

When will SID be available?

The release dates are shown below.  Crowdfund subscribers (you!) will have access to everything as soon as it becomes available.

iPhone Application

January 2016

Updated Registration Process

January 2016

Android Application

March 2016

Windows Phone Application

April 2016

Internet Explorer 9+ Extension

April 2016

Launch!

Credential Management

June 2016

Biometric Authentication

  • Fingerprint (TBC)
  • Voice (TBC)
  • Face (TBC)

June 2016

Profile Management

August 2016

Identity Protocols

  • OpenID Connect (TBC)
  • Universal 2 Factor (TBC)

August 2016

The low-down on SID

Your mobile phone contains precious information about you. SID makes sure that this information is encrypted and stored locally on your phone so that you always have access to it. There are several ways to back up your information, so that you can easily get it back if you lose or damage your phone. Your information is never stored on our servers, so you’re protected from hackers and any possible technical issue.

SID is a ‘set of keys’ you use to login to any website, quickly and simply, never again having to remember a username or password. Think of your phone as being a house, and SID is the key to the house. Instead of having many different keys for different rooms in your house, SID is one key which works for every door. This one key is unlike anybody else’s, and nobody can copy it. It’s yours, and yours alone.

SID - simple enough for your parents and grandparents to use, and powerful enough for you to use every day.



What will you give me if I help you launch SID?

We have something for everyone, to thank you sincerely for helping us make SID come true.

Privacy Hero - $5 USD

A huge THANK YOU and your name on the Wall of Fame on SID's webpage for ETERNITY! Shipping January 2016


Privacy Hero + Wristband - $15 USD + Shipping

A huge THANK YOU! and your name on the SID’s webpage Wall of Fame for eternity.  We’ll also send you a limited #IamSID wristband to show everyone around you that you’re committed to reclaiming your online identity, privacy and personal data. Shipping January 2016.


Lifetime Access - $50 USD (limited offer $39) + Shipping 

Take back control of your online identity, privacy and personal data. We’ll send you a limited #IamSID wristband, an activation code for lifetime personal access to the SID ecosystem (which includes any future updates and enhancements), and early access to the BETA testing group. Wristbands shipping January 2016; SID will ship March 2016. One-off payment only, no annual fees.


Multiple Lifetime Access - $150USD (limited offer $119) +Shipping

--FOR 5 People-- Take back control of your online identity, privacy and personal data. We’ll send you 5 limited #IamSID wristbands, 5 activation codes for lifetime access to the SID application for you and 4 of your family, friends or colleagues (which includes any future updates and enhancements), and early access to the BETA testing group. Wristbands shipping January 2016; SID will ship March 2016. One-off payment only, no annual fees.


Enterprise Version

Our consumer offering for companies has been easily configured to simplify employee user login to company networks and data in cloud services. The Enterprise Version gives on-premises storage of credentials, a dedicated administration interface and login functionality for servers, desktops and websites.

Enterprise - Silver

Lifetime Enterprise access for 1 enterprise for up to 50 people, access to the closed Enterprise Beta Group and 10 #IamSID wristbands. Wristbands shipping January 2016; SID will ship March 2016.

Enterprise - Gold

Lifetime Enterprise access for 1 enterprise for up to 250 people, access to the closed Enterprise Beta Group and 30 #IamSID wristbands. Wristbands shipping January 2016; SID will ship March 2016.

Enterprise - Platinum

Lifetime Enterprise access for 1 enterprise for up to 1000 people, access to the closed  Enterprise Beta Group and 75 #IamSID Wristbands. Wristbands Shipping January 2016, SID will ship March 2016


How else can I help you?

If you like what we're doing, you can  help us by telling your friends, family, co-workers, fellow commuters, fans and followers about us. Spread the word any way you can.  Start a conversation and don’t be shy to tag us!

Help us make SID make magic.

I want to know more

Does SID work on any website?

Yes, SID is designed to work on any HTML website, old or new. SID’s been tested on hundreds of sites, from small company sites to big media and publishing websites. Of course we also tested SID on sites like Google, Facebook and Twitter.  The browser’s designed to automatically recognise login pages as you visit them, and prompt them for details if they’re not already stored.  This means SID can be used on old and new websites.

story:
Hello! We are Sean and Dana O'Connor. Parents of 4 children and no strangers to the struggles that go along with raising a family on a paycheck to paycheck basis. We went from successful retailers some years back to losing everything practically overnight which not only humbled us to the max but also opened our eyes to the fact that many, many other families and individuals were hurting and facing the same financial challenges.

Thankfully we had a wonderful circle of support during those times and now Rescue Apparel Thrift Store is our way of paying it forward and giving our hearts to those who have little to nothing on their tables to eat. We are co-directors of a small food ministry that we work out of the parking lot of our church, providing food to all who are in need. Rescue Apparel Thrift Store will help grow the pantry to a much higher level and support another dream we both have of helping others to get back on the right track financially.

With supporters like you, Rescue Apparel will make a giant impact in our community by using it's profits to build people back up from a place that may seem hopeless. The immediate objective is to help people when they don't have enough food, moreover granting scholarships for vocational job training which with the right amount of self confidence will keep the paychecks coming, you know the saying, give someone a fish and they'll eat for a night but teach someone to fish and they'll eat for a lifetime and this lifetime is too short to spend it strapped and unhappy.

When life hit us hard and we were the one's going through hard times, it was surely hard to ignore the tremendous amount of people that were in need of help and now we want to be part of the solution to this ongoing life problem. We want people to know that there are avenues they can take and that there's someone out there committed to helping them find that road.

You, as a contributor and a store patron as well, will know that you play a part in dramatically changing a life or two, three and so on, by giving a dad the upper hand at a job interview because of his education, or a mom receiving training that doesn't end up costing thousands of dollars in student loans.

We are truly grateful to all who are continually donating amazing merchandise ie, clothes, shoes, purses, jewelry, books, kitchen ware, baby stuff, furniture and lots of other interesting and fun items. Now it's time to put these awesome goods to work. The money we raise is going to get us into the right space for what will become a cool, energetic and fun place for employees and shoppers, all the while meeting the needs of the people whether treasure hunting, working a budget or receiving the benefits of our support.

Like starting any business, of course there is risk involved but we have learned that taking a risk in life sure beats sitting around wondering if you could have done more, helped more and been more proactive in this life. We have seen the need around us and the look on a person's face when they know you care is worth the work and the risk.

We want to thank you for your interest in our campaign and we ask that you please share this with other big hearts so that we can begin the real work.

story:
STORY

Each unique region in the world has a rich tradition of adornment. Thus, every bead carries a multifaceted history — from where the bead was manufactured, where it was traded, its meaning, what it was used for, and how it has since been passed along to where it is today. The connections you make while in search of these beads continue the story. 

My name is Celia Moret-Ferguson. As a youth, my dream was to one day open a bead store so that I could marvel at, touch, and sort beads all day; effectually transporting me to other parts of the world and cultures. Now as an adult, after 10 years as a traveled professional Archaeologist and Jewelry Designer, I want to share this vision with others. My dream now... Bead Nation. After over a year of working with a mentor at the local Small Business Administration (SCORE) to develop a business plan, and saving every bit I can for inventory, I need your help to finally realize this dream!

Bead Nation will be a mobile bead store that will transport customers to cultures afar via its unique bead selection. Store inventory will be heavily influenced by beads manufactured and sold from around the world purchased from vendors who support indigenous community artisans. The store’s objectives are to offer these unique beads to jewelry designers, beginner jewelers, and anyone who appreciates rare world goods. While its primary service is bead retail, Bead Nation will also sell necklaces and offer classes and workshops.

Success of Bead Nation will be a direct result of its ability to mobilize to popular districts and festivals, its unique inventory, as well as its pleasant and beautiful atmosphere. The shop, designed by Little Mansions, will inspire creativity and foster a community where artists can relate to and encourage one another. Bead Nation will primarily be located in a designated mobile vendor space positioned in the now popular Alberta Arts District of Portland, Oregon and will occasionally travel to festivals. The shop will be entirely powered by solar energy.

Portland’s rich mobile vendor culture has become a well-known phenomenon and is part of what makes Portland fun, quirky, and habitable. Vendor ‘pods’ draw people and add vibrancy to empty lots and districts. Mobile shops also afford creative entrepreneurs the ability to establish micro-businesses while offering customers unique options at a reasonable price.

Having visited hundreds of bead stores and booths, I have the experience to suitably determine fair purchasing and retail prices. Bead Nation will carry reasonably priced and unique beads. The mobile shop will draw in jewelers, creative makers, and the general public. With a line of high-quality stone pendants and a variety of rosary chain, anyone can easily craft a simple, exquisite necklace. Bead Nation will also serve as a boutique with a small line of hand-crafted necklaces constructed by Moray Creative Adornment (MORAY).

To inspire a passion for jewelry making, classes will be offered once a month on general beading, Mala bead or meditation necklaces, hammered metal clasps and charms, wire wrapping, freeform bezels, and other specialized techniques depending on customer interests. Open workshops will take place in the evenings once each week, where customers will be assisted with selecting beads and creating jewelry in an open bead session. As a mobile enterprise, customers will also have the ability to hire Bead Nation to travel to private events and parties and host bead workshops.


SOCIAL IMPACT

Social impact is a foundation of the Bead Nation philosophy, which seeks to enable indigenous cultures to continue their ancient craft of design and adornment. With each donation, please feel empowered to support one of these ambitious non-profit organizations that reflect Bead Nation’s ideals and inventory. By specifying in your order which of these three organization you wish to support, 5% of the donation will go directly to the non-profit of choice.

  • Supports tuition to attendees of the Street Business School. This program works with impoverished women in Uganda, and gives them the confidence and the know-how to succeed as entrepreneurs in their local markets. The program empowers women to transform their lives. Learn more here.

  • Portland’s own Native American Youth and Family Center whose mission is to enhance the diverse strengths of our youth and families in partnership with the community through cultural identity and education. Through their Marketplaces, native art, jewelry and craft items from intertribal community vendors are sold to support the Portland Youth and Elders’ Council to raise funds for various programs and events. Learn more here.

  • Promotes sustainable fair trade by providing fair wages and employment opportunities to low-income artisans. The program works with over 20 cooperatives and small businesses that use traditional Maya techniques to create unique, handmade products. Your support not only provides an income for these artisans, but also supports community development projects in Guatemala. Learn more here.


YOUR HELP

Help me realize this dream and support local and indigenous communities and crafters worldwide! Competitive advantages that Bead Nation offers range from its unique mobility, ecologically sustainable and exotic atmosphere; to its ideal location. Bead Nation’s rare and fairly-priced beads, workshops, and classes will greatly benefit Portland’s Alberta Arts District community and visitors. As a mobile store, it will add to and inspire other mobile vendors to build vibrant and creative communities.

Mobile Storefront: $28,000 - Includes Design Fee, Cost to Build, Trailer Bed, and Solar Installation.

The structure itself was designed by and will be built by Seattle-based company Little Mansions, that specializes in creating miniature store-front looking studio spaces. Bead Nation will not need utilities such as water and will be otherwise environmentally sustainable by using solar-powered, rooftop panels. Bead Nation will have the appearance of other local stores built in the Alberta Arts District neighborhood, but will be slightly more exotic with Moroccan-influenced architectural details. Due to the popularity of the now-thriving Alberta community, retail space prices as a start-up business are dauntingly high. To get off the ground, Bead Nation needs your help in funding this unique and sustainable storefront!

Administrative Expenses: $6,000 - Includes shop furniture, register and book-keeping technology, first month’s space rent, general liability insurance, and graphic design.

I’m starting with little financing, which means I need all of the help I can get! Items like counter-tops on which beads will be placed, I-pad technology and ShopKeep book-keeping software, a typical vendor-space rent of $495, insurance, and graphic design will make all the difference. These essential items will set Bead Nation off on the shining path to success!

Opening Inventory: $4,000+ - Includes Base Supply of Beads and Supplies for Customers

Bead Nation needs beads. In addition to the amount I’ve worked at saving, this sum will fund a base supply so that jewelry designers are able to pick from exotic beads, yet also purchase their standard supplies. Both beginners and advanced jewelry crafters will be able to create the extraordinary pieces that each of their visions entail. The selection will include unique and rare African trade beads that are hard to find but well-priced, and beautiful hand-selected gemstone pendants, gemstone strands, and gemstone rosary chain not available in other local bead stores. Bead Nation will offer a wide array of seed bead sizes, colors, and finishes, as well as carefully-selected findings and chain for finishing any high-quality jewelry. In addition, necessary craft items such as pliers, wire, and cord will be available. Any money raised in addition to the $4,000 will go toward supplementing this base supply of beads and supplies for customers.


PERKS!

Each perk is handmade by our jewelry business MORAY (Moray Creative Adornment); co-owned by Rehanah Spence and myself over the past several months/years. Each of these pieces is thoughtfully crafted with hand-selected beads of great value. Use these perks to select a beautiful and elegant gift for you or someone special and help raise funds for Bead Nation as well as the local and global community!

$20 Gift Certificate and Gratitude

For a $20 donation, receive a $15 Gift Certificate for any purchase at Bead Nation sent to your email. We love your support and will personally thank you via Facebook and Instagram! The store is expected to open in February 2016.

$35 Gemstone Earrings

A perfect gift for the holidays! Choose from a variety of faceted, teardrop-shaped briolette gems and either silver or gold wire wrapping. Gem choices include dark-green onyx, mint-green chrysoprase, lime-green magnesite, and non-faceted carnelian (orange). All earring hooks are nickel-free. Upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$65 Gemstone Pendant Necklace

This beautiful necklace features a faceted briolette gemstone wrapped in silver or gold wire that hangs delicately from popular satellite chain. Gem choices include labradorite (greyish with blue iridescence), natural patterned quartz, turquoise, and non-faceted carnelian (orange). Choose from sterling silver or gold-filled satellite chain. Necklaces measure 21 inches. Upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$85 Gemstone Earrings and Necklace

Select a matching pair of earrings and a necklace at a great price! Choose from a variety of faceted, teardrop-shaped briolette gems and either silver or gold wire wrapping and satellite chain. Gem choices include labradorite (greyish with blue iridescence), sea-blue/green amazonite, turquoise, orange carnelian, and multi-colored tourmaline earrings paired with a natural patterned quartz necklace pendant. Choose from sterling silver or gold-filled satellite chain. Necklaces measure 21 inches. Upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$115 Earrings, and Double Necklace

Select a matching set of earrings, a gemstone pendant necklace, and a rosary-chain necklace. Choose from a variety of faceted, teardrop-shaped and wire-wrapped briolette gems and matching rosary chain. Gem choices include labradorite (greyish with blue iridescence) with silver or gold, sea-blue/green amazonite with gold, faceted orange carnelian with gold, turquoise and green onyx with silver, and multi-colored tourmaline earrings and silver rosary chain paired with a natural patterned quartz necklace pendant. Satellite chain is sterling silver or gold-filled. Rosary necklaces measure 18 inches while satellite chain necklaces measure 21 inches. Upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$150 MORAY Chiquila Necklace

Handcrafted by Moray Creative Adornment, these simple yet colorful necklaces are each one-of-a-kind. They range from one to three strands and are generally a mix of perfectly spaced small glass seed beads, Ethiopian silver-or-gold metal beads, and/or semi-precious gems and/or charms. See individual options here and upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$200 MORAY Makena Necklace

Handcrafted by Moray Creative Adornment, these classic one-of-a-kind necklaces each feature delicate strand(s) of Ethiopian silver and gold are paired with semi-precious and precious gems, some of which have been hand-gilded with gold leaf. These thoughtful necklaces sometimes include metal vintage pendants or charms including lockets. See individual options here and upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$200 MORAY Anjuna Necklace

Best worn with bathing suits or tank tops, these fully adjustable full-body necklaces are primarily strung using small glass seed beads with complimentary larger center and side beads as well as an adjuster ring. Handcrafted by Moray Creative Adornment, each creation exhibits a unique mix of brilliant colors, ancient trade beads, and high quality natural or antique findings. See individual options here and upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$500 MORAY Diani Necklace

Bold and often African influenced, this collection features exotic hand-crafted metal findings mixed with colorful trade beads from around the world. These are thoughtful pieces crafted by Moray Creative Adornment that incorporate semi-precious gemstones with several strands, fabric, and/or other rare treasures. See individual options here and upon donating on Indiegogo, please press Contact below the campaign video to let me know your choice!


$1000 MORAY Bespoke Necklace

These 20 to 30 strand statement pieces are made-to-order by Moray Creative Adornment. They feature delicate strands of patterned seed beads and/or gem beads catered to your personal vision and style. See individual photos for examples and consult with me for MORAY to create the perfect necklace for you!

SPREAD THE WORD

View and share this campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Indiegogo, or Twitter, with #BeadNation for a chance to win free perks!

Thank you for helping me to share this dream with you and others!
story_txt:
STORY

Each unique region in the world has a rich tradition of adornment. Thus, every bead carries a multifaceted history — from where the bead was manufactured, where it was traded, its meaning, what it was used for, and how it has since been passed along to where it is today. The connections you make while in search of these beads continue the story.  


My
name is Celia Moret-Ferguson. As a youth, my dream was to one day open a bead
store so that I could marvel at, touch, and sort beads all day; effectually transporting
me to other parts of the world and cultures. Now as an adult, after 10 years as
a traveled professional Archaeologist and Jewelry Designer, I want to share
this vision with others. My dream now... Bead Nation. After over a year of
working with a mentor at the local Small Business Administration (SCORE) to develop a business plan, and saving
every bit I can for inventory, I need your help to finally realize this dream! 


Bead
Nation will be a mobile bead store that will transport customers to cultures
afar via its unique bead selection. Store inventory will be heavily influenced
by beads manufactured and sold from around the world purchased from vendors who
support indigenous community artisans. The store’s objectives are to offer these
unique beads to jewelry designers, beginner jewelers, and anyone who
appreciates rare world goods. While its primary service is bead retail, Bead
Nation will also sell necklaces and offer classes and workshops. 


Success
of Bead Nation will be a direct result of its ability to mobilize to popular
districts and festivals, its unique inventory, as well as its pleasant and
beautiful atmosphere. The shop, designed by Little Mansions, will inspire
creativity and foster a community where artists can relate to and encourage one
another. Bead Nation will primarily be located in a designated mobile vendor
space positioned in the now popular Alberta Arts District of Portland, Oregon
and will occasionally travel to festivals. The shop will be entirely powered by
solar energy. 


Portland’s
rich mobile vendor culture has become a well-known phenomenon and is part of
what makes Portland fun, quirky, and habitable. Vendor ‘pods’ draw people and
add vibrancy to empty lots and districts. Mobile shops also afford creative
entrepreneurs the ability to establish micro-businesses while offering
customers unique options at a reasonable price. 


Having
visited hundreds of bead stores and booths, I have the experience to suitably determine
fair purchasing and retail prices. Bead Nation will carry reasonably priced and
unique beads. The mobile shop will draw in jewelers, creative makers, and the general
public. With a line of high-quality stone pendants and a variety of rosary
chain, anyone can easily craft a simple, exquisite necklace. Bead Nation will also
serve as a boutique with a small line of hand-crafted necklaces constructed by Moray Creative Adornment (MORAY).



To
inspire a passion for jewelry making, classes will be offered once a month on
general beading, Mala bead or meditation necklaces, hammered metal clasps and
charms, wire wrapping, freeform bezels, and other specialized techniques
depending on customer interests. Open workshops will take place in the evenings
once each week, where customers will be assisted with selecting beads and
creating jewelry in an open bead session. As a mobile enterprise, customers will
also have the ability to hire Bead Nation to travel to private events and
parties and host bead workshops. 











SOCIAL IMPACT


Social
impact is a foundation of the Bead Nation philosophy, which seeks to enable
indigenous cultures to continue their ancient craft of design and adornment. With
each donation, please feel empowered to support one of these ambitious non-profit
organizations that reflect Bead Nation’s ideals and inventory. By specifying in your order which of these three organization you wish to support, 5% of the donation will go directly to the non-profit of choice.





Supports tuition to attendees of the
Street Business School. This program works with impoverished women in Uganda,
and gives them the confidence and the know-how to succeed as entrepreneurs in
their local markets. The program empowers women to transform their lives.
Learn more here.




Portland’s own Native American Youth and
Family Center whose mission is to enhance the diverse strengths of our youth
and families in partnership with the community through cultural identity and
education. Through their Marketplaces, native art, jewelry and craft items from
intertribal community vendors are sold to support the Portland Youth and
Elders’ Council to raise funds for various programs and events. Learn more here.




Promotes sustainable fair trade by
providing fair wages and employment opportunities to low-income artisans. The
program works with over 20 cooperatives and small businesses that use
traditional Maya techniques to create unique, handmade products. Your support
not only provides an income for these artisans, but also supports community
development projects in Guatemala. Learn more here.





YOUR HELP



Help
me realize this dream and support local and indigenous communities and crafters
worldwide! Competitive advantages that Bead Nation offers range from its unique
mobility, ecologically sustainable and exotic atmosphere; to its ideal
location. Bead Nation’s rare and fairly-priced beads, workshops, and classes will
greatly benefit Portland’s Alberta Arts District community and visitors. As a
mobile store, it will add to and inspire other mobile vendors to build vibrant
and creative communities.


Mobile Storefront:
$28,000 -
Includes Design Fee, Cost to Build, Trailer Bed, and Solar Installation. 


The
structure itself was designed by and will be built by Seattle-based company
Little Mansions, that specializes in creating miniature store-front looking
studio spaces. Bead Nation will not need utilities such as water and will be
otherwise environmentally sustainable by using solar-powered, rooftop panels. Bead
Nation will have the appearance of other local stores built in the Alberta Arts
District neighborhood, but will be slightly more exotic with Moroccan-influenced
architectural details. Due to the popularity of the now-thriving Alberta
community, retail space prices as a start-up business are dauntingly high. To
get off the ground, Bead Nation needs your help in funding this unique and
sustainable storefront! 


Administrative
Expenses: $6,000 -
Includes shop furniture, register and book-keeping technology, first month’s
space rent, general liability insurance, and graphic design.


I’m
starting with little financing, which means I need all of the help I can get! Items
like counter-tops on which beads will be placed, I-pad technology and ShopKeep
book-keeping software, a typical vendor-space rent of $495, insurance, and graphic
design will make all the difference. These essential items will set Bead Nation
off on the shining path to success!


Opening Inventory:
$4,000+
- Includes Base Supply of Beads and Supplies for Customers


Bead
Nation needs beads. In addition to the amount I’ve worked at saving, this sum
will fund a base supply so that jewelry designers are able to pick from exotic

sizes, colors, and finishes, as well as carefully-selected findings and chain
for finishing any high-quality jewelry. In addition, necessary craft items such
as pliers, wire, and cord will be available. Any money raised in addition to
the $4,000 will go toward supplementing this base supply of beads and supplies
for customers.




PERKS!

community!
