story:
Short Summary

We are Confederate Label, LLC, a company based in Huntsville, Alabama. We've found that with the recent controversy over the Confederate Flag, the demand for the flag has increased. However, the controversy has also caused most American flag manufacturers to stop production of the Confederate Flag, causing the supply to decrease. We believe that the Confederate Flag is a symbol of Southern heritage and what it means today and not racism. Thus, our goal is to raise enough money to resolve the supply and demand issue currently facing our great nation. We would like to manufacture Confederate Flags in a small factory in Huntsville. This way we can help provide the desired Confederate Flags to our supporters, customers, and flag stores to help restore the supply. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need a minimum of $20,000 to start a factory in Huntsville, Alabama. This will fund the location, machinery, labor, and supplies. We expect to start shipping out high quality Confederate Flags in late August and the locally sourced ones by the end of the year.

The Impact

The impact of our company will be to show the world that we care about our Southern heritage and that the Confederate Flag is not a symbol of racism today. It will also prove that we can stand together against censorship and that we cannot be told which flag is okay to fly and which flag isn't allowed. 

Risks & Challenges

Our first shipments are supposed to be ready end of August 2015. However, we could experience production delays due to increasing demand. (Which technically is a good thing!) Our first shipments of Confederate Flags that will be made in our factory will be based on timelines for both legal hurdles and setup of the factory itself. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you support us, but can't make a financial contribution, please share Confederate Label and our campaign on any social media outlets to get our story out there! Others may be able to contribute and help us reach our goal. We appreciate any support you are able to offer!

story:
Empowering Poor Women and Youth through Handicraft and Needlework Training

1  Introduction

The Palestinian Association for Development and Heritage Protection is a leading association in Palestine, founded in 2001 to protect and preserve the Palestinian heritage through festivals, booklets and magazines about heritage, Dabka training for children and young girls, singing traditional songs, and organizing various specialized training courses in the field of handcrafts and needlework.

The association aims to raise the level of the awareness about the Palestinian popular heritage as well as empowering poor women and youth to generate income and earn their living through handicraft training.

2  Project Description

This project’s main goal is to qualify adult women and youth within ages of (18 – 35 years) on the vocational handcrafts to a high level of experience and professionalism to preserve the Palestinian heritage especially in the fields of manual clothes and carpets.

The project will include Training of 40 young men and woman to utilize and to be familiar with handcrafts tools and equipment.

3  Project Objectives

1. Empowering women and youth to use the new skills in production of handicraft and generate income.

2. Preserving the Palestinian handcrafts.

4  Project's Period

The period is 4 months:

- Preparations

- Training:

The training will be conducted 6 days /week, and 5 hours / day over a period of 3 weeks. , i.e. each training course will need 90 hours.

- Production:

After finishing the training, the production phase will start over 3 weeks (6 days/week and 5 hours/day), at the same time this phase will be under supervision of the trainers. There will be 90 production hours for each course.

- Evaluation and Final Exhibition: The products will be shown at the Association technical exhibition at the end of the project. 

5  Project Sustainability

The association will work on sustainability of the project through:

- The work will be done at the workshops of the handicrafts place in uniform manner and periodically.

- Marketing of products will be the responsibility of the association, and the revenue will cover the rewards to youth and the women who worked at the project.

- The project will create an income to the trained youth and women and the association, which will contribute in association's development.
- The trained youth and the women will train new women from the same age group.

- The revenue of the exhibition and selling the products will design new activities for other women and youth.

Expected Budget

Trainers: 3,500 USD

Raw materials (Wool, cloth, etc.): 4,000 USD

Tools & Equipment: 700 USD

Media Materials: (Brochure, Poster, Advert. & Invitation cards, Heritage exhibition), 700 USD

Transportation and Communications: 300 USD

Allowances for trainees, 2,800 USD

TOTAL: 12,000 USD



Appendices

1. The association building photos


2. The previous similar projects

story:
The Short Story

I am an independent filmmaker (www.diyfilmmaker.blogspot.com), web designer/digital marketer, and a bookseller.  I've lived in Sunset Park, Brooklyn for about 5 years now and have always loved living here (specially due to the amazing view from the park). I've always been a big fan of used bookstores and have felt that the Sunset Park area would be better if it had a great used bookstore.   At present my book sales work includes selling used books wholesale to stores & also selling to on-line dealers.  While doing so I've discovered sources for a virtually unlimited supply of great used books for real world/brick & mortar bookstores - all subjects, all interests.  And I have over a decade of experience working in bookstores (used bookstores mostly, also Barnes & Noble, Borders).  And I think used bookstores (or new bookstores for that matter) are awesome, and can be a great asset to a community.  Sunset Park, Brooklyn area could use a great bookstore with community events, special sections geared towards our diverse community, and special collections that would be of interest to people from all over NYC.  So I am launching this campaign to gauge interest in the project, meet potential collaborators, meet potential customers for the store, and to raise some of the money needed for a bookstore project.  In the days and weeks to come I'll add images and videos to this campaign to help flesh out my vision for this new, amazing Sunset Park bookstore.  Let's put on our visionary hats and think about what we can do for this project and start collaborating!
- Sujewa Ekanayake, 8/13/15, www.wilddinermedia.com

That's me at the 59th St subway station in Sunset Park.  And someone's cup of coffee.
*

This is a photo of a used bookstore in Manhattan.  We can have something similar but better in Sunset Park, Brooklyn.
*
What I Need & What You Get

I need your support - in all forms that you can offer - enthusiasm, words of support & encouragement, (when the time comes) donations of items I'll need to put the bookstore together (furniture, etc), money to cover expenses associated with running a bookstore, people to work at the bookstore, people to spread the word about the existence of the bookstore, etc.

In return I will give you books!  And hopefully a new bookstore in Sunset Park, Brooklyn in the near future.  At present I have a collection of 8,000 used books, & I can get thousands more at a short notice.  All who donate to this project will be able to choose books that they might want to get, from my collection.  I'll post up a list of available books & other details when the time comes to fulfill rewards.

*

One of the perks pictured below.  Hundreds of other great books & also fun & useful books will be given out as perks.

*
Some of these books will be perks.

*
Also all who donate will be considered Founding Members of the Bookstore Project, & will be added (if they wish) to an on-line list on the store's website, & to a Wall of Founders in the physical bookstore.  So, that would be a cool thing to tell people -  that you helped to create a bookstore in a town that did not have a bookstore.

The $24,000 being raised through this campaign and any money raised above that goal will go towards the first year's rent at the store and then towards any other essential expenses.  I'll provide updates on how the money gets used as the project progresses.  I want to build a self-sustaining store that covers all of its expenses through store sales, however, to get things started, the money raised here will go a very long way.

That's 870 books from a recent wholesale sale to a customer.  At the loading dock of one of my book storage places, in New Jersey.

*

The Impact

Having another real world/physical/brick & mortar bookstore in this world will be an overall positive thing in itself.

The Sunset Park, Brooklyn community will get a new space for performing art, a new meeting place, and overall an interesting new place to go to & explore new ideas & subjects & or to find some old familiar books & ideas once again.

Books, & information in general, are amazing & powerful things.  Who knows what the ultimate & long term impact of a bookstore in a community might be?  Perhaps writers & activists & business people of the future from Sunset Park will discover their passion because of a book they found in our store - entirely possible.

This sun drenched image of a pier at Sunset Park waterfront is a symbol for the positive effect that the bookstore may have on the community.

*

Risks & Challenges

Creating a new bookstore is a lot of work.  However, it has been done countless times before by others & there is a lot of information available on how to do it well. So, I believe all of the following challenges can be overcome.  Here's a list of challenges or let's just call them 2 Do items: 1) raise the necessary money, 2) find a great space for the bookstore, 3) find great people to work at the store, 4) find great books (DONE), 5) find any other merchandise that the store wants to carry, 5) get the word out about the store, 6) run the store well, make it financially self-sustaining, & meet the goal of being useful to the community.  I don't think that there are any great risks.  I already have the books (or can get hundreds of thousands of books fast at a very low cost), & I believe that with my experience in the used bookstore business I will be able to successfully meet all challenges associated with this project with the help of friends & people in my community.

*

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about this project.  Let people know so that any interested souls will be able to connect with me and may be able to help me bring the vision of a community bookstore in Sunset Park, Brooklyn to life.  Thanks!
story_txt:
The Short Story

I am an independent filmmaker (www.diyfilmmaker.blogspot.com), web designer/digital marketer, and a bookseller.  I've lived in Sunset Park, Brooklyn for about 5 years now and have always loved living here (specially due to the amazing view from the park). I've always been a big fan of used bookstores and have felt that the Sunset Park area would be better if it had a great used bookstore.   At present my book sales work includes selling used books wholesale to stores & also selling to on-line dealers.  While doing so I've discovered sources for a virtually unlimited supply of great used books for real world/brick & mortar bookstores - all subjects, all interests.  And I have over a decade of experience working in bookstores (used bookstores mostly, also Barnes & Noble, Borders).  And I think used bookstores (or new bookstores for that matter) are awesome, and can be a great asset to a community.  Sunset Park, Brooklyn area could use a great bookstore with community events, special sections geared towards our diverse community, and special collections that would be of interest to people from all over NYC.  So I am launching this campaign to gauge interest in the project, meet potential collaborators, meet potential customers for the store, and to raise some of the money needed for a bookstore project.  In the days and weeks to come I'll add images and videos to this campaign to help flesh out my vision for this new, amazing Sunset Park bookstore.  Let's put on our visionary hats and think about what we can do for this project and start collaborating!
- Sujewa Ekanayake, 8/13/15, www.wilddinermedia.com



That's me at the 59th St subway station in Sunset Park.  And someone's cup of coffee.
*

This is a photo of a used bookstore in Manhattan.  We can have something similar but better in Sunset Park, Brooklyn.
*

What I Need & What You Get

 I need your support - in all forms that you can offer - enthusiasm, words of support & encouragement, (when the time comes) donations of items I'll need to put the bookstore together (furniture, etc), money to cover expenses associated with running a bookstore, people to work at the bookstore, people to spread the word about the existence of the bookstore, etc.
In return I will give you books!  And hopefully a new bookstore in Sunset Park, Brooklyn in the near future.  At present I have a collection of 8,000 used books, & I can get thousands more at a short notice.  All who donate to this project will be able to choose books that they might want to get, from my collection.  I'll post up a list of available books & other details when the time comes to fulfill rewards.
*
One of the perks pictured below.  Hundreds of other great books & also fun & useful books will be given out as perks.

*Some of these books will be perks.
*Also all who donate will be considered Founding Members of the Bookstore Project, & will be added (if they wish) to an on-line list on the store's website, & to a Wall of Founders in the physical bookstore.  So, that would be a cool thing to tell people -  that you helped to create a bookstore in a town that did not have a bookstore.

story:
Short Summary

So I am stuck in my apartment in a scary new country. I just moved to Okinawa, Japan from Australia with what little money I could scrounge and there isn't much left.

So some friends suggested that they would be happy to support a crowd funding campaign to buy me a car. I am not big on begging but I am also really sick of being stuck in my apartment and not entirely sure how I will get to work on Monday. If you wanted to get me a farewell present but knew I was moving with limited baggage allowance then this might be for you.

There are no trains on Okinawa and the monorail is of little use to anyone outside of Naha (the biggest city in Okinawa). As we speak my colleagues are asking a random student who lives near me how to get to work until I can afford a car. They spent about an hour but were unable to find a route themselves via the internet and I have minimal Japanese reading ability so I was much less successful. Apparently the walk is around two hours in the hot, Okinawan sun. I suggested I could at least walk the journey home but my coordinator said it was so hot she wasn't sure it would be safe; I really hope it doesn't come to that. I need a car.

Edit: After much searching we found a couple busses for me to catch. It takes an hour even though its more like 15-20 minutes by car. But even so I still need a car because as it stands school is the ONLY place I can get to.

What We Need & What You Get

Cars here are not too expensive. Compared to Australia at least, and I am only looking at crappy ones. I can get one for around 8-9man, maybe even less if I go really bodgy. A man is about AUD$110. The other expense is the insurance which could be up to 7man but will depend on the car. It will probably be less but its very hard to know. It seems really unfair to have to get insurance for almost the same price as the car itself, but I have been told it is compulsory. This fee is for two years though. Other than that there isn't really anything else I need. Of course money is tight and if by some miracle I did get more money I could buy a toaster. I miss toast already. I have been eating my Vegemite on plain bread, which in Japan is not that tasty unfortunately. But yeah I am not expecting to get that much money, I am just saying money is tight and ANYTHING I get will go to something really awesome and make me feel really grateful for awesome friends. (To be honest I mostly wanted to drop the Vegemite reference in there YAY Australia!)

I am not going to lie, you don't get much out of this. Its mostly for me. If you visit me here in Okinawa I can probably drive you somewhere on the weekends when I don't have work but mostly you will probably have to content yourself with knowing that I am driving around being awesome in another country with your name written in my car. If that's your kinda thing then go for it!

The Impact

Well I am not pretending this is some community service. Like I think I am cool and I like to think I will spread mostly good vibes once freed from the prison of my  transportation woes, but at the end of the day this is just a thing for people who want to do something nice for me. I have already been helped so much by strangers and friends alike, most of the strangers became friends and it has already been such an adventure. I was just really touched that my friend wanted to give me money for something so selfish. If anyone else is like her and wants to contribute, all I can say is I will remember you when I am driving my car and always cherish the feeling of driving a car bought with friendship. Also I will cherish that non cabin fever feeling. It's the little things you always take for granted.

Risks & Challenges

Well, I have to buy a car either way. But I guess its risky because I don't know much about cars and I could buy a really crappy car. I can speak some Japanese but not really on the phone so if I break down that would be AWFUL. The main risk is just that I accidentally buy a bad car or one that needs a crazy amount for insurance. I do have people with native Japanese helping me though on this end so hopefully this wont happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

Look, asking for money for stuff for me is pretty selfish. You don't have to contribute. But if you feel bad for me all alone, stuck in my apartment in such a scary place (actually its really nice just hard to communicate) you can always skype me. Especially if you are from Australia, cause I don't want to come back with an American accent. (I am the only Australian JET participant in Okinawa that I have met so far).
Just keep in contact with me, sometimes I am too scared to initiate but I am almost always up for a chat if I am not busy.

Well thanks for reading the whole thing. I like thorough people! Good job, you will go far in life.

story:
As President of McAllister Practice Management, Joshua McAllister brings over 8 years of management experience to his position. Joshua McAllister managed multiple departments with budgets well over $10 million. Joshua McAllister is more than capable of leading McAllister Practice Management to the Number 1 billing and claims processing firm in Michigan. Joshua McAllister will handle the initial startup of the company including doing research on companies, competition, and market analysis. Once we have reached a number of clients that will allow us to support ourselves (about 6 clients), Christina McAllister will leave her current position and begin working solely for McAllister Practice Management.

McAllister Practice Management is a professional, full-service agency dedicated to helping medical professionals become more efficient and save money by managing their insurance and patient billing needs. We will offer a variety of personalized services by September 30 designed to meet the needs of individual and small group practices. In addition to premium claims processing and practice management services, we will proudly offer solutions that will include electronic file claims processing, Electronic Medical Records generation, robust reporting and practice analysis, Electronic Fund Transfer for quick payment, software and hardware sales and support, billing and code analysis, collection services, remote data backup, digital scanning and document management.  We will continue to grow and develop through the different services offered and by building relationships with our clients through the quality of our service. We will balance our client base in order to ensure that each client will receive our complete attention.  We see the service we offer as helping the Doctor spend more time focusing on improving and maintaining the patient's health and less time on administrative functions necessary to run a financially successful practice.

McAllister Practice Management target market consists of any medical practice or health care delivery unit that utilizes the HCFA-1500 format (a national standard utilized by Medicare) for submission of claims. This includes family practice, internal medicine, surgeons, psychologists, chiropractors, physical therapists, podiatrists, specialists, ambulance services, medical laboratories, etc. McAllister Practice Management will concentrate on specialists such as cardiologists and chiropractors with 10 employees or fewer. We will target the smaller, independent practices. McAllister Practice Management can also process claims for dentists with the use of special ADA software.

New practices are particularly appealing as McAllister Practice Management can assist the new physician and his or her staff in billing and claims training. By equipping the physicians with a well trained staff in claims handling and putting an efficient billing program into place, McAllister Practice Management can reduce the stress of startup and ensure greater likelihood of a practice's success due in part to increased cash flow and more efficient workflow management.

story:
A girl called Ma

Once upon a time there was a girl (let's call her Ma) who was born to wealthy landowners in rural India. As she grew up, her interest in skin care deepened, and she would often be found hunting the surrounding land for nature's bounty to beautify her skin. 


After she was married, the young couple moved to the city, Mumbai then called Bombay. As finances were restricted, she could only afford part time domestic help. The maid she employed also happened to work for a very well known Bollywood actress. Being the early 40s, filming was crude, and the harsh lighting would play havoc with the complexion of the poor actress. Being in great demand, and money no object, the actress consulted leading skin doctors and apothecaries to access the best formulae that nature has to offer. 

The maid observed her actress mistress applying the products with amazing results, and would share this with Ma, who painstakingly wrote down in her diary the ingredients and the meticulous method of blending them together. 

Fast forward many years and just before her death, Ma bequeathed the diary to Roselink, the contents to be formulated and marketed to empower and support the welfare of women.

The radiance and smoothness achieved instantly could only be termed 'Hello Glow' and thus the name. There is only copy of this diary, which lies safely in a vault.

The magic of the diary
As per Ma's wishes, we want to use these products as a platform for disadvantaged women to become entrepreneurs. We are already supporting a victim of domestic violence, who is now in a safe situation. She can now support herself through being our appointed agent, and distributing our products to retailers. The next step is to further empower women by giving them the opportunity to run their own beauty salons providing safe and natural skincare solutions. Through this initiative we will provide them with their own salons under a lease agreement which they will manage and repay with an easy instalment scheme designed specifically for this project. The funds generated will be used to lease further sites. We will help in promoting their salons by advertising through businesses run by other female entrepreneurs. This will therefore generate further funds for their businesses too.

Be part of the magic
Your contribution will facilitate the initial leasing of the premises and promote the women's businesses to consumers through advertising, branding and promotional materials. This will help ensure that their business thrives in a competitive market. With your funds, childcare will be provided to allow the women to work in a peaceful frame of mind. You will receive regular updates about how your help has changed lives of women who may otherwise have been in vulnerable and dangerous situations.

story:
In a historic turn in Australian politics, Online Direct Democracy (ODD) Party, Australia’s first online political party, a not for profit, contests the 2016 Federal Election with a contingent of candidates and an online voting platform!

Picketing, marching, signing petitions, will be replaced with a tap on our phones with a Yes, No or Abstain vote on Every Bill, using an exciting Internet Platform called POLLYWEB!

Pollyweb, the ODD voting platform will revolutionise the way we view politics, making politics easily accessible, transparent and engaging, even fun, whilst ensuring all the facts are presented to voters without prejudice, so that voting is informed. ODD senators & MP’s have committed in writing to vote as the majority direct on Every Bill.

'Get rid of the ballot boxes and pencils and save on the $100m it costs to run each federal election!' says Party Leader Francois Crespel.

With weeks to go until the election, the party is on a crowdfunding mission, without any major backing other than the people it vows to represent. 

Our party will make a difference to the Australian political system but we need your help.  At the moment we are a dedicated group of volunteers who work on building the capacity of the party using whatever spare time we have and the money from our own back pockets.  We truly are a party of the people.

To achieve our goal of giving people a say in parliament, we first need to get elected and our crowdfunding campaign intends to help achieve this by;

  • getting our name on the street
  • increasing our public profile
  • attracting candidates
  • assisting our candidates in meeting the costs associated with running as a candidate
We have estimated that it will cost at least $2,000 per candidate (House of Representatives) to run for the 2016 election.  With our current number of candidates at 10 and increasing weekly, we have set a modest target of $30,000 which will go towards Candidate AEC fees, how to vote cards and various other essential campaigning materials. 
We need as many people as possible talking about the potential of what we are doing.  We need likes on Facebook, we need people wearing our shirts, we need our stickers stuck on the back of peoples cars (please only stick them on your car :) ).  

We need as many advocates, volunteers and candidates as possible registering on our website to help us bring life back to Australian democracy.

If the major political parties are funded by the interest groups that they serve, it really does make sense that Online Direct Democracy should seek its funding from the people that it serves.  Everyday Australians.  Hence, crowdfunding. 

If you can't contribute $$$ to the movement, that's okay, we know that times are tough and we appreciate any help you can give us.  Anyone can help by:

  • partaking in this crowdfunding campaign
  • donating to the party directly
  • becoming a registered member of the party
  • volunteering for us
  • becoming a candidate
  • 'liking' and sharing our Facebook page and posts
  • letting everyone know about our Crowdfunding campaigns   

Above all, what Australia really needs is for people to sit up and get involved in the running of their country.  For too long we have trusted that the Government serves us in our best interests, we have been mislead.  Now it is time to put our complacency aside and get back in the game.  We can help you do that.  Get on board and we'll be standing with you at the finish line.

Your vote, your voice, your country, your choice.  

Online Direct Democracy - Empowering the people.

increasing our public profile

attracting candidates

assisting our candidates in meeting the costs associated with running as a candidate

We have estimated that it will cost at least $2,000 per candidate (House of Representatives) to run for the 2016 election.  With our current number of candidates at 10 and increasing weekly, we have set a modest target of $30,000 which will go towards Candidate AEC fees, how to vote cards and various other essential campaigning materials. 

We need as many people as possible talking about the potential of what we are doing.  We need likes on Facebook, we need people wearing our shirts, we need our stickers stuck on the back of peoples cars (please only stick them on your car :) ).  We need as many advocates, volunteers and candidates as possible registering on our website to help us bring life back to Australian democracy.
If the major political parties are funded by the interest groups that they serve, it really does make sense that Online Direct Democracy should seek its funding from the people that it serves.  Everyday Australians.  Hence, crowdfunding. 

    
If you can't contribute $$$ to the movement, that's okay, we know that times are tough and we appreciate any help you can give us.  Anyone can help by:





partaking in this crowdfunding campaign


donating to the party directly


becoming a registered member of the party


volunteering for us


becoming a candidate


'liking' and sharing our Facebook page and posts


letting everyone know about our Crowdfunding campaigns   





Above all, what Australia really needs is for people to sit up and get involved in the running of their country.  For too long we have trusted that the Government serves us in our best interests, we have been mislead.  Now it is time to put our complacency aside and get back in the game.  We can help you do that.  Get on board and we'll be standing with you at the finish line.
Your vote, your voice, your country, your choice.  
Online Direct Democracy - Empowering the people.

story:
taga10 Gets You The Dates You Really Want

                                    Here to revolutionize the dating industry.

Anyone who is looking for love in the digital age will know how much time is often wasted trawling through online profiles trying to decipher what “good sense of humor” and “loves puppies” really means. They will know that hours are wasted endlessly swiping away photos that are probably years out of date, wondering if that guy really thinks Photoshopping a kitten on to his shoulder will help him make a match.  

This random, throwaway attitude to dating is growing old and tired. Here at taga10 we think it’s time to shake things up a little.

We are excited to introduce our taga10 tags. Our classy little tags enable you to connect with people who you actually see in the real world! not just on a screen. If you’ve ever fancied someone you’ve sat next to on the train, at a party, in a bar, or walking down the street (which face it, is practically all of us) taga10 is for you.

                                    

 How Tagging Works

The tags are printed with an individual QR code. This means that once you have downloaded the free taga10 app you can scan the code and write your own message exclusively for that tag. You can also include images and your personal info, but that’s entirely up to you. Then it’s time to take a chance and have a bit of fun.

You discreetly attach the tag somewhere the person that you fancy will find it. Maybe on their bag strap or at their work station, or if you’re a little more daring, on their coat sleeve. When they discover the tag -and wonder what it is- they can scan the code and they will be directed to the app, and more importantly, your message.

This opens up a private sms chat session between just the two of you and allows you the opportunity to show off just how charming you can be. With a little luck this will lead to a first date with a difference.  

  SEE A 10... TAG A 10... START A CONVERSATION...

Our tags are like a digital Valentine’s card that can be used all year round. They are a way of showing someone you appreciate them, letting them know that they have a secret admirer who thinks they are a 10! It may be because you like the way someone looks or sounds, the way they dress, or the fact they are reading the same book as you. Now you can subtly show them how that makes you feel.
Say as much or as little as you want to begin with, it’s all about making connections in an exciting new way, based on real-life, real-time attraction.

Every tag we produce is unique so there’s no limit to how many people you can connect to. There’s also no limit to how you can use your taga10 tags. Maybe you’ll choose carefully, saving your tag for that one person you see on your way to work every day and wait patiently for the perfect tagging opportunity. Or maybe you are in the mood for a wild night so you ‘make it rain’ tags all night long in the club.

No matter how you choose to use your tags, the experience is special and often thrilling. Tagging shows you are willing to take a chance, to step outside the box, and to make a move. Whether you’re shy and looking for a way to start a conversation, or brimming with confidence and want to prove it, a tag will work for you.


                      The taga10 Tags and App

The taga10 tags are single use; they will be available for purchase via our app and from our website. Once an order is placed we will deliver the tags quickly and discreetly, and shipping is free. We have the capability to ship to 220 countries worldwide, which means unless you’re researching Polar Bear activity in the Arctic, you shouldn’t have to miss out.

The taga10 app has been designed to be clean, clear, and simple to use. With the single-touch, Facebook login function commonly used today it’s quick and easy to set up a profile. With a Facebook connection users can immediately access their photos for both their profile image and to attach to a tag message. The app is uncomplicated and easy to navigate for first-timers.  

Once someone has discovered a tag and scanned the code, the in-app SMS chat session that opens is in a recognizable format for anyone who owns a smart phone. In-app chat is not only a great ice breaker and a way to discover all you have in common, it is completely private and extremely safe. You don’t have to give away any personal information such as your phone number or email address unless you decide you want to.

No one can predict where you might meet someone you really fancy, but fortunately there is no limit to the places you can leave someone a taga10 tag. Take them with you to a bar, a festival, on holiday, to work, or just to the shops. The one for you is out there, so when you see them, be ready with a tag.

                       What We've Been Up To

For the past two years we have been developing a business strategy ready to spring onto the market for the world’s date seekers. We have manufactured tag tooling that will produce upwards of 8 million tags per month.

From the outset taga10 has been designed to be an e-commerce company. The  sleek box the tags come in is designed to fit through a standard letterbox. This drives down costs so we can offer free delivery.   

Our technical wizards have written a backend database based on a high velocity, high volume trading platform, so you can expect good high capacity performance. They’ve also been busy writing the IOS and Android apps. They have even rewritten the QR code reader so that in low light, at poor angles, or even with part of the code obscured they still read!

QR Code sequences are limitless so we’re ok to carry on producing for a few generations yet! Our coders have also written some very clever strings to prevent copycat tag producers too.

Our legal team have scoured volumes of international legal encyclopedias and have ensured we have tip top compliance and protection status. We also employ a Tag Responsibly scheme across the board which consistently promotes the safe use of our tags.

             

We've Come A Long Way But There Are Still Things To Do

It’s important that you know what we still need to complete before we are ready for launch and just what we are asking you to help us work towards:

  • We want to make sure the taga10 app looks, and handles perfectly. As we said before simplicity is king and thankfully because of the stage we are at it shouldn’t take us long to have this done.
  • We want to create the design for the artwork that will be displayed on the taga10 box in which the tags will be delivered.
  • We need to finish up the design of a few of the infographics.
  • We have to purchase the machine that puts the QR code label on the tag at high speed. Then we need to produce launch stock and a warehouse full to sell.
  • We need to continue growing our social media campaigns across multiple platforms and our traditional media campaigns and maybe some untraditional ones too.
  • We also want to continue with research and pre-production for a taga10 television show to rival the dating shows airing currently and for the production of a documentary following our journey.  

Then there are the parties…. Our experienced events team have outdone themselves with their ideas for taga10 parties, all over the world. We would love to invite all of you to come to our parties and let your hair down. You may meet your 10 on the bus, but you could also meet them at one of our parties too, who knows? If you’re not there you’ll never know.

                      Friends We'd Like To Meet

Are you a celebrity in your country? Are you a blogger? Do you promote a club? Do you produce TV, film or radio? If you share our enthusiasm for this innovative idea and think you could help us move forward, please share our story and get in touch.
 
Would you like to resell our tags in your shops or clubs? We can give you great margin, so talk to us and tell us your thoughts.

Have you got what it takes to produce, promote and sell taga10 under licence in your country or region? We can switch you on with production capacity in about 4 months and you could ride the adoption curve with us. We’d love to hear from you if you believe this is for you.  

Would you like to talk to us about brand alignment? Do you promote a drink that would work well with our tags at live activations? Talk to us, we have lots of ideas here too.

Are you an investor who is looking for the next big thing and want to discuss an equity stake? Please chat to us so that we may discuss mutually beneficial terms of business.

If you have any questions at all don’t hesitate to contact us at info@taga10.com

      

                           SEE... TAG... CHAT...

story:
Why Is Got Your Six Transport needed?

Imagine being offered a good job but you have no transportation. This is the exact problem many of our homeless veterans face when living in veterans shelters. A meaningful job would be invaluable in helping our homeless vets, both emotionally and financially, as they strive to transition. Got Your Six Transport will provide the transportation to make this possibility a reality, and to help vets get back to work.

Advocates of homeless veterans agree that this is the exact type of program that is needed. Alternative traditional transportation is much too costly, and it cannot provide the consistency and reliability that the veterans and the prospective employers need. Vets who want to work can’t.

This campaign will support the establishment of the Got Your Six Transport organization as a non-profit organization, and get us started in our mission to help our vets get back to work.

What your support will mean to us:

A thorough and comprehensive business plan has already been completed and now we need your help.

All heartfelt non-profit services must have a beginning. You are in at the exciting start. Your donations will allow us to:

  • Pay for the expertise to set up the 501C-3 non-profit corporation, and get it off the ground;
  • Engage in the major fundraising needed to develop our program, including purchasing dedicated transportation vehicles, etc.;
  • Market our non-profit to spread awareness to those who need it, and to employers who want to hire vets;
  • Set up a website for Got Your Six Transport.

What your support will mean to vets:

The veterans and their families that are now homeless have sacrificed so much for us and our country. Now they need our support. They don’t want a handout – they want to be able to get to work so they can rebuild their lives. Helping Got Your Six Transport means that you will be helping vets re-enter the workforce. Vets have always had our backs – now it’s time we have theirs.

This short video explains the goals of our non-profit’s mission, and includes a short commentary by an executive of a homeless veterans program. Listen to him talk about what Got Your Six Transport will mean to their homeless veterans.

https://youtu.be/UtJYqD6Wnv4

Stop by our Facebook page, Got Your Six Transport. Let us hear your story. Watch our progress.

Our Mission:

To provide free and reliable transportation to eligible veterans’ shelter residents so they can hold a job.

story:
After Ebola, Sierra Leone is coming back to life little by little, and now tourists are returning to its beaches, to its forests and, above all, to the smiles of its people, who, after nearly two years of social and economic restrictions, want to embrace opportunity. Now, businesses reopen their doors and new ones are born.

Star Shop is one of them: a new shop for food and drinks that will open its doors on the wave of enthusiasm of three enterprising women. The shop will provide spices, rice, oil, fruits, vegetables, packaged foods, drinks and other goods to the community, wholesale and retail, from the shop or delivered to the home, and all accompanied by background music, friendliness, helpfulness and smiles. A small shop with great heart.

Born and raised in the Malama district (Freetown), the three Star Shop women, Mariama, Mbalu and Isha, have done many different jobs and are experienced in the business of making and selling clothing and shoes, cleaning houses and offices, and childcare. These jobs were often sporadic and poorly paid. Now, they have decided to become masters of their own lives, to no longer wait on the offerings of fate. They have decided to create their own success!

"We are pleased to introduce Star Shop because we are looking for funds to finance the startup of the business, and the first year of activity, during which the shop will establish its base and grow and consolidate business."

The picture you see above is the door of our store. They have already rented the space and now they are doing the work to complete it: the floor, furniture, counter and more.

"We want to purchase a good fridge freezer, for chilling drinks (including homemade juices such as bissap and ginger beer). To run the refrigerator we need electricity and to install the meter, which is expensive, but with your contribution we'll make it happen. Later we will also buy a small diesel generator to make up for the shortcomings of Sierra Leone’s national power-grid."

With this initial fund-raising campaign they are asking you to contribute to rental costs and the purchase of goods so you can open the doors of Star Shop with them and usher in the start of this new and exciting journey. They will repay your generosity by labeling parts of the shop and its goods after you, so whoever sees them knows you helped make this happen.

"Keep smiling and have a nice journey!"

story:
Aloha friends and family, I need your help!

As most of you know, I am never done with the adventure! I just spent a year in Thailand teaching English, and flew back to the Big Island for a dream wilderness therapist job, which I would be helping kids struggling with emotional disorders by taking them on tours throughout the island. Unfortunately, It just so happens that PELE didn’t want me (goddess of the volcano) and my job fell through almost immediately. I was so lucky and fortunate that I had Kalani, the yoga retreat I used to live at, house me and feed me for free, with the opportunity of getting an old housekeeping position back. But---my yearning to be a tour guide kept coming up, and this period of UPHEAVAL became too hard to ignore. As much as I love my OHANA and all the amazing beautiful people that catapulted me to this higher version of me, I just can’t ignore the calling.  So after putting all my feelers back out into the world I got another tour guide job back in South East Asia, and received the news that I would need to be back in Thailand by July 2....Hooray! SCARY!

The one caveat is that this new job is not paid until the end of the trail, and it’s only a small stipend with travel, food, and lodging for free. The setback of the job loss in Hilo has put me back exponentially, and I could use any small or big donation your heart desires. The experience I will gain will be far better than anything I could have even imagined for myself, and I am for sure going to be spreading the joy and fun that I always do. What will I be doing? I will be leading volunteers on an Ethical Adventure tour throughout Thailand, Cambodia, and Vietnam in which we will be working on farms, doing beach conservation projects, visiting an elephant sanctuary, and teaching English in a small village that is in need of teachers, amongst a ton of other eco-activities. All of the activities I will be leading will be giving back to the countries we will be visiting and really benefit the traveler’s lives as well. I personally will gain the responsibility (I like that word now!) of managing budgets, coordinating the lodging arrangements, possibly doing some late night babysitting, and of course getting my crew from place to place safely and with positive attitudes. For once in my life I feel the preparation and timing of past skills that have met up with me, and this is the job I need to step into that which is gonna open up doors and access those more disciplined sides of me, that I very rarely.... eek.... express.

So if the fact that I am asking for money is making your cringe, ha.... by no means read any further. STOP NOW!  But if u perhaps feel a little called to help, I would be sincerely grateful. The proceeds would go to my vaccinations, travel insurance, and a working phone. I promise I will be paying it forward by teaching people that anything is possible, and CONTRAST and RESISTANCE are just those universal signs that mean your knocking on the wrong doors. So here I go....doing something bat-shit crazy again. Feels good. :)

For once in my life I feel the preparation and timing of past skills that have met up with me, and this is the job I need to step into that which is gonna open up doors and access those more disciplined sides of me, that I very rarely.... eek.... express.So if the fact that I am asking for money is making your cringe, ha.... by no means read any further. STOP NOW!  But if u perhaps feel a little called to help, I would be sincerely grateful. The proceeds would go to my vaccinations, travel insurance, and a working phone. I promise I will be paying it forward by teaching people that anything is possible, and CONTRAST and RESISTANCE are just those universal signs that mean your knocking on the wrong doors. So here I go....doing something bat-shit crazy again. Feels good. :)

story:
Short Summary

Aloha, my name is Micah Alo. I am 19 years old and the founder of Alo[ha] Creations. Before starting my business, I graduated from Kamehameha Schools Maui Campus and continued my education at Dominican University of California . Due to financial difficulties, I was only able to attend school for one semester. After my time at Dominican, I chose to pursue one of my greatest passions, soccer. I did tryouts with the Portland Timbers u23 squad and was able to train with the team. I played in the team's stadium as well as training centers, it was an amazing experience that I will never forget. Shortly after my time with the Timbers, I returned home and pursued another one of my life-long goals, which was starting a business.

Alo[ha] Creations is a Christian family-run business. We were meant to give. We support local youth teams with our product for fundraising events. There are also two ways we share a portion of our profits; one locally and the other internationally. Locally we support Made In Hope which is a non-profit organization. MADE IN HOPE empowers women and children who have been rescued from the global sex trade (sex trafficking) to break the cycle of exploitation and secure their freedom by providing education, sustainable livelihood opportunities, and care in the healing process. Internationally we give to a small village in Uganda called Bujjuuko Mbazi. Along with the help of Father Leonard Ssempijja, we are able to give the youth and people of Bujjuuko Mbazi the hope and help they need . 

Aside from helping us take our facility to the required next step. The social impact Alo[ha] Creations will have on the lives of these people and children will be morally and spiritually life changing. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are in need of $40,000. The septic tank will cost around $8,000-$10,000. The specific tank we need will cost $2400. We have gotten quotes from two contractors who are willing to take on the project of installing the tank. Both quotes are in the ball park of $6,000-$7,000. The oven we are looking at is a double decker oven that will hold 20 racks of cookies. Currently our oven has 3 racks with a make-shift rack, and is only able to make five dozen cookies an hour. With this new oven we will be able to increase our production to 25 dozen cookies and hour. With great benefit comes great cost. This oven will cost $12,000. To complete the kitchen with all the necessary supplies and appliances we are looking at another $15,000-$20,000. These appliances will include: G-series Reach in Refrigerator, Fabricated Economy 3-compartment Stainless Steel Sink, Equipment Stainless Steel Stands, Stainless Steel Shelving, Stainless Steel professional mixer, and lastly a hand-washing sink. 

(Prototype of the Alo[ha] Creations' Certified Kitchen) design gratis by Deborah Jablonski).

We are offering five great perks in appreciation for our generous donors!

Perk #1 will be for our $50 donors. These kind donors  will be recognized for their donations on our website Donor Page and will receive an Appreciation Picture following our trip to Uganda this summer.  

Perk #2 will be for our $100 donors. These kind-er donors  will be recognized for their donations on our website Donor Page and will receive an Appreciation Picture following our trip to Uganda this summer. These donors will also receive a Jar of Rochelle's Famous Guava Jam.

Perk #3 will be for our $500 donors. These generously-kind donors  will be recognized for their donations on our website Donor Page and will receive an Appreciation Picture following our trip to Uganda this summer. These donors will also receive a Jar of Rochelle's Famous Guava Jam. Plus, will receive an Alo[ha] Creations T-Shirt made on Maui. 

Perk #4 will be for our $1000 donors. These generously-kind-and-grand donors  will be recognized for their donations on our website Donor Page and will receive an Appreciation Picture following our trip to Uganda this summer. These donors will also receive a Jar of Rochelle's Famous Guava Jam. Plus, will receive an Alo[ha] Creations T-Shirt made on Maui. Topped off with a best selling bag of Rochelle's Famous Chocolate-Chip Cookies.

Perk #5 will be for our $2500 donors. These over-the-top-generously-kind donors will receive a picture of the children and people in Uganda receiving the gifts that their support has made possible. As an added bonus you will receive 5 bags of Rochelle's cookies, a Pint of both Guava and Pog Jam, and a Alo[ha] Creations T-shirt. Lastly you will get a custom 8x10 canvas painting of your choice done by one of our artist. These donors also will have their name displayed in a frame in our Alo[ha] Creations Kitchen. 

With your help all proceeds from this Campaign will go towards building our certified kitchen and blessing the lives of as many people as possible.

Risks & Challenges

For me risk is something I view as a challenge rather than something that can discourage me. If there was no risk then there would be no sense of fulfillment or meaning. Everyday is a challenge and there is a risk in everything we do. Even something as simple as walking across the street. I realize that each of you are taking a risk in investing in my campaign. Rest assured it will not be in vain. Together we have the opportunity to face head on some of the big challenges that this world faces today. Namely, human/sex trafficking, and poverty. Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign, together we can make a real difference. Change is one click away. Thank you and God bless.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not able to contribute through money, that doesn't mean you can't help. Please spread the word about our mission and campaign. Every contribution (time or money) will be a huge help. Thanks.

story:
With today’s constant pressure to be connected and working within busy environments, comfort and privacy are rarely an option.

Whether you’re scavenging for power outlets at the airport, rubbing shoulders at the coffee shop, or trying to find a seat in the waiting room, finding peace can be a burden.

eCapsula is a portable work, lounge and meeting space designed with comfort, privacy and connectivity in mind. From ideation to engineering, design and production, we are determined to change the way people work and rest while on the go.

eCapsula’s streamlined design compliments a variety of high-traffic locations like airports, hospitals, universities, shopping malls, public parks and more. Users can simply sign up with our mobile app, purchase an available time slot, and take advantage of eCapsula’s variety of features. You can enjoy wifi, tv, and gaming from our comfortable recliner seating . And from the outside, passers-by will notice built-in digital advertising screen, allowing advertisers to use eCapsula to share their message with the public.

Built with durable, non-toxic materials, eCapsula is equipped with a fully-adjustable climate control and air purification system. This ensures personalized comfort during use. And should something go wrong, we’ve included a range of high-tech safety features including distress signals, motoring sensors, emergency power, and quick evacuation plans. eCapsule can even contact local 911 services automatically.

eCapsula will have a website and mobile apps allowing users to book time on the spot or in advance. You will be able to find the closest eCapsula as well as other useful features.

Make video calls from the eCapsula you're in, to any other eCapsula, or any mobile device anywhere in the world. Calls, video conferencing and even gaming.
 

eCapsula Key Fob will allow you to unlock and use eCapsula with ease. It is connected to your account and controlled via web and mobile.

Smartphone and Tablet eCapsula's app allows users to control many features while inside.

Comfortable and functional interior with dimming lights, reclining and moving seats, complete privacy and a number of useful services and features at your disposal.

Each eCapsula is equipped with a large outside digital billboard that allows to streamline marketing and advertising campaigns for 3rd party content providers. Ultimately all eCapsula's will become part of a large network for digital distribution and advertising.


* concept & architectural rendering for presentation purposes only

Obviously every new idea and concept (especially disruptive ideas and concepts) have certain risks and challenges associated with them. We know that. eCapsula is a new concept, however, all it’s parts from hardware to software are all based on existing modern technologies. We are not reinventing a wheel. We are combining existing technologies into a single useful and functional unit. That is not to say that there are no challenges facing our team. We have plenty. We are working very hard on designing and developing the most efficient, functional and safe model, that people will enjoy using. 

What is eCapsula?
eCapsula is a private digital enclave with functional features and services in high traffic areas for work or rest. 
Who is it for?
Everyone!
What can I do inside eCapsula? 
Work, play or rest, safely and privately. You have unlimited access to WiFi, TV, Game console, Bluetooth, Surround sound, Charging station and many other features and services. You can conduct meetings in person or over the internet (including video), catch up on work, watch a movie, do homework, play the latest games, or even sleep in comfort. 
Where and when will the first eCapsula be located?

Initially, eCapsula's are planned to be available in the airports, hospitals, universities, public parks, shopping malls and business centers. 
We are planning to have the first operational eCapsula ready for the public use in Chicago in May 2017. Location will be announced in 3rd quarter 2016.
2017 - 2019 - United States of America.
2020 - Worldwide.

How much will it cost to use eCapsula? 
We are currently projecting costs to be around $20 per hour of use. 
Are there any restrictions on the use of eCapsula?
We’re planning on 30-min increments, with a minimum of 30 minutes and a maximum of 4 hours per user per time.

How will I be able to use the free hours I receive with my contribution and are there any restrictions?
You can use your complimentary hours any time based on real-time availability, in any eCapsula, there is no expiration date.

__

But today, it’s only a concept. We need your help to make the eCapsula a reality. We’re trying to raise enough funding to build the first eCapsula and give the world a hands-on experience with the future of comfort.

We believe that eCapsula will become a common part of the contemporary landscape. We hope that you feel the same way and back our project.

story:
Summary

Hello, my name is John Zanettos and I'm the owner and operator of The Man Cave Cinema. 

I am here to ask for funding for my small business that has the potential to grow. Currently I am working on several items for my business.

  • My Blog themancavecinmea.com informing the public about cord cutting and the technology behind it.
  • Online Store that sells Antenna and Over the Air DVR's to help people get free TV and cancel their expensive cable bill.
  • Installing Antennas and DVR's for people in Toronto Canada and the greater Toronto area.
  • Hosting an ongoing Youtube series that talks about cord cutting and home theater. Very educational and entertaining. 

What I Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for $2000.00 to help the company grow.
  • The funds will go to improve our presence on the internet and locally. 
  • During these tough financial times people are looking to cut costs and we can help them by selling and installing an antenna to get free TV and cancel cable. Our goal is to help!
  • If we do not meet our goal we can always use what ever money we receive to continue our work. We will never give up on this venture. It is too important not to pursue it. People need to know that there is another option to pay TV.

The Impact

The difference that your funding will make...

  • Offering people an alternative to expensive cable by selling inexpensive but excellent quality antennas. Saving them thousands of dollar each year.
  • Giving us the means to have happy and satisfied customers, who never have to worry about another cable bill again.
  • We have had some successful installations, here are a few pictures of my work.


  • Also selling directly to our customers from our online store.


Risks & Challenges

The major challenge for me is getting the word out to the public on how cord cutting will save you money, from high cable bills and that getting free TV from over the air is easy and worry free. Also people can catch 20-40 channels depending on the area they live.

  • The funding will go to advertising on social media and locally in the yellow pages.
  • Again the Challenge is getting people to know The Man Cave Cinema. Once they become familiar with us, we offer free in home demos or videos on youtube on how easy cord cutting can be. Once customers see with their own eye whats available they become believers. (Best part of the Job)

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out to everyone! Please share this campaign on social media and word of mouth.

We thank each and everyone of you in advance.

story:
Thank you for watching the video!         

                                                                    Fun video about Fairness in advertising

                                         Ukrainian version      Lithuanian version


We’ve revoliutionized the existing advertising system to make ads really helpful! We are building APM Chat to help local business to promote goods and services fairly and provide customers with the unique chance to cooperate with local businesses and understand that advertising is an essential tool to boost their local economy.

The result – a truly high level of customer satisfaction and loyalty!

I’ve been running my own small businesses successfully for quite a long time: I sell things that people need for their home. I love what I do because I feel I do a meaningful job. Yet I’ve faced every pitfall local entrepreneurs have to overcome to spread the word about their business.

Following marketing gurus’ advice, I was printing countless flyers and paid solicitors to stuff letterboxes of my potential clients with them. I was paying more and more money every day for social network advertising and invading people’s private space. No wonder the more ads I sent, the more ignorant my clients were. So I was struggling to find the answer why people get irritated by other people telling them about handy, interesting and even ingenious things. The answer came out of a sudden: people don’t mind ads – what they don’t like is the way they are delivered.

It was hight time I had to find a different way to address my customers. I understood I need to talk to them directly, without intermediaries, so that people see that I respect them and they can trust me. The result is www.adpays.me - an IT startup, the fruit of my and my team labor. The website has been translated into 10 languages and has been successfully launched, so it is available for businesses around the world.

Yet a dynamic business world dictates the necessity for a mobile version. That’s why we really need your support to create APM Chat. When it has been created, it will transform the existing advertising system: customers will love ads while ads will be friendly and respectful to their viewers. 

We will express our gratitude by offering our backers some really nice perks.  



- We are building this instrument to help local businesses to promote goods and services fairly 

- We want to support a high level of customers’ loyalty

- We work so that customers would understand that advertising is an important tool to boost their local economy

-  We believe that customers can easily cooperate with local business via advertising without being distracted and irritated by ads

- We’ve altered the current advertising model to make ads really helpful and friendly to people.


         How will APM Chat change advertising?

No more unsolicited advertising! Your time and attention spent on own advertising board – APM Board – is always financially rewarding, because you get 90% of the cost of one ad display. 

You select the categories of ads you are interested in, and you get the promotions available in close proximity first.

You see ads only when you want to!



Neither advertisers nor APM Agentuur (us) traces your activity in the system. In other words, you are completely anonymous to advertisers – they see only the information you provide them.

 Manipulation and influencing your choice aren't possible. 




Nothing annoys you and distracts from communicating with your friends. You won’t receive any pop-ups, instead, you’ll see a polite notification about how much advertising on your own ad board wants to pay you for your time and attention. You decide when you want to see it.

Your email boxes will miraculously become spam-free.

You become responsible for market economic sustainability in the country you live. Since you are paid 90% of the cost of the ads you see, you support local business – the backbone of your local economy.




The money you are paid can be used to pay for online services, subscriptions, music, movies, bills and other stuff. You can also withdraw the money to your bank account. If you wish, you can start your own advertising campaign on www.adpays.me. In a nutshell, you do with your money whatever you want!

The best price for advertising: only 0,01-0,09 EURO for one guaranteed display. 

A high Click through rate of 65-75%.

You have easy and full control of the advertising campaigns you are running.




You can terminate your campaign at any time and withdraw the unspent money directly to your accounts. 

You can allocate funds as you wish. 



You choose yourself how many users and times your ad will be displayed so that you users remember it. The system prevent fake views, be sure your message will be gotten.



You needn’t spend your marketing money on social networks and search engines. All the money stays in your region. It supports the locals and increase their purchasing power. Users are happy with your ads!




You can be sure that some money will be returned by the users who got interested in products and services you offer. Remember, you pay them for their time and attention. This courtesy towards them makes your potential customers want to see what you have to offer. 


What’s wrong with the advertising market and how APM Chat solves it


Unlike “attention traps”, we give you 90% of the cost of the ad you see on your APM Board. You rent your time only when you want to: no single ad will intrude and steal your attention. 

    1.  We control and block fake accounts created by one user.

    2.  We are serviced by online payment system Paysera, which asks for an official document everyone who creates an account for financial operations there. Our partner guarantess that advertisers’ money is paid only to real people.

We don’t monitor users’ location, instead, users set it themselves. The location can be easily changed: for example, if you plan a trip and want to see what local businesses have to offer you. Yet, even though we do not see users’ IP, if a user changes his or her location too frequently, we consider it as dishonesty and take measures.

Advertisers themselves decide how many times and how many users will see their ad, so you know the cost of the campaign in advance and you won’t spend a cent more. Besides, the cost of ad is so low that users will hardly make it their source of income. 




Chat without ads

APM Chat is a mobile application based on an online advertising platform www.adpays.me There are no unwanted ads, only polite notifications informing you about how much advertisers want to pay you for viewing their ads.



Contacts

WE BELIEVE YOUR TIME IS VALUABLE

APM Chat will provide users with everything they need for convenient and positive communication. Your contacts from iOS or Android devices will be easily transferred to APM Chat, if the function is on. The contacts you already have in the contact list in your desktop version will be imported as well.

ADS PAY EVERYONE

No friend you want to chat with? Invite your pals using APM Chat! As soon as your friends have joined us, we’ll give them their unique APM Board accessible from both desktop and mobile versions. From this very moment they receive all special offers and get paid for it!

GOOD ADVERTISING = GOOD USABILITY

APM Sync Feature will automatically save any data to any device you use. You will never lose your personal data and will have access to it from your devices – what you will need to do is just to log in.

Stickers

APM Chat offers several sets of unique stickers to make your chatting even more expressive! Our partners, www.stickerium.com, kindly designed the set “Fun and Love Production” especially for the users of APM Chat so that they could use them for free. Want more? You can find sets for every taste and buy the ones you liked on our partners’ website.  

Download the app




A. For registered users: log in with your APM Board user name and password.

B. For newcomers: Create a new profile and get a new APM Board. From this very moment you'll receive targeted local ads. We advise you pick your Personal Interests in the ABOUT ME section so that you only see offers you are truly interested in.  


Add friends’ contacts, send and receive messages, chat, share news, impressions, ideas, express emotions using stickers and don't forget to check Notifications in order not to miss something interesting!  


If you want to advertise

  • Go to the Create an Ad section on www.adpays.me website. Design your advertising campaign (duration, displays in total, displays to one client, banner size, interactive functions), upload or create online a banner and start the campaign by paying the sum calculated. 

  • Keep an eye on your campaign.

  • Your advertising campaign can be terminated at any moment. The unspent money can be withdrawn or allocated to start a different campaign or  simply to add new clients (for example, if you want to add newly registered users or change your target audience). 


If you want to see ads

  • Login to www.adpays.me website when you have time and check the services and goods that local businesses offer nearby.

  • Get paid for your time spent and attention paid to ads (viewing, following links, reading flyers and business cards).

  • The money you received can be spent to launch your own advertising campaign  or transferred to your bank account.

  • The effective, fully-functioning web-version (www.adpays.me) built

  • Translated into 10 languages

  • A dedicated team works for you



Create and upload APM Chat in App Store and Android Market. In APM Chat, users will be able to see their APM Board as well as to receive notifications about the amount of money advertisers are going to pay for viewing their ads.


Build a fully operational mobile version of APM Board - APM Chat, which will allow users to check their ads using their mobile devices. No need to log into your computer! 


Introduce a function for advertisers: they will be able to create ads from their mobile devices.



We have already invested in:

- Building and launching the web platform  www.adpays.me 

- Translating the system into 10 languages

- Promotional activities 

Where does the money advertiser pay go?

90% of the money an advertiser pays for a display, goes directly to an APM Board owner's account.

10% goes to APM Agentuur (acting as a user’s agent), and is spent to keep the system functioning at its best.


What do we need to build the app?

We need 45,000 USD for Stage 1. Having received the sum needed, we'll introduce APM Chat - a new advertising tool, which will boost customers' happiness and loyalty and will be completely free of unwanted ads.

The money is needed to pay for designers', software developers', coders', system administrators' and translators' services. The crowdfunding platform’s commission is also included in the sum, as well as PayPal transaction fees.

This sum doesn't include the cost of promotional activities and the technical support of the desktop version.









THANKS FOR VISITING OUR PAGE!  

PLEASE SUPPORT COURTEOUS TARGETED ADVERTISING! 

You can also find this campaign on

Facebook  Twitter  YouTube  Website
story_txt:
Thank you for watching the video!                                                                             Fun video about Fairness in advertising
                                         Ukrainian version      Lithuanian version

We’ve
revoliutionized the existing advertising system to make ads really helpful! We
are building APM Chat to help local business to promote goods and services
fairly and provide customers with the unique chance to cooperate with local
businesses and understand that advertising is an essential tool to boost their
local economy. 

The result
– a truly high level of customer satisfaction and loyalty!I’ve been running my own small businesses successfully for quite
a long time: I sell things that people need for their home. I love what I do
because I feel I do a meaningful job. Yet I’ve faced every pitfall local
entrepreneurs have to overcome to spread the word about their business. 
Following marketing gurus’ advice, I was printing countless
flyers and paid solicitors to stuff letterboxes of my potential clients with
them. I was paying more and more money every day for social network advertising
and invading people’s private space. No wonder the more ads I sent, the more
ignorant my clients were. So I was struggling to find the answer why people get
irritated by other people telling them about handy, interesting and even
ingenious things. The answer came out of a sudden: people don’t mind ads – what
they don’t like is the way they are delivered.
It was hight time I had to find a different way to address my
customers. I understood I need to talk to them directly, without
intermediaries, so that people see that I respect them and they can trust me.
The result is www.adpays.me - an IT
startup, the fruit of my and my team labor. The website has been translated
into 10 languages and has been successfully launched, so it is available for
businesses around the world. 
Yet a dynamic business world dictates the necessity for a mobile
version. That’s why we really need your support to create APM Chat. When it has
been created, it will transform the existing advertising system: customers will
love ads while ads will be friendly and respectful to their viewers. We will
express our gratitude by offering our backers some really nice perks.  









- We are building this instrument to help local businesses to promote goods and services fairly 
- We want to support a high level of customers’ loyalty
- We work so that customers would understand that advertising is an important tool to boost their local economy
-  We believe that customers can easily cooperate with local business via advertising without being distracted and irritated by ads
- We’ve altered the current advertising model to make ads really helpful and friendly to people.






         How will APM Chat change advertising?














No more unsolicited advertising! Your time and attention spent
on own advertising board – APM Board – is always financially rewarding, because
you get 90% of the cost of one ad display. 










You select the categories of ads you are interested in, and you get the promotions available in close proximity first.









You see ads only when you want to!










Neither advertisers nor APM Agentuur (us) traces your activity
in the system. In other words, you are completely anonymous to advertisers –
they see only the information you provide them.














 Manipulation and influencing your choice aren't possible. 











Nothing annoys you and distracts from communicating with your
friends. You won’t receive any pop-ups, instead, you’ll see a polite
notification about how much advertising on your own ad board wants to pay you
for your time and attention. You decide when you want to see it.









Your email boxes will miraculously become spam-free. 















You become responsible for market economic sustainability in the
country you live. Since you are paid 90% of the cost of the ads you see, you
support local business – the backbone of your local economy.












The money you are paid can be used to pay for online services,
subscriptions, music, movies, bills and other stuff. You can also withdraw the
money to your bank account. If you wish, you can start your own advertising
campaign on www.adpays.me. In a nutshell, you do
with your money whatever you want!

















The best price for advertising: only 0,01-0,09 EURO for one
guaranteed display. 







A high Click through rate of 65-75%.










You have easy and full control of the advertising campaigns you are running.










You can terminate your
campaign at any time and withdraw the unspent money directly to your accounts. 







You can allocate funds as you wish. 









You choose yourself how many users and times your ad will be displayed so that you users remember it. The system prevent fake views, be sure your message will be gotten.










You needn’t spend your marketing money on social networks and
search engines. All the money stays in your region. It supports the locals and
increase their purchasing power. Users are happy with your ads!










You can be sure that some money will be returned by the users
who got interested in products and services you offer. Remember, you pay them
for their time and attention. This courtesy towards them makes your potential
customers want to see what you have to offer. 









What’s wrong with the advertising market and how APM Chat solves
it









Unlike “attention traps”, we give you 90% of the cost
of the ad you see on your APM Board. You rent your time only when you want to:
no single ad will intrude and steal your attention. 







1.  We control
and block fake accounts created by one user.
2.  We are
serviced by online payment system Paysera, which asks for an official document
everyone who creates an account for financial operations there. Our partner
guarantess that advertisers’ money is paid only to real people.







We don’t monitor users’ location,
instead, users set it themselves. The location can be easily changed: for
example, if you plan a trip and want to see what local businesses have to offer
you. Yet, even though we do not see users’ IP, if a user changes his or her
location too frequently, we consider it as dishonesty and take measures.








Advertisers themselves decide how
many times and how many users will see their ad, so you know the cost of the campaign
in advance and you won’t spend a cent more. Besides, the cost of ad is so low
that users will hardly make it their source of income.

without ads
