story:
לעברית לחץ כאן 

Help the Temple Institute Raise a Red Heifer

Help the Temple Institute produce a kosher Red Heifer in the Land of Israel. Be part of restoring the state of purity that will enable the rebuilding of the Holy Temple.

After millennia of yearning, only one organization is paving the way for the rebuilding of the Holy Temple. The Temple Institute, (מכון המקדש) located in the Old City of Jerusalem, is a research organization dedicated to preparing for the construction of the Third Temple, including the recreation of over 60 sacred Temple vessels ready for use once the Temple is rebuilt. These include the High Priest's breastplate featuring the twelve precious stones of the tribes of Israel, the half-ton golden menorah, and the musical instruments of the Levitical choir. Last year, the Temple Institute's successful Indiegogo campaign raised over $100,000 used to develop architectural plans for the Holy Temple.

August 2015: Last year's bold campaign to raise $100,000 for the preparations of architectural plans for the Third Temple was a great success, thanks to the hundreds of people who supported the effort. This past Tisha b'Av (July 26, 2015) we released a short video showing for the first time detailed architectural plans and 3D renditions of the Holy Temple Sanctuary.

The Holy Temple stands for the sanctity and dignity of human life and universal peace, and will be the center of an inspiring pilgrimage for all people (see Isaiah Ch. 2). 

The Temple Institute is now beginning one of its most ambitious projects to date: Restoring the Divine commandment of the Red Heifer, enabling the return of tahara, the state of Biblical purity to the world. This is an integral part of the prophesied promise of the elevation and unity of all humanity. 
What is a Red Heifer? Why Do We Need One? 


"And they shall take to you a perfect red heifer..." - Numbers 19

The Red Heifer is a female cow, three years of age, with perfect consistency of a particular reddish hue, having not even two hairs of any other color. The heifer also may never be used for any type of labor, and must be totally blemish-free.  The ordinance of the para aduma, the Red Heifer, is found in the Torah, in the book of Numbers Chapter 19, and elucidated in the teachings of the Sages of Israel. The process of purification through the Red Heifer is the only antidote to the state of impurity caused by death, and thus, intrinsically imperative for the reestablishment of purity. 

What's the Difference Between an Ordinary Red Cow, and a Proper Red Heifer?

Red cattle can be found throughout the world, and are not uncommon. However, raising a perfect red heifer in accordance with Biblical requirements for the fulfillment of the Numbers Ch. 19 commandment is a daunting task requiring advance planning, exacting preparation and constant supervision. In order for a heifer to be considered kosher for the Biblical use, it must literally be raised from birth under specific circumstances and in a controlled environment. 

The Project Has Begun: A Change in Conception

In the past the people of Israel waited for the birth of a potential Red Heifer. But with Torah knowledge and advanced science, the Temple Institute has now begun to actively pursue this commandment.  For this unprecedented project, the Temple Institute has joined forces with experienced cattle ranchers here in Israel. These experts in the science of animal husbandry, under the halachic  supervision and guidance of the rabbis of the Temple Institute, will utilize the technique of implanting the frozen embryos of Red Angus cattle in Israeli domestic cattle.  The end result of this program will be the introduction of the Red Angus breed into Israel. This method, authorized and approved by Israel's Ministry of Agriculture, has already proven successful with the birth of a number of male Red Angus. The location and other details of the cattle ranch will remain undisclosed to the general public during the initial stages of the project. The Temple Institute will release periodic progress updates.

Our Immediate Goal is $125,000. Your contribution will go towards:

  • embryo implantation 
  • veterinary care, upkeep, and feed
  • special supervised arrangements for care in accordance with Biblical law
  • infrastructure for the controlled environment of the herd
  • identification and separate care of candidates for perfect Red Heifers
  • security arrangements including 24 hour video surveillance and monitoring 
  • the publication of original, ground-breaking halachic research and findings 
The successful introduction of perfect Red Heifers to Israel is the first project of a multi-level program that will span a number of years. Future stages of the purity restoration program will include:  
  • Expansion of the curriculum and faculty of the Temple Institute's acclaimed Nezer HaKodesh Academy for Priestly Studies to include the training of prospective priests-in-training in all aspects of the precept of the Red Heifer;
  • The identification and selection of kohanim (descendants of the priestly tribe of Aaron) whose state of purity enables them to attend to the preparation of the Red Heifer;
  •  the documentation and provision of the precise location on the Mount of Olives for the heifer's preparation 
Myths and Facts

Myths:

  • The appearance of a Red Heifer is miraculous
  • The Red Heifer will be prepared by  the Messiah
  • A Red Heifer cannot be prepared without first obtaining the ashes of the original Red Heifer 

Facts: 

  • There is nothing miraculous about the birth of a red cow; they exist in plenty. But raising and preparing a heifer to be a potential candidate for fulfilling the Biblical commandment requires know-how:  halachic, scientific and animal husbandry expertise,  The Temple Institute's partnership with expert Israeli cattlemen represents the perfect synthesis of Torah knowledge and scientific expertise... and faith. A true religious-Zionist enterprise! 
  • In the words of the great sage, Maimonides, there is no halachic connection between the arrival of the Messiah, and our obligation to fulfill any of G-d's commandments (Rambam, Iggeret HaShmad). All of the Torah's commandments are doable and waiting to be fulfilled; the Red Heifer is no different.
  • There is no halachic prerequisite that requires the original ashes


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Share our video and campaign with others. 

Contact

If you'd like to contact us about this campaign, visit the contact page of our website or email us at redheifer@templeinstitute.org You will receive a receipt for your donation. Please note, donations via this IndieGogo campaign are not tax-deductible. If you'd like to donate the old-fashioned way via check, or to make a tax-deductible donation, please click here to be redirected to our website's donation page.

These include the High Priest's breastplate featuring the twelve precious stones of the tribes of Israel, the half-ton golden menorah, and the musical instruments of the Levitical choir. Last year, the Temple Institute's successful Indiegogo campaign raised over $100,000 used to develop architectural plans for the Holy Temple.August 2015: Last year's bold campaign to raise $100,000 for the preparations of architectural plans for the Third Temple was a great success, thanks to the hundreds of people who supported the effort. This past Tisha b'Av (July 26, 2015) we released a short video showing for the first time detailed architectural plans and 3D renditions of the Holy Temple Sanctuary.


The Holy Temple stands for the sanctity and dignity of human life and universal peace, and will be the center of an inspiring pilgrimage for all people (see Isaiah Ch. 2). 



The Temple Institute is now beginning one of its most ambitious projects to date: Restoring the Divine commandment of the Red Heifer, enabling the return of tahara, the state of Biblical purity to the world. This is an integral part of the prophesied promise of the elevation and unity of all humanity. 


What is a Red Heifer? Why Do We Need One? 


"And they shall take to you a perfect red heifer..." - Numbers 19
The Red Heifer is a female cow, three years of age, with perfect consistency of a particular reddish hue, having not even two hairs of any other color. The heifer also may never be used for any type of labor, and must be totally blemish-free.  The ordinance of the para aduma, the Red Heifer, is found in the Torah, in the book of Numbers Chapter 19, and elucidated in the teachings of the Sages of Israel. The process of purification through the Red Heifer is the only antidote to the state of impurity caused by death, and thus, intrinsically imperative for the reestablishment of purity. 
What's the Difference Between an Ordinary Red Cow, and a Proper Red Heifer?
Red cattle can be found throughout the world, and are not uncommon. However, raising a perfect red heifer in accordance with Biblical requirements for the fulfillment of the Numbers Ch. 19 commandment is a daunting task requiring advance planning, exacting preparation and constant supervision. In order for a heifer to be considered kosher for the Biblical use, it must literally be raised from birth under specific circumstances and in a controlled environment. 
The Project Has Begun: A Change in Conception

In the past the people of Israel waited for the birth of a potential Red Heifer. But with Torah knowledge and advanced science, the Temple Institute has now begun to actively pursue this commandment.  For this unprecedented project, the Temple Institute has joined forces with experienced cattle ranchers here in Israel. These experts in the science of animal husbandry, under the halachic  supervision and guidance of the rabbis of the Temple Institute, will utilize the technique of implanting the frozen embryos of Red Angus cattle in Israeli domestic cattle.  The end result of this program will be the introduction of the Red Angus breed into Israel. This method, authorized and approved by Israel's Ministry of Agriculture, has already proven successful with the birth of a number of male Red Angus. The location and other details of the cattle ranch will remain undisclosed to the general public during the initial stages of the project. The Temple Institute will release periodic progress updates.

Our Immediate Goal is $125,000. Your contribution will go towards:



embryo implantation 


veterinary care, upkeep, and feed

special supervised arrangements for care in accordance with Biblical law

infrastructure for the controlled environment of the herd

identification and separate care of candidates for perfect Red Heifers

security arrangements including 24 hour video surveillance and monitoring 

the publication of original, ground-breaking halachic research and findings 

The successful introduction of perfect Red Heifers to Israel is the first project of a multi-level program that will span a number of years. Future stages of the purity restoration program will include:  



Expansion of the curriculum and faculty of the Temple Institute's acclaimed Nezer HaKodesh Academy for Priestly Studies to include the training of prospective priests-in-training in all aspects of the precept of the Red Heifer;


The identification and selection of kohanim (descendants of the priestly tribe of Aaron) whose state of purity enables them to attend to the preparation of the Red Heifer;


 the documentation and provision of the precise location on the Mount of Olives for the heifer's preparation 



Myths and Facts



Myths:

The appearance of a Red Heifer is miraculous
The Red Heifer will be prepared by  the Messiah
A Red Heifer cannot be prepared without first obtaining the ashes of the original Red Heifer 


Facts: 



There is nothing miraculous about the birth of a red cow; they exist in plenty. But raising and preparing a heifer to be a potential candidate for fulfilling the Biblical commandment requires know-how:  halachic, scientific and animal husbandry expertise,  The Temple Institute's partnership with expert Israeli cattlemen represents the perfect synthesis of Torah knowledge and scientific expertise... and faith. A true religious-Zionist enterprise! 


In the words of the great sage, Maimonides, there is no halachic connection between the arrival of the Messiah, and our obligation to fulfill any of G-d's commandments (Rambam, Iggeret HaShmad). All of the Torah's commandments are doable and waiting to be fulfilled; the Red Heifer is no different.
There is no halachic prerequisite that requires the original ashes



    
Other Ways You Can Help


Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Share our video and campaign with others. 
Contact
If you'd like to contact us about this campaign, visit the contact page of our website or email us at redheifer@templeinstitute.org You will receive a receipt for your donation. Please note, donations via this IndieGogo campaign are not tax-deductible. If you'd like to donate the old-fashioned way via check, or to make a tax-deductible donation, please click here to be redirected to our website's donation page.

story:
Short Summary

The Deep South Biscuit Co. is a new Food Truck business in the metropolitan Atlanta area.  The brainchild of Giovanna Rosenfeld and Kara Hornbuckle - We are hoping to fill a void in the Food Truck community of Atlanta by adding a new twist to the concept of comfort food and developed a delicious and exciting menu featuring our Gourmet from Scratch Buttermilk Biscuits. Our goal is To provide the Atlanta area with Gourmet Southern Biscuit Sandwiches, southern sides and of course some homemade sweet tea and lemonade. We have been working on a food truck for over three years and believe we know what it takes to make The Deep South Biscuit Company Truck - the best one in Atlanta!  If you like a delicious comforting biscuit with lots of down home ingredients, then this will satisfy your cravings for something out of the ordinary. 

Our Plan: is to use the funds that we hope to raise through a successful Kickstarter campaign to get our business operational... we have already borrowed some money from a friend to buy the truck (Thank you RF)- but really need a little extra help.  We want to raise at least $5,000 with this kickstarter to help "beautify" the truck - Wraps can be as much as $7500 - we have found an artist that will paint the truck for a fraction of that, in addition we need to install a new serving window which is about $2500. Then we need to get permitted - The entire process will be a minimum of $15,000.  As an added incentive to get the community to help exceed our goal, we plan to make one of our customers’ dreams come true if we exceed our goal by $10,000 and bring a "pop up" to one of our backers at work (they can treat their office by their own generosity)  We feel that our wishes are coming true and we would like to do the same for others and our community. Kickstarter can allow us to do that, and get our truck up and running sooner. We have used most of our personal money for the truck and equipment. We have signed a lease on a commercial prep kitchen space and have outfit it with all of the necessary kitchen equipment. We need to pay permit and license fees, and purchase three months of supplies. We will launch our weekday business working in the newly designated area set aside exclusively for food trucks in the heart of downtown Atlanta and hopefully the adjacent suburbs (From Swanee - to Kennesaw). On the weekends we will take advantage of our mobility and will be taking our truck to many of the community's festivals and special events. In addition, we are offering catering services - office parks, weddings, bat-mitzvahs!  We hope to begin serving in March of 2016,

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $5000 - hopefully more.  For each contribution we will give perks from Recipe books - to menu items named after you - to catering for you and 150 of your closest friends.

The Impact

If we have help, we can make this happen - make dreams come true and feed the streets - literally and figuratively.  We plan to use profits to help others in our industry.

Risks & Challenges

The concept of food trucks has been around for a long time, but here is where we meet the challenge in the Atlanta marketplace. This is new market segment where the regulations are still being ironed out and naturally this means that there will be changes in taxation and permitting. To overcome some of these challenges we have joined the Atlanta Street Food Coalition to stay educated and proactive to meet the changes that will occur in this new industry. We take pride in our community and we are excited to be a part of Atlanta's food truck scene.  

Future Goals: We are committed not only to from scratch southern food - but to helping our community and we pledge to give back. Once we are up and running, we will donate a portion of all profits made to some great local charities (check out our website for specifics)  Making our goal to not only feed and support our community - but to give help to those who need it. Our vision is not just for us - but for many.  

Thank for helping us to make this happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate - you can help.

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign  - ue the indiegogo share tools!
  • Like us on Facebook, Follow our Twitter feed and Instagram - 
  • Sign up for a tasting party - Yep, we need to try out the menu - we need your help to do it, drop us a line and give us your info - we will invite you to our commissary to critique our menu.  Nobody turns down free food!  

And that's all there is to it.

story:
All known ancient cultures around the world build pyramids, why they did? and why all these structures are so similar, although according to official scienceThese civilizations had no contact with each other? Did ancient civilizations, and can only mimic what was previously already built?Is now our billions in civilization could build the Great Pyramid?

What is our goal?

The aim of this project is to collect funds for the construction of the Great Pyramid, built to the plans of the Great Pyramid of Cheops.But why should we do it?Therefore, the already high time to find out the truth, confirm or deny modern science. To discover the secrets of the past,We find out who we are where we come from and what is the history of our species, working on this great project we will have to first thoroughly investigate mysteriesthe current pyramid and very possible with the implementation of this great project we find the answer to that awaits all mankind.

Why should we try to build the Great Pyramid?

There are many reasons why humanity should undertake this project.Firstly, the great pyramid is the most mysterious and the largest stone building on the ground, not much we know about it, it may be much older than we were taught more often it is repeated hypothesis that the complex of pyramids in Giza is a faithful copy of the constellation of Orion.However, such arrangement three stars in Orion, there were accurately about 10,500 thousand years ago. Do not really know who or when they built the Great Pyramid,also we do not know why she had to serve, whether it was building from astronomical observations tomb, and perhaps power plant.On the other hand are known Overworld mysterious phenomena in the interior of the pyramids, it is also remarkable that one third of the pyramid there is a place,which has apparently preserving properties. These are areas of particularly strong impact and there are known cases of long persistence of fresh meat.Pyramid seems to accumulate some energy. Perhaps that is why the ancient Egyptians tried to emulate these structures reasoning rightly,the maintenance of their bodies by placing them in a special place pyramid will act as an additional factor mummification. It appears that the current observed by us of pyramids properties are only the background, the echo capabilities of these ancient devices.They could serve as a power plant. Probably at least the structure of Giza in Egypt there are the remnants of Egyptian civilization, but can be lowered such power plantschambers and tunnels of the Great Pyramid showing signs of numerous anomalies, which have so far not received an adequate explanation or discussion of international experts and Egyptologists.In his excellent book "The Giza Power Plant" engineer Chris Dunn confirmed the existence of evidence that suggests that in ancient times, inside the Great Pyramid was an explosion.which in turn resulted operation of the power unit, writes in his publication said the scientist.

Concept are many and more are questions that do not know the answer.No government in the world nor any company not taken such a big project which has no financial justification.Only we as humanity a joint effort we can undertake such a huge project that may give us answers to many questions.

story:
Hey friends – as you know I have been wowing the food industry world for years with my charm, wit and great service for years.  I have decided that the time was right (again) to open my own place. So Junior and I are going for it.  We have rented a store front in Echo Park with the intent of opening a small coffee shop/café.  We will serve coffees, deserts, sandwiches, salads, paninis, wraps, hugs, juices and so much more.  I had initial investment funds but my time line has been shot and now find myself short of funds to complete my project.  I have equipment and permits but need funds to complete my dream so I am turning to you.  I need $11k to finish this dream.  The city has sucked me dry. 

I need about $11k to complete this project.  I have to build a handicap restroom, electrical upgrades and supplies are needed. Most of the equipment has already been purchased. It will be the greatest cafe ever when done.  I will be serving locally roasted coffees.  I am doing curb service for you busy ones that need the coffee fix on your way to work.  Get a muffin while you're at it. For the ones that have the time to stop in we are serving a healthy, simple, great quality food product in a great environment.  The world has gone boutique and too high end – its time to bring simple back, yeah.  If you know me at all, you know how I do things.  Every little thing helps.

Coffee, juices, deserts, a healthy menu served daily from 7 am to 10 pm, what more do you want?  As you know from my years at Eat Well or Brite Spot or even that corporate gig, its about making a fun place to come eat, meet new people, hang, and listen to good music.  Being next to the Echo Plex, the church, the park and in the middle of a great neighborhood will make this place a great local hang out. Hiring locals to work the counter is also helpful to the community.  As you know I always give you a bang for your buck and time.

This project has been full of lots of starts and stops.  A few hurdles and challenges, but as you also know, I never give up on a great idea.  And this is a great idea.  Finding solutions for any obstacle is how you get things done.  Algebra. Never say no. Never say you can't.  Never say die.

I continue forward to make this dream a reality.  Banks do not do start up loans.  That is why I am turning to this site and you.

So please help with this dream.  If you can give, please do.  If you can spread the word to others that might like this idea and help in some way, then please help a brother out!  Anything is help, even words of encouragement.  I believe in karma, I have always given back when I can and will do so again when the doors open.

story:
Have you ever walked the grounds of Cybertron? Seen the Ruby skies of Gallifry? Stared down the Armies of Rita Repulsa or Lord Zedd? Have you ever wanted to know the secrets of Protoculture, or become the Songstress of the Universe?  Have you ever wanted to make the Kessel run in under 12 Parsecs?  Well, I have and it’s awesome!

My name is Joel Isenberg, I am the Owner and Toy Reviewer at Ryndur’d Reviews and I am opening my own Comic Book and Toy store called – From Hobbies to Heroes.

From Hobbies to Heroes will focus on Comic Books from Marvel, DC Comics, Image, IDW Publishing and more, as well as Action Figures and Collectables from all genre. We want to celebrate all things Geek, and we want to do it with YOU! 

How can you help From Hobbies to Heroes open their doors?
We are seeing contributions and funds to help open our doors.  Currently we are looking at about $20,000 to fully realize this goal to ensure we get our best foot forward.  Every bit of the funds raised will go to the growth and set up of From Hobbies to Heroes.  The money raised will go to the purchase of the following;

1.  Inventory – The more inventory we can have on hand when we open the better we can serve our customers with their collecting needs.

a.  By using Diamond Comics as our distributor we can get the latest comics from all the major distributors.  The minimum monthly requirements for purchasing from Diamond is approximately $500 per month.  We expect to pay a little more than this to help increase or initial stock for the first year.

b.  We also intend to purchase figures and collectables from Entertainment Earth, Hobby Link Japan, Bluefin Distributions and other stores to help provide a wide range of stock from Transformers, Star Wars, Power Rangers, Kamen Rider, S.H. Figuarts and Figma.

c.  Other Items we intend to stock include Trading Card Games, like Pokemon, Magic the Gathering and Yu-Gi-Oh! We also intend to carry Wall Scrolls, Posters, Board Games and miniature figures.

2.  Equipment – In order to prepare and hold the inventory we will have on stock we will need the necessary equipment to process the orders and make sure we keep items in the best possible shape for our customer, as well as the most accurate inventory. Some of the items include;

a.  Shelving – the shelves we are looking at for our inventory are approximately $220.00, we are looking to help house or inventory of Comics and items that will not be stored at Fulfilment by Amazon.

b.  Workbench –  $225.00

c.  Heat Gun and Shrinkwrap Supplies – $150.00

d.  Boxes and Shipping Supplies

e.  Laser Printer - $150.00

f.  Computer for the Store – necessary to keep inventory, placing orders, business records, etc.

g.  Hand Scanner - $60.00

3.  Storage – A lot of items will be sent to Amazon for order fulfilment, but we intend to keep items on hand as well for local sales.  Currently to rent the appropriate sized, climate controlled environment we are projecting a cost of $2,160.00 a year.

4.  Advertisement – Getting the word out will help us attract more customers.  This includes paid advertisement on Facebook, Twitter and media outlets. We also expect to have Business cards to hand out to the general public, at Conventions and other gatherings.

5.  Business related fees – While we are currently a Sole Proprietorship business we intent to set up a Limited Liability Corporation for our business. 

Other Ways You Can Help

1.  Tell your friends you gave to our Campaign.  They will be jealous and want to do the same.

2.  Post this page on your Facebook, Twitter and blogs. Tell your Mailman, your Hair Dresser or the person sitting next to you!

3.  We are also accepting any advice for running a Small Business.  What worked for you, what didn’t?  What would you have told yourself when you first started?

Why do I want to do this you may ask?  Good question!
I have been collecting comics and toys for the better part of my life.  It is something that has been a constant and a passion for me.  One that I happily share with my kids today.  My love of reading was kindled by comic books.  Imagination starts with a healthy love of playing, be it with legos, Transformers, Star Wars or Buck Rogers.  We all started with something and we all loved to play.  Dare I say, the professions we picked all started because we had a passion stemming from how we played as children? Inspiring us to learn and grow into the people we are today.

I want to provide an environment for people to continue to feel that way, to encourage a new generation of collectors, grow families together by sharing in hobbies.  I think it is an honorable pursuit and I encourage people to join me.

the orders and make sure we keep items in the best possible shape for our
customer, as well as the most accurate inventory. Some of the items include;
a. 
Shelving – the shelves we are looking at for our
inventory are approximately $220.00, we are looking to help house or inventory
of Comics and items that will not be stored at Fulfilment by Amazon.
b. 
Workbench – 
$225.00
c. 
Heat Gun and Shrinkwrap Supplies – $150.00
d. 
Boxes and Shipping Supplies
e. 
Laser Printer - $150.00
f. 
Computer for the Store – necessary to keep
inventory, placing orders, business records, etc. 
g. 
Hand Scanner - $60.00
3. 
Storage – A lot of items will be sent to Amazon
for order fulfilment, but we intend to keep items on hand as well for local
sales.  Currently to rent the appropriate
sized, climate controlled environment we are projecting a cost of $2,160.00 a
year.
4. 
Advertisement – Getting the word out will help
us attract more customers.  This includes
paid advertisement on Facebook, Twitter and media outlets. We also expect to have Business cards to hand
out to the general public, at Conventions and other gatherings.
5. 
Business related fees – While we are currently a
Sole Proprietorship business we intent to set up a Limited Liability
Corporation for our business.

Why
do I want to do this you may ask?  Good
question!
I have been collecting comics and toys for the better part of my life.  It is something that has been a constant and
a passion for me.  One that I happily
share with my kids today.  My love of
reading was kindled by comic books.  Imagination
starts with a healthy love of playing, be it with legos, Transformers, Star Wars
or Buck Rogers.  We all started with
something and we all loved to play.  Dare I
say, the professions we picked all started because we had a
passion stemming from how we played as children? Inspiring us to learn and grow into the people we are today.
I
want to provide an environment for people to continue to feel that way, to
encourage a new generation of collectors, grow families together by sharing in
hobbies.  I think it is an honorable
pursuit and I encourage people to join me.
